h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0001^ea^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ ^a^P3.0001^ea^ ^a^M2.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa bhaggesu viharati susumaaragire {su.msumaaragire (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhesaka.laavane migadaaye. atha kho nakulapitaa gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho nakulapitaa gahapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``ahamasmi ^a^V2.0002^ea^, bhante, ji.n.no vu.d.dho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto aaturakaayo abhikkha.naata"nko. aniccadassaavii kho panaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato manobhaavaniiyaana~nca bhikkhuuna.m. ovadatu ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa; anusaasatu ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa; ya.m mamassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.

[03] ``evameta.m, gahapati, evameta.m, gahapati! aaturo haaya.m, gahapati, kaayo a.n.dabhuuto pariyonaddho. yo ^a^T3.0002^ea^ hi, gahapati, ima.m kaaya.m pariharanto muhuttampi aarogya.m pa.tijaaneyya, kima~n~natra baalyaa? tasmaatiha te, ^a^M2.0002^ea^ gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `aaturakaayassa me sato citta.m anaatura.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba''nti.

[03] atha kho nakulapitaa gahapati bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa ^a^P3.0002^ea^ anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho nakulapitara.m gahapati.m aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca -- ``vippasannaani kho te, gahapati, indriyaani; parisuddho mukhava.n.no pariyodaato. alattha no ajja bhagavato sammukhaa dhammi.m katha.m savanaayaa''ti?

[03] ``katha~nhi no siyaa, bhante! idaanaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya amatena abhisitto''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, gahapati, bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya amatena abhisitto''ti? ``idhaaha.m, bhante, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.m. ekamanta.m nisinno khvaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m etadavoca.m -- `ahamasmi, bhante, ji.n.no vu.d.dho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto aaturakaayo abhikkha.naata"nko. aniccadassaavii kho panaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato manobhaavaniiyaana~nca bhikkhuuna.m. ovadatu ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa; anusaasatu ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa; ya.m mamassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m vutte ^a^T3.0003^ea^, ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa etadavoca -- `evameta.m, gahapati, evameta.m, gahapati! aaturo haaya.m, gahapati, kaayo a.n.dabhuuto pariyonaddho. yo hi, gahapati, ima.m kaaya.m pariharanto ^a^V2.0003^ea^ muhuttampi aarogya.m pa.tijaaneyya, kima~n~natra baalyaa? tasmaatiha te gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- aaturakaayassa me sato citta.m anaatura.m bhavissatiiti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba'nti. eva.m khvaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya amatena abhisitto''ti.

[03] ``na hi pana ta.m, gahapati, pa.tibhaasi bhagavanta.m {ta.m bhagavanta.m (sii0)} uttari.m pa.tipucchitu.m -- `kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, aaturakaayo ceva hoti aaturacitto ca, kittaavataa ca pana aaturakaayo hi kho hoti no ca aaturacitto'''ti ^a^M2.0003^ea^? ``duuratopi ^a^P3.0003^ea^ kho maya.m, bhante, aagaccheyyaama aayasmato saariputtassa santike etassa bhaasitassa atthama~n~naatu.m. saadhu vataayasmanta.myeva saariputta.m pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho''ti.
[03] ``tena hi, gahapati, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho nakulapitaa gahapati aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosi. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] ``katha~nca, gahapati, aaturakaayo ceva hoti, aaturacitto ca? idha, gahapati, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito ruupa.m attato samanupassati, ruupavanta.m ^a^T3.0004^ea^ vaa attaana.m; attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. `aha.m ruupa.m, mama ruupa'nti pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayii hoti. tassa `aha.m ruupa.m, mama ruupa'nti pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayino ta.m ruupa.m vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa ruupavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa.

[03] ``vedana.m attato samanupassati, vedanaavanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa vedana.m, vedanaaya vaa attaana.m. `aha.m vedanaa, mama vedanaa'ti pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayii hoti. tassa `aha.m vedanaa, mama vedanaa'ti pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayino, saa vedanaa vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa vedanaavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa.

[03] ``sa~n~na.m attato samanupassati, sa~n~naavanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa sa~n~na.m, sa~n~naaya vaa ^a^V2.0004^ea^ attaana.m. `aha.m sa~n~naa, mama sa~n~naa'ti pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayii hoti. tassa `aha.m sa~n~naa, mama sa~n~naa'ti pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayino, saa sa~n~naa vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa sa~n~naavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa.

[03] ``sa"nkhaare attato samanupassati, sa"nkhaaravanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa sa"nkhaare, sa"nkhaaresu vaa attaana.m. `aha.m sa"nkhaaraa, mama sa"nkhaaraa'ti pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayii hoti. tassa `aha.m sa"nkhaaraa, mama sa"nkhaaraa'ti pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayino, te sa"nkhaaraa vipari.namanti ^a^T3.0005^ea^ a~n~nathaa honti. tassa sa"nkhaaravipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa ^a^P3.0004^ea^ uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa.

[03] ``vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^M2.0004^ea^ attato samanupassati, vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. `aha.m vi~n~naa.na.m, mama vi~n~naa.na'nti pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayii hoti. tassa `aha.m vi~n~naa.na.m, mama vi~n~naa.na'nti pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayino, ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa vi~n~naa.navipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. eva.m kho, gahapati, aaturakaayo ceva hoti aaturacitto ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, gahapati, aaturakaayo hi kho hoti no ca aaturacitto? idha, gahapati, sutavaa ariyasaavako ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suviniito sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito na ruupa.m attato samanupassati, na ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m; na attani vaa ruupa.m, na ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. `aha.m ruupa.m, mama ruupa'nti na pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayii hoti. tassa `aha.m ruupa.m, mama ruupa'nti apariyu.t.tha.t.thaayino, ta.m ruupa.m vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa ruupavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa nuppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa.

[03] ``na vedana.m attato samanupassati, na vedanaavanta.m vaa attaana.m; na attani vaa vedana.m, na vedanaaya vaa attaana.m ^a^T3.0006^ea^. `aha.m vedanaa, mama vedanaa'ti na pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayii hoti. tassa `aha.m vedanaa, mama vedanaa'ti apariyu.t.tha.t.thaayino, saa vedanaa vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa vedanaavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa nuppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa.

[03] ``na ^a^V2.0005^ea^ sa~n~na.m attato samanupassati, na sa~n~naavanta.m vaa attaana.m; na attani vaa sa~n~na.m, na sa~n~naaya vaa attaana.m. `aha.m sa~n~naa, mama sa~n~naa'ti na pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayii hoti. tassa `aha.m sa~n~naa, mama sa~n~naa'ti apariyu.t.tha.t.thaayino, saa sa~n~naa vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa sa~n~naavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa nuppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa.

[03] na ^a^P3.0005^ea^ sa"nkhaare attato samanupassati, na sa"nkhaaravanta.m vaa attaana.m; na attani vaa sa"nkhaare, na sa"nkhaaresu vaa attaana.m. `aha.m sa"nkhaaraa, mama sa"nkhaaraa'ti na pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayii hoti. tassa `aha.m sa"nkhaaraa, mama sa"nkhaaraa'ti apariyu.t.tha.t.thaayino, te sa"nkhaaraa vipari.namanti a~n~nathaa honti. tassa sa"nkhaaravipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa nuppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa.

[03] ``na ^a^M2.0005^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, na vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m; na attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, na vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. `aha.m vi~n~naa.na.m, mama vi~n~naa.na'nti na pariyu.t.tha.t.thaayii hoti. tassa `aha.m vi~n~naa.na.m, mama vi~n~naa.na'nti apariyu.t.tha.t.thaayino, ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti ^a^T3.0007^ea^. tassa vi~n~naa.navipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa nuppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. eva.m kho, gahapati, aaturakaayo hoti no ca aaturacitto''ti.
[03] idamavoca aayasmaa saariputto. attamano nakulapitaa gahapati aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m abhinandiiti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu {sakyesu (ka0)} viharati devadaha.m naama sakyaana.m nigamo. atha kho sambahulaa pacchaabhuumagamikaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``icchaama maya.m, bhante, pacchaabhuuma.m janapada.m gantu.m, pacchaabhuume janapade nivaasa.m kappetu''nti.

[03] ``apalokito ^a^V2.0006^ea^ pana vo, bhikkhave, saariputto''ti? ``na kho no, bhante, apalokito aayasmaa saariputto''ti. ``apaloketha, bhikkhave, saariputta.m. saariputto, bhikkhave, pa.n.dito, bhikkhuuna.m anuggaahako sabrahmacaariina''nti. ``eva.m ^a^P3.0006^ea^ bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m.

[03] tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa saariputto bhagavato aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m e.lagalaagumbe nisinno hoti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m ^a^T3.0008^ea^ saara.niiya.m {saaraa.niiya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``icchaama maya.m, aavuso saariputta, pacchaabhuuma.m janapada.m gantu.m, pacchaabhuume janapade nivaasa.m kappetu.m. apalokito no satthaa''ti.

[03] ``santi ^a^M2.0006^ea^ haavuso, naanaaverajjagata.m bhikkhu.m pa~nha.m pucchitaaro -- khattiyapa.n.ditaapi braahma.napa.n.ditaapi gahapatipa.n.ditaapi sama.napa.n.ditaapi. pa.n.ditaa haavuso, manussaa viima.msakaa -- `ki.mvaadii panaayasmantaana.m {ki.mvaadaayasmantaana.m (pii0 ka0)} satthaa kimakkhaayiiti, kacci vo aayasmantaana.m dhammaa sussutaa suggahitaa sumanasikataa suupadhaaritaa suppa.tividdhaa pa~n~naaya, yathaa byaakaramaanaa aayasmanto vuttavaadino ceva bhagavato assatha, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkheyyaatha, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyyaatha, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado {vaadaanupaato (a.t.thakathaaya.m paa.thantara.m)} gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyyaa'''ti?

[03] ``duuratopi kho maya.m, aavuso, aagaccheyyaama aayasmato saariputtassa santike etassa bhaasitassa atthama~n~naatu.m. saadhu vataayasmanta.myeva saariputta.m pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho''ti. ``tena haavuso, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] ``santi ^a^P3.0007^ea^ haavuso, naanaaverajjagata.m bhikkhu.m pa~nha.m pucchitaaro -- khattiyapa.n.ditaapi ^a^V2.0007^ea^ ...pe0... sama.napa.n.ditaapi. pa.n.ditaa haavuso, manussaa viima.msakaa ^a^T3.0009^ea^ -- `ki.mvaadii panaayasmantaana.m satthaa kimakkhaayii'ti? eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, aavuso, eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `chandaraagavinayakkhaayii kho no, aavuso, satthaa'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m byaakatepi kho, aavuso, assuyeva uttari.m pa~nha.m pucchitaaro -- khattiyapa.n.ditaapi...pe0... sama.napa.n.ditaapi. pa.n.ditaa haavuso, manussaa viima.msakaa -- `kismi.m panaayasmantaana.m chandaraagavinayakkhaayii satthaa'ti? eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, aavuso, eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `ruupe kho, aavuso, chandaraagavinayakkhaayii satthaa, vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne chandaraagavinayakkhaayii satthaa'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m byaakatepi kho, aavuso, assuyeva uttari.m pa~nha.m pucchitaaro -- khattiyapa.n.ditaapi...pe0... sama.napa.n.ditaapi. pa.n.ditaa haavuso, manussaa viima.msakaa -- `ki.m panaayasmantaana.m aadiinava.m disvaa ruupe chandaraagavinayakkhaayii satthaa, vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne chandaraagavinayakkhaayii satthaa'ti? eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, aavuso, eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `ruupe kho, aavuso ^a^M2.0007^ea^, avigataraagassa {aviitaraagassa (syaa0 ka.m0)} avigatachandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipaasassa avigatapari.laahassa avigatata.nhassa tassa ruupassa vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu avigataraagassa...pe0... avigatata.nhassa tesa.m sa"nkhaaraana.m vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa ^a^T3.0010^ea^ uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. vi~n~naa.ne avigataraagassa avigatachandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipaasassa avigatapari.laahassa avigatata.nhassa tassa vi~n~naa.nassa vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. ida.m kho no, aavuso, aadiinava.m disvaa ruupe chandaraagavinayakkhaayii satthaa, vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne chandaraagavinayakkhaayii satthaa'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^P3.0008^ea^ byaakatepi kho, aavuso, assuyeva uttari.m pa~nha.m pucchitaaro -- khattiyapa.n.ditaapi braahma.napa.n.ditaapi gahapatipa.n.ditaapi sama.napa.n.ditaapi. pa.n.ditaa haavuso, manussaa viima.msakaa -- `ki.m panaayasmantaana.m aanisa.msa.m disvaa ruupe chandaraagavinayakkhaayii satthaa, vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne chandaraagavinayakkhaayii satthaa'ti? eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe ^a^V2.0008^ea^, aavuso, eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `ruupe kho, aavuso, vigataraagassa vigatachandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipaasassa vigatapari.laahassa vigatata.nhassa tassa ruupassa vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa nuppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu vigataraagassa vigatachandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipaasassa vigatapari.laahassa vigatata.nhassa tesa.m sa"nkhaaraana.m vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa nuppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. vi~n~naa.ne vigataraagassa vigatachandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipaasassa vigatapari.laahassa vigatata.nhassa tassa vi~n~naa.nassa vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa nuppajjanti ^a^T3.0011^ea^ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. ida.m kho no, aavuso, aanisa.msa.m disvaa ruupe chandaraagavinayakkhaayii satthaa, vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne chandaraagavinayakkhaayii satthaa'''ti.

[03] ``akusale caavuso, dhamme upasampajja viharato di.t.the ceva dhamme sukho vihaaro abhavissa avighaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho, kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati paa.tika"nkhaa, nayida.m bhagavaa akusalaana.m ^a^M2.0008^ea^ dhammaana.m pahaana.m va.n.neyya. yasmaa ca kho, aavuso, akusale dhamme upasampajja viharato di.t.the ceva dhamme dukkho vihaaro savighaato saupaayaaso sapari.laaho, kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa, tasmaa bhagavaa akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaana.m va.n.neti.

[03] ``kusale caavuso, dhamme upasampajja viharato di.t.the ceva dhamme dukkho vihaaro abhavissa savighaato saupaayaaso ^a^P3.0009^ea^ sapari.laaho, kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa, nayida.m bhagavaa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampada.m va.n.neyya. yasmaa ca kho, aavuso, kusale dhamme upasampajja viharato di.t.the ceva dhamme sukho vihaaro avighaato anupaayaaso apari.laaho, kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati paa.tika"nkhaa, tasmaa bhagavaa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampada.m va.n.netii''ti.
[03] idamavocaayasmaa saariputto. attamanaa te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m abhinandunti. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0012^ea^ ^a^V2.0009^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa mahaakaccaano avantiisu viharati kuraraghare {kulaghare (ka0)} papaate pabbate. atha kho haaliddikaani {haaliddakaani (sii0), haliddikaani (syaa0)} gahapati yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho haaliddikaani gahapati aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etadavoca -- ``vuttamida.m, bhante, bhagavataa a.t.thakavaggiye maaga.n.diyapa~nhe --
[21] ``oka.m pahaaya aniketasaarii,
[27] gaame akubba.m {akrubba.m (ka0)} muni santhavaani {sandhavaani (ka0)}.
[26] kaamehi ritto apurakkharaano {apurekkharaano (sii0 suttanipaatepi) moggallaane 5-135 suttampi oloketabba.m},
[22] katha.m na viggayha janena kayiraa''ti..
[03] ``imassa nu kho, bhante, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa katha.m vitthaarena attho da.t.thabbo''ti?

[03] ``ruupadhaatu ^a^M2.0009^ea^ kho, gahapati, vi~n~naa.nassa oko. ruupadhaaturaagavinibandha~nca {... vinibaddha~nja (pii0 sii0 a.t.tha0)} pana vi~n~naa.na.m `okasaarii'ti vuccati. vedanaadhaatu kho, gahapati, vi~n~naa.nassa oko. vedanaadhaaturaagavinibandha~nca pana vi~n~naa.na.m `okasaarii'ti vuccati. sa~n~naadhaatu ^a^P3.0010^ea^ kho, gahapati, vi~n~naa.nassa oko. sa~n~naadhaaturaagavinibandha~nca pana vi~n~naa.na.m `okasaarii'ti vuccati. sa"nkhaaradhaatu kho, gahapati, vi~n~naa.nassa oko. sa"nkhaaradhaaturaagavinibandha~nca pana vi~n~naa.na.m `okasaarii'ti vuccati. eva.m ^a^T3.0013^ea^ kho, gahapati, okasaarii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, gahapati, anokasaarii hoti? ruupadhaatuyaa kho, gahapati, yo chando yo raago yaa nandii {nandi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} yaa ta.nhaa ye upayupaadaanaa {upaayupaadaanaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa te tathaagatassa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa {anabhaavakataa (sii0 pii0), anabhaava.mgataa (syaa0 ka.m0)} aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. tasmaa tathaagato `anokasaarii'ti vuccati. vedanaadhaatuyaa kho, gahapati... sa~n~naadhaatuyaa kho, gahapati... sa"nkhaaradhaatuyaa kho, gahapati... vi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa kho, gahapati, yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ^a^V2.0010^ea^ ta.nhaa ye upayupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa te tathaagatassa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. tasmaa tathaagato `anokasaarii'ti vuccati. eva.m kho, gahapati, anokasaarii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, gahapati, niketasaarii hoti? ruupanimittaniketavisaaravinibandhaa kho, gahapati, `niketasaarii'ti vuccati. saddanimitta...pe0... gandhanimitta... rasanimitta... pho.t.thabbanimitta... dhammanimittaniketavisaaravinibandhaa kho, gahapati, `niketasaarii'ti vuccati. eva.m kho, gahapati, niketasaarii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, gahapati, aniketasaarii hoti? ruupanimittaniketavisaaravinibandhaa kho, gahapati, tathaagatassa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. tasmaa tathaagato `aniketasaarii'ti vuccati. saddanimitta... gandhanimitta... rasanimitta... pho.t.thabbanimitta... dhammanimittaniketavisaaravinibandhaa kho, gahapati, tathaagatassa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa ^a^P3.0011^ea^ aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. tasmaa ^a^M2.0010^ea^ tathaagato `aniketasaarii'ti ^a^T3.0014^ea^ vuccati. eva.m kho, gahapati, aniketasaarii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, gahapati, gaame santhavajaato {sandhavajaato (ka0)} hoti? idha, gahapati, ekacco gihiihi {gihi (ka0)} sa.msa.t.tho viharati sahanandii sahasokii, sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakara.niiyesu attanaa tesu yoga.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, gahapati, gaame santhavajaato hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, gahapati, gaame na santhavajaato hoti? idha, gahapati, bhikkhu gihiihi {gihi (ka0)} asa.msa.t.tho viharati na sahanandii na sahasokii na sukhitesu sukhito na dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakara.niiyesu na attanaa tesu yoga.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, gahapati, gaame na santhavajaato hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, gahapati, kaamehi aritto hoti? idha, gahapati, ekacco kaamesu avigataraago ^a^V2.0011^ea^ hoti avigatachando avigatapemo avigatapipaaso avigatapari.laaho avigatata.nho. eva.m kho, gahapati, kaamehi aritto hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, gahapati, kaamehi ritto hoti? idha, gahapati, ekacco kaamesu vigataraago hoti vigatachando vigatapemo vigatapipaaso vigatapari.laaho vigatata.nho ^a^T3.0015^ea^. eva.m kho, gahapati, kaamehi ritto hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, gahapati, purakkharaano hoti? idha, gahapati, ekaccassa eva.m hoti -- `eva.mruupo siya.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, eva.mvedano siya.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, eva.msa~n~no siya.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, eva.msa"nkhaaro siya.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, eva.mvi~n~naa.no siya.m anaagatamaddhaana'nti. eva.m kho, gahapati, purakkharaano hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, gahapati, apurakkharaano hoti? idha, gahapati, ekaccassa na eva.m hoti -- `eva.mruupo siya.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, eva.mvedano siya.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, eva.msa~n~no siya.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, eva.msa"nkhaaro siya.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, eva.mvi~n~naa.no ^a^P3.0012^ea^ siya.m anaagatamaddhaana'nti. eva.m kho, gahapati, apurakkharaano hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M2.0011^ea^, gahapati, katha.m viggayha janena kattaa hoti? idha, gahapati, ekacco evaruupi.m katha.m kattaa hoti -- `na tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaasi; aha.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaami. ki.m tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanissasi? micchaapa.tipanno tvamasi; ahamasmi sammaapa.tipanno. pure vacaniiya.m pacchaa avaca; pacchaa vacaniiya.m pure avaca. sahita.m me, asahita.m te. adhici.n.na.m te viparaavatta.m. aaropito te vaado; cara vaadappamokkhaaya. niggahitosi; nibbe.thehi vaa sace pahosii'ti. eva.m kho, gahapati, katha.m viggayha janena kattaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^T3.0016^ea^, gahapati, katha.m na viggayha janena kattaa hoti? idha, gahapati, bhikkhu na evaruupi.m katha.m kattaa hoti -- `na tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaasi...pe0... nibbe.thehi vaa sace pahosii'ti. eva.m kho, gahapati, katha.m na viggayha janena kattaa hoti.
[03] ``iti ^a^V2.0012^ea^ kho, gahapati, ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa a.t.thakavaggiye maaga.n.diyapa~nhe --
[21] ``oka.m pahaaya aniketasaarii,
[27] gaame akubba.m munisanthavaani.
[26] kaamehi ritto apurakkharaano,
[22] katha.m na viggayha janena kayiraa''ti..
[03] ``imassa kho, gahapati, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attho da.t.thabbo''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa mahaakaccaano avantiisu viharati kuraraghare papaate pabbate. atha ^a^P3.0013^ea^ kho haaliddikaani gahapati yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho haaliddikaani ^a^T3.0017^ea^ gahapati aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etadavoca -- ``vuttamida.m, bhante, bhagavataa sakkapa~nhe -- `ye te sama.nabraahma.naa ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttaa, te accantani.t.thaa accantayogakkhemino accantabrahmacaarino accantapariyosaanaa se.t.thaa devamanussaana'''nti.
[03] ``imassa nu kho, bhante, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa katha.m vitthaarena attho da.t.thabbo''ti?

[03] ``ruupadhaatuyaa ^a^M2.0012^ea^ kho, gahapati, yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa ye upayupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa, tesa.m khayaa viraagaa nirodhaa caagaa pa.tinissaggaa citta.m suvimuttanti vuccati.

[03] ``vedanaadhaatuyaa kho, gahapati... sa~n~naadhaatuyaa kho, gahapati... sa"nkhaaradhaatuyaa kho, gahapati... vi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ^a^V2.0013^ea^ kho, gahapati, yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa ye upayupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa, tesa.m khayaa viraagaa nirodhaa caagaa pa.tinissaggaa citta.m suvimuttanti vuccati.

[03] ``iti kho, gahapati, ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa sakkapa~nhe -- `ye te sama.nabraahma.naa ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttaa te accantani.t.thaa accantayogakkhemino accantabrahmacaarino accantapariyosaanaa se.t.thaa devamanussaana'''nti.
[03] ``imassa kho, gahapati, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attho da.t.thabbo''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane ^a^T3.0018^ea^ anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavetha; samaahito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. ki~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati? ruupassa samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca, vedanaaya samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca ^a^P3.0014^ea^, sa~n~naaya samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca, sa"nkhaaraana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca, vi~n~naa.nassa samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca''.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, ruupassa samudayo, ko vedanaaya samudayo, ko sa~n~naaya samudayo, ko sa"nkhaaraana.m samudayo, ko vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati.

[03] ``ki~nca abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati? ruupa.m abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ruupa.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato uppajjati nandii. yaa ruupe nandii tadupaadaana.m. tassupaadaanapaccayaa bhavo; bhavapaccayaa jaati; jaatipaccayaa ^a^V2.0014^ea^ jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] ``vedana.m ^a^M2.0013^ea^ abhinandati...pe0... sa~n~na.m abhinandati... sa"nkhaare abhinandati... vi~n~naa.na.m abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa vi~n~naa.na.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato uppajjati nandii. yaa vi~n~naa.ne nandii tadupaadaana.m. tassupaadaanapaccayaa bhavo; bhavapaccayaa jaati; jaatipaccayaa...pe0... ^a^T3.0019^ea^ evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
[03] ``aya.m, bhikkhave, ruupassa samudayo; aya.m vedanaaya samudayo; aya.m sa~n~naaya samudayo; aya.m sa"nkhaaraana.m samudayo; aya.m vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo.
[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, ruupassa attha"ngamo, ko vedanaaya... ko sa~n~naaya... ko sa"nkhaaraana.m... ko vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo?
[03] idha, bhikkhave, naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati.

[03] ``ki~nca naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati? ruupa.m naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ruupa.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato yaa ruupe nandii saa nirujjhati. tassa nandiinirodhaa upaadaananirodho; upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti.

[03] ``vedana.m naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa vedana.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaa ^a^P3.0015^ea^ ti.t.thato yaa vedanaaya nandii saa nirujjhati. tassa nandiinirodhaa upaadaananirodho; upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti.

[03] ``sa~n~na.m naabhinandati...pe0... sa"nkhaare naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ^a^V2.0015^ea^ sa"nkhaare anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato yaa sa"nkhaaresu nandii saa nirujjhati. tassa nandiinirodhaa upaadaananirodho; upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti.

[03] ``vi~n~naa.na.m naabhinandati naabhivadati ^a^T3.0020^ea^ naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa vi~n~naa.na.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato yaa vi~n~naa.ne nandii saa nirujjhati. tassa nandiinirodhaa upaadaananirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti.

[03] ``aya.m ^a^M2.0014^ea^, bhikkhave, ruupassa attha"ngamo, aya.m vedanaaya attha"ngamo, aya.m sa~n~naaya attha"ngamo, aya.m sa"nkhaaraana.m attha"ngamo, aya.m vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``pa.tisallaa.ne, bhikkhave, yogamaapajjatha. pa.tisallii.no, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. ki~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati? ruupassa samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca, vedanaaya samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca, sa~n~naaya samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca, sa"nkhaaraana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca, vi~n~naa.nassa samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca''...pe0... (yathaa pa.thamasutte tathaa vitthaaretabbo.) cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``upaadaaparitassana~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami anupaadaaaparitassana~nca. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m ^a^P3.0016^ea^, bhante''ti, kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, upaadaaparitassanaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa ^a^V2.0016^ea^ akovido sappurisadhamme ^a^T3.0021^ea^ aviniito ruupa.m attato samanupassati, ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. tassa ta.m ruupa.m vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa ruupavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa ruupavipari.naamaanuparivatti vi~n~naa.na.m hoti. tassa ruupavipari.naamaanuparivattijaa paritassanaa dhammasamuppaadaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. cetaso pariyaadaanaa uttaasavaa ca hoti vighaatavaa ca apekkhavaa ca upaadaaya ca paritassati.

[03] ``vedana.m attato samanupassati, vedanaavanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa vedana.m, vedanaaya vaa attaana.m. tassa saa vedanaa vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa vedanaavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa vedanaavipari.naamaanuparivatti vi~n~naa.na.m hoti. tassa vedanaavipari.naamaanuparivattijaa paritassanaa dhammasamuppaadaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. cetaso pariyaadaanaa uttaasavaa ca hoti vighaatavaa ca apekkhavaa ca upaadaaya ca paritassati.

[03] ``sa~n~na.m ^a^M2.0015^ea^ attato samanupassati...pe0... sa"nkhaare attato samanupassati, sa"nkhaaravanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa sa"nkhaare, sa"nkhaaresu vaa attaana.m. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa vipari.namanti a~n~nathaa honti. tassa sa"nkhaaravipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa sa"nkhaaravipari.naamaanuparivatti vi~n~naa.na.m hoti. tassa sa"nkhaaravipari.naamaanuparivattijaa paritassanaa dhammasamuppaadaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. cetaso pariyaadaanaa uttaasavaa ca hoti vighaatavaa ca apekkhavaa ca upaadaaya ca paritassati.

[03] ``vi~n~naa.na.m attato ^a^T3.0022^ea^ samanupassati, vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. tassa ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa vi~n~naa.navipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa ^a^P3.0017^ea^ vi~n~naa.navipari.naamaanuparivatti vi~n~naa.na.m hoti. tassa vi~n~naa.navipari.naamaanuparivattijaa paritassanaa dhammasamuppaadaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. cetaso pariyaadaanaa uttaasavaa ca hoti vighaatavaa ca apekkhavaa ca upaadaaya ca paritassati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, upaadaaparitassanaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, anupaadaaaparitassanaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suviniito, sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito na ruupa.m attato samanupassati, na ruupavanta.m ^a^V2.0017^ea^ vaa attaana.m; na attani vaa ruupa.m, na ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. tassa ta.m ruupa.m vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa ruupavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa na ruupavipari.naamaanuparivatti vi~n~naa.na.m hoti. tassa na ruupavipari.naamaanuparivattijaa paritassanaa dhammasamuppaadaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. cetaso apariyaadaanaa na cevuttaasavaa {na ceva uttaasavaa (pii0 ka0)} hoti na ca vighaatavaa na ca apekkhavaa, anupaadaaya ca na paritassati.

[03] ``na vedana.m attato samanupassati, na vedanaavanta.m vaa attaana.m; na attani vaa vedana.m, na vedanaaya vaa attaana.m. tassa saa vedanaa vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti ^a^T3.0023^ea^. tassa vedanaavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa na vedanaavipari.naamaanuparivatti vi~n~naa.na.m hoti. tassa na vedanaavipari.naamaanuparivattijaa paritassanaa dhammasamuppaadaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti ^a^M2.0016^ea^. cetaso apariyaadaanaa na cevuttaasavaa hoti na ca vighaatavaa na ca apekkhavaa, anupaadaaya ca na paritassati.

[03] ``na sa~n~na.m...pe0... na sa"nkhaare attato samanupassati, na sa"nkhaaravanta.m vaa attaana.m; na attani vaa sa"nkhaare, na sa"nkhaaresu vaa attaana.m. tassa te sa"nkhaaraa vipari.namanti a~n~nathaa honti. tassa sa"nkhaaravipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa na sa"nkhaaravipari.naamaanuparivatti vi~n~naa.na.m hoti. tassa na sa"nkhaaravipari.naamaanuparivattijaa ^a^P3.0018^ea^ paritassanaa dhammasamuppaadaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. cetaso apariyaadaanaa na cevuttaasavaa hoti na ca vighaatavaa na ca apekkhavaa, anupaadaaya ca na paritassati.

[03] ``na vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, na vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m...pe0... tassa ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa vi~n~naa.navipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa na vi~n~naa.navipari.naamaanuparivatti vi~n~naa.na.m hoti. tassa na vi~n~naa.navipari.naamaanuparivattijaa paritassanaa dhammasamuppaadaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. cetaso apariyaadaanaa na cevuttaasavaa hoti na ca vighaatavaa na ca apekkhavaa, anupaadaaya ca na paritassati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, anupaadaa aparitassana.m hotii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0024^ea^ ^a^V2.0018^ea^. ``upaadaaparitassana~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami anupaadaaaparitassana~nca. ta.m su.naatha...pe0... katha~nca, bhikkhave, upaadaaparitassanaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ruupa.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati. tassa ta.m ruupa.m vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa ruupavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. vedana.m eta.m mama...pe0... sa~n~na.m eta.m mama... sa"nkhaare eta.m mama... vi~n~naa.na.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati. tassa ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa vi~n~naa.navipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, upaadaaparitassanaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, anupaadaaaparitassanaa hoti? idha ^a^P3.0019^ea^, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. tassa ta.m ruupa.m vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa ^a^M2.0017^ea^ ruupavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa nuppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. vedana.m neta.m mama... sa~n~na.m neta.m mama... sa"nkhaare neta.m mama... vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. tassa ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m vipari.namati a~n~nathaa hoti. tassa vi~n~naa.navipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa nuppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa ^a^T3.0025^ea^. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, anupaadaaaparitassanaa hotii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m atiitaanaagata.m; ko pana vaado paccuppannassa! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitasmi.m ruupasmi.m anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m ruupa.m naabhinandati; paccuppannassa ruupassa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti. vedanaa aniccaa...pe0... ^a^V2.0019^ea^ sa~n~naa aniccaa... sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa atiitaanaagataa; ko pana vaado paccuppannaana.m! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitesu sa"nkhaaresu anapekkho hoti; anaagate sa"nkhaare naabhinandati; paccuppannaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti. vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m atiitaanaagata.m; ko pana vaado paccuppannassa! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitasmi.m vi~n~naa.nasmi.m anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m vi~n~naa.na.m naabhinandati; paccuppannassa vi~n~naa.nassa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hotii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m atiitaanaagata.m; ko pana vaado ^a^P3.0020^ea^ paccuppannassa! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitasmi.m ruupasmi.m anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m ruupa.m naabhinandati; paccuppannassa ruupassa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti. vedanaa dukkhaa... sa~n~naa dukkhaa... sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaa... vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^T3.0026^ea^ dukkha.m atiitaanaagata.m; ko pana vaado paccuppannassa! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitasmi.m vi~n~naa.nasmi.m anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m vi~n~naa.na.m naabhinandati; paccuppannassa vi~n~naa.nassa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hotii''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0018^ea^. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anattaa atiitaanaagata.m; ko pana vaado paccuppannassa! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitasmi.m ruupasmi.m anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m ruupa.m naabhinandati; paccuppannassa ruupassa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno ^a^V2.0020^ea^ hoti. vedanaa anattaa... sa~n~naa anattaa... sa"nkhaaraa anattaa... vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa atiitaanaagata.m; ko pana vaado paccuppannassa! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitasmi.m vi~n~naa.nasmi.m anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m vi~n~naa.na.m naabhinandati; paccuppannassa vi~n~naa.nassa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hotii''ti. ekaadasama.m.
[06] nakulapituvaggo pa.thamo.

[21] nakulapitaa devadahaa, dvepi haaliddikaani ca.
