[03] 12^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0027^ea^ me suta.m -- saavatthiya.m. tatra kho...pe0... ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m, vedanaa aniccaa, sa~n~naa aniccaa, sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanaayapi nibbindati, sa~n~naayapi nibbindati, sa"nkhaaresupi nibbindati, vi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati ^a^V2.0021^ea^; viraagaa vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m, vedanaa dukkhaa, sa~n~naa dukkhaa, sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaa, vi~n~naa.na.m dukkha.m. eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0019^ea^. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anattaa, vedanaa anattaa, sa~n~naa anattaa, sa"nkhaaraa anattaa, vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanaayapi nibbindati, sa~n~naayapi nibbindati, sa"nkhaaresupi nibbindati, vi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati ^a^T3.0028^ea^, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^P3.0022^ea^. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m; ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa; yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. vedanaa aniccaa. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m; ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa; yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. sa~n~naa aniccaa...pe0... sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa... vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m; ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa; yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya ^a^V2.0022^ea^ da.t.thabba.m. eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m. ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa; yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. vedanaa dukkhaa... sa~n~naa dukkhaa... sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaa... vi~n~naa.na.m dukkha.m. ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa; yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anattaa. yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama ^a^T3.0029^ea^ ^a^P3.0023^ea^, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. vedanaa anattaa... sa~n~naa anattaa... sa"nkhaaraa anattaa... vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa ^a^M2.0020^ea^. yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m. yopi hetu, yopi paccayo ruupassa uppaadaaya, sopi anicco. aniccasambhuuta.m, bhikkhave, ruupa.m kuto nicca.m bhavissati! vedanaa aniccaa. yopi hetu, yopi paccayo vedanaaya uppaadaaya, sopi anicco. aniccasambhuutaa ^a^V2.0023^ea^, bhikkhave, vedanaa kuto niccaa bhavissati! sa~n~naa aniccaa... sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa. yopi hetu yopi paccayo sa"nkhaaraana.m uppaadaaya, sopi anicco. aniccasambhuutaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa kuto niccaa bhavissanti! vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m. yopi hetu yopi paccayo vi~n~naa.nassa uppaadaaya, sopi anicco. aniccasambhuuta.m, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.m kuto nicca.m bhavissati! eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m. yopi hetu yopi paccayo ruupassa uppaadaaya, sopi dukkho. dukkhasambhuuta.m, bhikkhave, ruupa.m kuto sukha.m bhavissati! vedanaa dukkhaa... sa~n~naa dukkhaa... sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaa... vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^P3.0024^ea^ dukkha.m. yopi hetu yopi paccayo vi~n~naa.nassa uppaadaaya, sopi dukkho. dukkhasambhuuta.m, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.m kuto sukha.m bhavissati! eva.m passa.m...pe0... ^a^T3.0030^ea^ naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anattaa. yopi hetu yopi paccayo ruupassa uppaadaaya, sopi anattaa. anattasambhuuta.m, bhikkhave, ruupa.m kuto attaa bhavissati! vedanaa anattaa... sa~n~naa anattaa... sa"nkhaaraa anattaa... vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa. yopi hetu yopi paccayo vi~n~naa.nassa uppaadaaya, sopi anattaa. anattasambhuuta.m, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.m kuto attaa bhavissati! eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^V2.0024^ea^ ^a^M2.0021^ea^... aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```nirodho nirodho'ti, bhante, vuccati. katamesaana.m kho, bhante, dhammaana.m nirodho {nirodhaa (sii0 pii0)} `nirodho'ti vuccatii''ti? ``ruupa.m kho, aananda, anicca.m sa"nkhata.m pa.ticcasamuppanna.m khayadhamma.m vayadhamma.m viraagadhamma.m nirodhadhamma.m. tassa nirodho {nirodhaa (sii0 pii0)} `nirodho'ti vuccati. vedanaa aniccaa sa"nkhataa pa.ticcasamuppannaa khayadhammaa vayadhammaa viraagadhammaa nirodhadhammaa. tassaa nirodho `nirodho'ti vuccati. sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa sa"nkhataa pa.ticcasamuppannaa ^a^P3.0025^ea^ khayadhammaa vayadhammaa viraagadhammaa nirodhadhammaa. tesa.m nirodho `nirodho'ti vuccati. vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m sa"nkhata.m pa.ticcasamuppanna.m khayadhamma.m vayadhamma.m viraagadhamma.m nirodhadhamma.m. tassa ^a^T3.0031^ea^ nirodho `nirodho'ti vuccati. imesa.m kho, aananda, dhammaana.m nirodho `nirodho'ti vuccatii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] aniccavaggo dutiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] anicca.m dukkha.m anattaa, yadaniccaapare tayo.
[22] hetunaapi tayo vuttaa, aanandena ca te dasaati..

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^T3.0032^ea^... tatra kho ^a^V2.0025^ea^... ``bhaara~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami bhaarahaara~nca bhaaraadaana~nca bhaaranikkhepana~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katamo ca, bhikkhave, bhaaro? pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa tissa vacaniiya.m. katame pa~nca? ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho; aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhaaro''.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, bhaarahaaro ^a^M2.0022^ea^? puggalo tissa vacaniiya.m. yvaaya.m aayasmaa eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto; aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhaarahaaro.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^P3.0026^ea^, bhikkhave, bhaaraadaana.m? yaaya.m ta.nhaa ponobhavikaa {ponobbhavikaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} nandiiraagasahagataa {nandiraagasahagataa (sabbattha)} tatratatraabhinandinii, seyyathida.m -- kaamata.nhaa, bhavata.nhaa, vibhavata.nhaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhaaraadaana.m.
[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, bhaaranikkhepana.m? yo tassaayeva ta.nhaaya asesaviraaganirodho caago pa.tinissaggo mutti anaalayo. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhaaranikkhepana''nti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana {vatvaa (sii0) evamiidisesu .thaanesu} sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``bhaaraa have pa~ncakkhandhaa, bhaarahaaro ca puggalo.
[22] bhaaraadaana.m dukha.m loke, bhaaranikkhepana.m sukha.m..
[21] ``nikkhipitvaa ^a^T3.0033^ea^ garu.m bhaara.m, a~n~na.m bhaara.m anaadiya.
[22] samuula.m ta.nhamabbuyha {ta.nhamabbhuyha (pii0 ka0)}, nicchaato parinibbuto''ti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``pari~n~neyye ca, bhikkhave, dhamme desessaami pari~n~na~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katame ca, bhikkhave, pari~n~neyyaa dhammaa? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, pari~n~neyyo dhammo, vedanaa pari~n~neyyo dhammo, sa~n~naa pari~n~neyyo dhammo, sa"nkhaaraa pari~n~neyyo dhammo, vi~n~naa.na.m pari~n~neyyo dhammo ^a^V2.0026^ea^. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, pari~n~neyyaa dhammaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, pari~n~naa? yo, bhikkhave, raagakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pari~n~naa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ruupa.m ^a^P3.0027^ea^, bhikkhave, anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya; vedana.m anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya; sa~n~na.m anabhijaana.m... sa"nkhaare anabhijaana.m ^a^M2.0023^ea^ aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya; vi~n~naa.na.m anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. ruupa~nca kho, bhikkhave, abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya; vedana.m abhijaana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaayaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``yo, bhikkhave, ruupasmi.m chandaraago ta.m ^a^T3.0034^ea^ pajahatha. eva.m ta.m ruupa.m pahiina.m bhavissati ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.mkata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma.m. yo vedanaaya chandaraago ta.m pajahatha. eva.m saa vedanaa pahiinaa bhavissati ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. yo sa~n~naaya chandaraago ta.m pajahatha. eva.m saa sa~n~naa pahiinaa bhavissati ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. yo sa"nkhaaresu chandaraago ta.m pajahatha. eva.m te sa"nkhaaraa pahiinaa bhavissanti ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. yo vi~n~naa.nasmi.m chandaraago ta.m pajahatha. eva.m ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m pahiina.m bhavissati ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.mkata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0027^ea^. ``pubbeva {pubbe (pii0 ka0)} me, bhikkhave, sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva {bodhisattassa (pii0 ka0)} sato etadahosi -- `ko nu kho ruupassa assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko vedanaaya assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko sa~n~naaya assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko sa"nkhaaraana.m assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko vi~n~naa.nassa assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na'nti? tassa ^a^P3.0028^ea^ mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `ya.m kho ruupa.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m ruupassa assaado. ya.m ruupa.m anicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, aya.m ruupassa aadiinavo. yo ruupasmi.m chandaraagavinayo ^a^T3.0035^ea^ chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m ruupassa nissara.na.m. ya.m vedana.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m ^a^M2.0024^ea^, aya.m vedanaaya assaado {yaa (ka0)}. ya.m vedanaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa, aya.m vedanaaya aadiinavo. yo vedanaaya chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m vedanaaya nissara.na.m. ya.m sa~n~na.m pa.ticca uppajjati...pe0... ya.m sa"nkhaare pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m sa"nkhaaraana.m assaado. ya.m {ye (sii0 ka0)} sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa, aya.m sa"nkhaaraana.m aadiinavo. yo sa"nkhaaresu chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m sa"nkhaaraana.m nissara.na.m. ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m vi~n~naa.nassa assaado. ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, aya.m vi~n~naa.nassa aadiinavo. yo vi~n~naa.nasmi.m chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m vi~n~naa.nassa nissara.na.m'''.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~ncaaha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m eva.m assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~naasi.m, neva taavaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddhoti pacca~n~naasi.m {abhisambuddho (sii0)}. yato ca khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m eva.m assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m; athaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake ^a^T3.0036^ea^ sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddhoti pacca~n~naasi.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa me vimutti {cetovimutti (sii0 pii0 ka0)}; ayamantimaa jaati; natthi daani punabbhavo'''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0028^ea^ ^a^P3.0029^ea^. ``ruupassaaha.m, bhikkhave, assaadapariyesana.m acari.m. yo ruupassa assaado tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa ruupassa assaado pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. ruupassaaha.m, bhikkhave, aadiinavapariyesana.m acari.m. yo ruupassa aadiinavo tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa ruupassa aadiinavo pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. ruupassaaha.m, bhikkhave, nissara.napariyesana.m acari.m. ya.m ruupassa nissara.na.m tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa ruupassa nissara.na.m pa~n~naaya me ta.m sudi.t.tha.m. vedanaayaaha.m, bhikkhave... sa~n~naayaaha.m, bhikkhave... sa"nkhaaraanaaha.m ^a^M2.0025^ea^, bhikkhave... vi~n~naa.nassaaha.m, bhikkhave, assaadapariyesana.m acari.m. yo vi~n~naa.nassa assaado tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa vi~n~naa.nassa assaado pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. vi~n~naa.nassaaha.m, bhikkhave, aadiinavapariyesana.m acari.m. yo vi~n~naa.nassa aadiinavo tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa vi~n~naa.nassa aadiinavo pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. vi~n~naa.nassaaha.m, bhikkhave, nissara.napariyesana.m acari.m. ya.m vi~n~naa.nassa nissara.na.m tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa vi~n~naa.nassa nissara.na.m pa~n~naaya me ta.m sudi.t.tha.m. yaavakiiva~ncaaha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m assaada~nca ^a^T3.0037^ea^ assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~naasi.m...pe0... abbha~n~naasi.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa me vimutti {cetovimutti (sii0 pii0 ka0)}; ayamantimaa jaati; natthi daani punabbhavo'''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``no ceda.m, bhikkhave, ruupassa assaado abhavissa nayida.m ^a^P3.0030^ea^ sattaa ruupasmi.m saarajjeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ruupassa assaado, tasmaa sattaa ruupasmi.m saarajjanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, ruupassa aadiinavo abhavissa nayida.m sattaa ruupasmi.m nibbindeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ruupassa aadiinavo, tasmaa sattaa ruupasmi.m ^a^V2.0029^ea^ nibbindanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, ruupassa nissara.na.m abhavissa nayida.m sattaa ruupasmaa nissareyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ruupassa nissara.na.m, tasmaa sattaa ruupasmaa nissaranti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, vedanaaya...pe0... no ceda.m, bhikkhave, sa~n~naaya... no ceda.m, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraana.m nissara.na.m abhavissa ^a^T3.0038^ea^, nayida.m sattaa sa"nkhaarehi nissareyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi sa"nkhaaraana.m nissara.na.m, tasmaa sattaa sa"nkhaarehi nissaranti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.nassa assaado abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa vi~n~naa.nasmi.m saarajjeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi vi~n~naa.nassa assaado, tasmaa sattaa vi~n~naa.nasmi.m saarajjanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.nassa aadiinavo abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa vi~n~naa.nasmi.m nibbindeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi vi~n~naa.nassa aadiinavo, tasmaa sattaa vi~n~naa.nasmi.m nibbindanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.nassa nissara.na.m abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa vi~n~naa.nasmaa nissareyyu.m ^a^M2.0026^ea^. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi vi~n~naa.nassa nissara.na.m, tasmaa sattaa vi~n~naa.nasmaa nissaranti.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca, bhikkhave, sattaa imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~na.msu {naabbha~n~ni.msu (sii0)}; neva taava, bhikkhave, sattaa sadevakaa lokaa samaarakaa sabrahmakaa ^a^P3.0031^ea^ sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya nissa.taa visa.myuttaa vippamuttaa vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa vihari.msu. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, sattaa imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~na.msu; atha, bhikkhave, sattaa sadevakaa lokaa samaarakaa sabrahmakaa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya ^a^T3.0039^ea^ nissa.taa visa.myuttaa vippamuttaa vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharanti''. sattama.m.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0030^ea^. ``yo, bhikkhave, ruupa.m abhinandati, dukkha.m so abhinandati. yo dukkha.m abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmaati vadaami. yo vedana.m abhinandati... yo sa~n~na.m abhinandati... yo sa"nkhaare abhinandati... yo vi~n~naa.na.m abhinandati, dukkha.m so abhinandati. yo dukkha.m abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmaati vadaami. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, ruupa.m naabhinandati, dukkha.m so naabhinandati. yo dukkha.m naabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmaati vadaami. yo vedana.m naabhinandati... yo sa~n~na.m naabhinandati... yo sa"nkhaare naabhinandati... yo vi~n~naa.na.m naabhinandati, dukkha.m so naabhinandati. yo dukkha.m naabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmaati vadaamii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``yo, bhikkhave, ruupassa uppaado .thiti abhinibbatti paatubhaavo ^a^P3.0032^ea^, dukkhasseso uppaado rogaana.m .thiti jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo. yo vedanaaya...pe0... yo sa~n~naaya...pe0... yo sa"nkhaaraana.m...pe0... yo vi~n~naa.nassa ^a^M2.0027^ea^ uppaado .thiti abhinibbatti paatubhaavo, dukkhasseso uppaado rogaana.m .thiti jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, ruupassa nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, dukkhasseso nirodho rogaana.m vuupasamo jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo. yo vedanaaya ^a^T3.0040^ea^ ...pe0... yo sa~n~naaya... yo sa"nkhaaraana.m... yo vi~n~naa.nassa nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, dukkhasseso nirodho rogaana.m vuupasamo jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo''ti. navama.m.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``agha~nca, bhikkhave, desessaami aghamuula~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katama~nca ^a^V2.0031^ea^ bhikkhave agha.m? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, agha.m, vedanaa agha.m, sa~n~naa agha.m, sa"nkhaaraa agha.m, vi~n~naa.na.m agha.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, agha.m. katama~nca, bhikkhave, aghamuula.m? yaaya.m ta.nhaa ponobhavikaa nandiiraagasahagataa {nandiraagasahagataa (sabbattha)} tatratatraabhinandinii; seyyathida.m -- kaamata.nhaa, bhavata.nhaa, vibhavata.nhaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, aghamuula''nti. dasama.m.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``pabha"ngu~nca, bhikkhave, desessaami appabha"ngu~nca. ta.m su.naatha. ki~nca, bhikkhave, pabha"ngu, ki.m appabha"ngu? ruupa.m ^a^P3.0033^ea^, bhikkhave, pabha"ngu. yo tassa nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, ida.m appabha"ngu. vedanaa pabha"ngu. yo tassaa nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, ida.m appabha"ngu. sa~n~naa pabha"ngu... sa"nkhaaraa pabha"ngu. yo tesa.m nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, ida.m appabha"ngu. vi~n~naa.na.m pabha"ngu. yo tassa nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, ida.m appabha"nguu''ti. ekaadasama.m.
[06] bhaaravaggo tatiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] bhaara.m ^a^T3.0041^ea^ pari~n~na.m abhijaana.m, chandaraaga.m catutthaka.m.
[27] assaadaa ca tayo vuttaa, abhinandanama.t.thama.m.
[22] uppaada.m aghamuula~nca, ekaadasamo pabha"nguuti..

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0042^ea^ ^a^M2.0028^ea^. ``ya.m, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya ^a^V2.0032^ea^ sukhaaya bhavissati. ki~nca, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. vedanaa na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha. saa vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. sa~n~naa na tumhaaka.m... sa"nkhaaraa ^a^P3.0034^ea^ na tumhaaka.m, te pajahatha. te vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissanti. vi~n~naa.na.m na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ya.m imasmi.m jetavane ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m ta.m jano hareyya vaa .daheyya vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa kareyya. api nu tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `amhe jano harati vaa .dahati vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karotii'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``na hi no eta.m, bhante, attaa vaa attaniya.m vaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, ruupa.m na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. vedanaa na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha. saa vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. sa~n~naa na tumhaaka.m... sa"nkhaaraa na tumhaaka.m... vi~n~naa.na.m na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0043^ea^. ``ya.m, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. ki~nca, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. vedanaa na tumhaaka.m... sa~n~naa na tumhaaka.m... sa"nkhaaraa na tumhaaka.m... vi~n~naa.na.m na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. ya.m, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha ^a^P3.0035^ea^ kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^M2.0029^ea^ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m ^a^V2.0033^ea^ etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu; yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho, appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti. ``ya.m kho, bhikkhu, anuseti, tena sa"nkha.m gacchati; ya.m naanuseti, na tena sa"nkha.m gacchatii''ti. ``a~n~naata.m, bhagavaa; a~n~naata.m, sugataa''ti.

[03] ``yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, bhikkhu, mayaa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaasii''ti? ``ruupa.m ce, bhante, anuseti tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. vedana.m ce anuseti tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. sa~n~na.m ce anuseti tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. sa"nkhaare ce anuseti tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. vi~n~naa.na.m ce anuseti tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. ruupa.m ce, bhante, naanuseti na tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. vedana.m ce... sa~n~na.m ce... sa"nkhaare ce... vi~n~naa.na.m ce naanuseti ^a^T3.0044^ea^ na tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. imassa khvaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaamii''ti.

[01] ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhu! saadhu kho tva.m, bhikkhu, mayaa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaasi. ruupa.m ce, bhikkhu, anuseti tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. vedana.m ce... sa~n~na.m ce... sa"nkhaare ce... vi~n~naa.na.m ce anuseti tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. ruupa.m ce, bhikkhu, naanuseti na tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. vedana.m ce... sa~n~na.m ce... sa"nkhaare ce... vi~n~naa.na.m ce naanuseti na tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayaa sa.mkhittena, bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attho da.t.thabbo''ti.
[03] atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa ^a^P3.0036^ea^ anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho so bhikkhu eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahata.m ahosiiti. tatiya.m.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0034^ea^. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante ^a^T3.0045^ea^, bhagavaa ^a^M2.0030^ea^ sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti. ``ya.m kho, bhikkhu, anuseti ta.m anumiiyati; ya.m anumiiyati tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. ya.m naanuseti na ta.m anumiiyati; ya.m naanumiiyati na tena sa"nkha.m gacchatii''ti. ``a~n~naata.m, bhagavaa; a~n~naata.m, sugataa''ti.

[03] ``yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, bhikkhu, mayaa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaasii''ti? ``ruupa.m ce, bhante, anuseti ta.m anumiiyati; ya.m anumiiyati tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. vedana.m ce anuseti... sa~n~na.m ce anuseti... sa"nkhaare ce anuseti... vi~n~naa.na.m ce anuseti ta.m anumiiyati; ya.m anumiiyati tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. ruupa.m ce, bhante, naanuseti na ta.m anumiiyati; ya.m naanumiiyati ^a^P3.0037^ea^ na tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. vedana.m ce naanuseti... sa~n~na.m ce naanuseti... sa"nkhaare ce naanuseti... vi~n~naa.na.m ce naanuseti na ta.m anumiiyati; ya.m naanumiiyati na tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. imassa khvaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaamii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhu! saadhu kho tva.m, bhikkhu, mayaa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaasi. ruupa.m ce, bhikkhu, anuseti ta.m anumiiyati; ya.m anumiiyati tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. vedana.m ce, bhikkhu... sa~n~na.m ce, bhikkhu... sa"nkhaare ce, bhikkhu... vi~n~naa.na.m ce, bhikkhu, anuseti ta.m anumiiyati; ya.m anumiiyati tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. ruupa.m ce, bhikkhu, naanuseti na ta.m ^a^T3.0046^ea^ anumiiyati; ya.m naanumiiyati na tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. vedana.m ce naanuseti... sa~n~na.m ce naanuseti... sa"nkhaare ce naanuseti... vi~n~naa.na.m ce naanuseti na ta.m anumiiyati; ya.m naanumiiyati na tena sa"nkha.m gacchati. imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayaa ^a^V2.0035^ea^ sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attho da.t.thabbo''ti...pe0... a~n~nataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahata.m ahosiiti. catuttha.m.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m aananda.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``sace ^a^M2.0031^ea^ ta.m, aananda, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `katamesa.m, aavuso aananda, dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa {.thitaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayatii'ti? eva.m pu.t.tho tva.m, aananda, kinti byaakareyyaasii''ti? ``sace ^a^P3.0038^ea^ ma.m, bhante, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `katamesa.m, aavuso aananda, dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayatii'ti? eva.m pu.t.thoha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya.m -- `ruupassa kho, aavuso, uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayati. vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaraana.m... vi~n~naa.nassa uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayati. imesa.m kho, aavuso, dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa ^a^T3.0047^ea^ a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayatii'ti. eva.m pu.t.thoha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya''nti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, aananda! ruupassa kho, aananda, uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayati. vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaraana.m... vi~n~naa.nassa uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayati. imesa.m kho, aananda, dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayatiiti. eva.m pu.t.tho tva.m, aananda, eva.m byaakareyyaasii''ti. pa~ncama.m.
[03] 38^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0036^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m aananda.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``sace ta.m, aananda, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `katamesa.m, aavuso aananda, dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayittha, vayo pa~n~naayittha, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayittha? katamesa.m dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayissati, vayo pa~n~naayissati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayissati? katamesa.m dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayatii'ti? eva.m pu.t.tho tva.m, aananda, kinti byaakareyyaasii''ti? ``sace ma.m, bhante, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `katamesa.m, aavuso aananda, dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayittha, vayo pa~n~naayittha, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayittha? katamesa.m dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayissati ^a^M2.0032^ea^, vayo pa~n~naayissati, .thitassa ^a^P3.0039^ea^ a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayissati ^a^T3.0048^ea^? katamesa.m dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayatii'ti? eva.m pu.t.thoha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya.m -- `ya.m kho, aavuso, ruupa.m atiita.m niruddha.m vipari.nata.m; tassa uppaado pa~n~naayittha, vayo pa~n~naayittha, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayittha. yaa vedanaa atiitaa niruddhaa vipari.nataa; tassaa uppaado pa~n~naayittha, vayo pa~n~naayittha, .thitaaya a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayittha. yaa sa~n~naa... ye sa"nkhaaraa atiitaa niruddhaa vipari.nataa; tesa.m uppaado pa~n~naayittha, vayo pa~n~naayittha, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayittha. ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m atiita.m niruddha.m vipari.nata.m; tassa uppaado pa~n~naayittha, vayo pa~n~naayittha, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayittha. imesa.m kho, aavuso, dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayittha, vayo pa~n~naayittha, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayittha'''.

[01] ``ya.m kho, aavuso, ruupa.m ajaata.m apaatubhuuta.m; tassa uppaado pa~n~naayissati, vayo pa~n~naayissati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayissati. yaa vedanaa ajaataa apaatubhuutaa; tassaa uppaado pa~n~naayissati, vayo pa~n~naayissati, .thitaaya a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayissati. yaa sa~n~naa...pe0... ye sa"nkhaaraa ajaataa apaatubhuutaa; tesa.m uppaado pa~n~naayissati, vayo pa~n~naayissati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayissati. ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m ajaata.m apaatubhuuta.m; tassa uppaado pa~n~naayissati, vayo pa~n~naayissati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayissati. imesa.m kho, aavuso ^a^T3.0049^ea^ ^a^V2.0037^ea^, dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayissati, vayo pa~n~naayissati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayissati.

[03] ``ya.m kho, aavuso, ruupa.m jaata.m paatubhuuta.m; tassa uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayati. yaa vedanaa jaataa paatubhuutaa...pe0... yaa sa~n~naa... ye sa"nkhaaraa jaataa paatubhuutaa; tesa.m uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayati. ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m jaata.m paatubhuuta.m tassa uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayati. imesa.m kho, aavuso, dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayatii'ti. eva.m pu.t.thoha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya''nti.

[03] ``saadhu ^a^M2.0033^ea^, saadhu, aananda! ya.m kho, aananda, ruupa.m atiita.m niruddha.m vipari.nata.m; tassa uppaado pa~n~naayittha, vayo pa~n~naayittha, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayittha. yaa vedanaa ^a^P3.0040^ea^... yaa sa~n~naa... ye sa"nkhaaraa... ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m atiita.m niruddha.m vipari.nata.m; tassa uppaado pa~n~naayittha, vayo pa~n~naayittha, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayittha. imesa.m kho, aananda, dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayittha, vayo pa~n~naayittha, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayittha.

[03] ``ya.m kho, aananda, ruupa.m ajaata.m apaatubhuuta.m; tassa uppaado pa~n~naayissati, vayo pa~n~naayissati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayissati. yaa vedanaa... yaa sa~n~naa... ye sa"nkhaaraa... ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m ajaata.m apaatubhuuta.m; tassa uppaado pa~n~naayissati ^a^T3.0050^ea^, vayo pa~n~naayissati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayissati. imesa.m kho, aananda, dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayissati, vayo pa~n~naayissati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayissati.

[03] ``ya.m kho, aananda, ruupa.m jaata.m paatubhuuta.m; tassa uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayati. yaa vedanaa jaataa paatubhuutaa... yaa sa~n~naa... ye sa"nkhaaraa... ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m jaata.m paatubhuuta.m; tassa uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayati. imesa.m kho, aananda, dhammaana.m uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayatiiti. eva.m pu.t.tho tva.m, aananda, eva.m byaakareyyaasii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0038^ea^. ``dhammaanudhammappa.tipannassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ayamanudhammo hoti ya.m ruupe nibbidaabahulo {nibbidaabahula.m (pii0 ka0)} vihareyya, vedanaaya nibbidaabahulo vihareyya, sa~n~naa nibbidaabahulo vihareyya, sa"nkhaaresu nibbidaabahulo vihareyya, vi~n~naa.ne nibbidaabahulo vihareyya. yo ruupe nibbidaabahulo viharanto, vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu nibbidaabahulo viharanto, vi~n~naa.ne nibbidaabahulo viharanto ruupa.m parijaanaati, vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m parijaanaati, so ruupa.m parijaana.m, vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m parijaana.m parimuccati ruupamhaa, parimuccati vedanaa ^a^P3.0041^ea^, parimuccati sa~n~naaya ^a^M2.0034^ea^, parimuccati sa"nkhaarehi, parimuccati vi~n~naa.namhaa, parimuccati ^a^T3.0051^ea^ jaatiyaa jaraamara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaamii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``dhammaanudhammappa.tipannassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ayamanudhammo hoti ya.m ruupe aniccaanupassii vihareyya...pe0... parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaamii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``dhammaanudhammappa.tipannassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ayamanudhammo hoti ya.m ruupe dukkhaanupassii vihareyya...pe0... ^a^T3.0052^ea^ parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaamii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0039^ea^. ``dhammaanudhammappa.tipannassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ayamanudhammo hoti ya.m ruupe anattaanupassii vihareyya, vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne anattaanupassii vihareyya. yo ruupe anattaanupassii viharanto...pe0... ruupa.m parijaanaati, vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m parijaanaati, so ruupa.m parijaana.m, vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m parijaana.m parimuccati ruupamhaa, parimuccati vedanaaya, parimuccati sa~n~naaya, parimuccati sa"nkhaarehi, parimuccati vi~n~naa.namhaa, parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraamara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaamii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] natumhaaka.mvaggo catuttho.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] natumhaakena ^a^P3.0042^ea^ dve vuttaa, bhikkhuuhi apare duve.
[22] aanandena ca dve vuttaa, anudhammehi dve dukaati..

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0053^ea^ ^a^M2.0035^ea^. ``attadiipaa, bhikkhave, viharatha attasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa, dhammadiipaa dhammasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa. attadiipaana.m, bhikkhave, viharata.m attasara.naana.m ana~n~nasara.naana.m, dhammadiipaana.m dhammasara.naana.m ana~n~nasara.naana.m yoni upaparikkhitabbaa. ki.mjaatikaa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa, ki.mpahotikaa''ti?

[03] ``ki.mjaatikaa ^a^V2.0040^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa, ki.mpahotikaa? idha, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito, ruupa.m attato samanupassati, ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. tassa ta.m ruupa.m vipari.namati, a~n~nathaa ca hoti. tassa ruupavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. vedana.m attato samanupassati, vedanaavanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa vedana.m, vedanaaya vaa attaana.m. tassa saa vedanaa vipari.namati, a~n~nathaa ca hoti. tassa vedanaavipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. sa~n~na.m attato samanupassati... sa"nkhaare attato samanupassati... vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. tassa ^a^P3.0043^ea^ ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m vipari.namati, a~n~nathaa ca hoti ^a^T3.0054^ea^. tassa vi~n~naa.navipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa.

[01] ``ruupassa tveva, bhikkhave, aniccata.m viditvaa vipari.naama.m viraaga.m nirodha.m {vipari.naama viraaga nirodha.m (sii0)}, pubbe ceva ruupa.m etarahi ca sabba.m ruupa.m anicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhammanti, evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato ye sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa te pahiiyanti. tesa.m pahaanaa na paritassati, aparitassa.m sukha.m viharati, sukhavihaarii bhikkhu `tada"nganibbuto'ti vuccati. vedanaaya tveva, bhikkhave, aniccata.m viditvaa vipari.naama.m viraaga.m nirodha.m, pubbe ceva vedanaa etarahi ca sabbaa vedanaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaati, evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m ^a^M2.0036^ea^ sammappa~n~naaya passato ye sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa te pahiiyanti. tesa.m pahaanaa na paritassati, aparitassa.m sukha.m viharati, sukhavihaarii bhikkhu `tada"nganibbuto'ti vuccati. sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaraana.m tveva, bhikkhave, aniccata.m viditvaa vipari.naama.m viraaga.m nirodha.m, pubbe ceva sa"nkhaaraa etarahi ca sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaati, evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato ye sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa te pahiiyanti. tesa.m pahaanaa na paritassati, aparitassa.m sukha.m viharati, sukhavihaarii bhikkhu `tada"nganibbuto'ti vuccati. vi~n~naa.nassa tveva, bhikkhave, aniccata.m viditvaa vipari.naama.m viraaga.m nirodha.m, pubbe ceva vi~n~naa.na.m etarahi ca sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhammanti, evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya ^a^T3.0055^ea^ passato ye sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa ^a^V2.0041^ea^ te pahiiyanti. tesa.m pahaanaa na paritassati, aparitassa.m sukha.m viharati, sukhavihaarii bhikkhu `tada"nganibbuto'ti vuccatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``sakkaayasamudayagaamini~nca ^a^P3.0044^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, pa.tipada.m desessaami, sakkaayanirodhagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m. ta.m su.naatha. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sakkaayasamudayagaaminii pa.tipadaa? idha, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito, ruupa.m attato samanupassati, ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. vedana.m attato... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `sakkaayasamudayagaaminii pa.tipadaa, sakkaayasamudayagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti. iti hida.m, bhikkhave, vuccati `dukkhasamudayagaaminii samanupassanaa'ti. ayamevettha attho''.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa? idha, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suviniito, sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito, na ruupa.m attato samanupassati, na ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m ^a^M2.0037^ea^; na attani vaa ruupa.m, na ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. na vedana.m ^a^T3.0056^ea^ attato... na sa~n~na.m... na sa"nkhaare... na vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, na vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m; na attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, na vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa, sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti. iti hida.m, bhikkhave, vuccati `dukkhanirodhagaaminii samanupassanaa'ti. ayamevettha attho''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m ^a^P3.0045^ea^; ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa ^a^V2.0042^ea^; yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato citta.m virajjati vimuccati anupaadaaya aasavehi. vedanaa aniccaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m; ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa; yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato citta.m virajjati vimuccati anupaadaaya aasavehi. ruupadhaatuyaa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno citta.m viratta.m vimutta.m hoti anupaadaaya aasavehi, vedanaadhaatuyaa...pe0... sa~n~naadhaatuyaa... sa"nkhaaradhaatuyaa... vi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno citta.m viratta.m vimutta.m hoti anupaadaaya aasavehi. vimuttattaa .thita.m. .thitattaa santusita.m {santussita.m (ka0 sii0 pii0 ka0)}. santusitattaa na paritassati. aparitassa.m paccatta~n~neva parinibbaayati. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m ^a^T3.0057^ea^ kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m; ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa; yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. vedanaa aniccaa... sa~n~naa aniccaa... sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa... vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m; ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa; yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m''.

[03] ``evameta.m ^a^M2.0038^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato pubbantaanudi.t.thiyo na honti. pubbantaanudi.t.thiina.m asati, aparantaanudi.t.thiyo ^a^P3.0046^ea^ na honti. aparantaanudi.t.thiina.m asati, thaamaso {thaamasaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} paraamaaso na hoti. thaamase {thaamasaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), thaamaso (ka0)} paraamaase asati ruupasmi.m... vedanaaya ^a^V2.0043^ea^... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.nasmi.m citta.m virajjati vimuccati anupaadaaya aasavehi. vimuttattaa .thita.m. .thitattaa santusita.m. santusitattaa na paritassati. aparitassa.m paccatta~n~neva parinibbaayati. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa anekavihita.m attaana.m samanupassamaanaa samanupassanti, sabbete pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhe samanupassanti, etesa.m vaa a~n~natara.m. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito ruupa.m attato samanupassati, ruupavanta.m ^a^T3.0058^ea^ vaa attaana.m; attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m''.

[03] ``iti aya~nceva samanupassanaa `asmii'ti cassa avigata.m {adhigata.m (bahuusu)} hoti. `asmii'ti kho pana, bhikkhave, avigate pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m avakkanti hoti -- cakkhundriyassa sotindriyassa ghaanindriyassa jivhindriyassa kaayindriyassa. atthi, bhikkhave, mano, atthi dhammaa, atthi avijjaadhaatu. avijjaasamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phu.t.thassa assutavato puthujjanassa `asmii'tipissa hoti; `ayamahamasmii'tipissa hoti; `bhavissa'ntipissa hoti; `na bhavissa'ntipissa hoti; `ruupii bhavissa'ntipissa hoti; `aruupii bhavissa'ntipissa hoti; `sa~n~nii bhavissa'ntipissa hoti; `asa~n~nii bhavissa'ntipissa hoti; `nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii bhavissa'ntipissa hoti''.

[03] ``ti.t.thanteva ^a^M2.0039^ea^ ^a^P3.0047^ea^ kho {ti.t.thanti kho pana (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, bhikkhave, tattheva {tatheva (katthaci)} pa~ncindriyaani. athettha sutavato ariyasaavakassa avijjaa pahiiyati, vijjaa uppajjati. tassa avijjaaviraagaa vijjuppaadaa `asmii'tipissa na hoti; `ayamahamasmii'tipissa na hoti; `bhavissa'nti... `na bhavissa'nti... ruupii... aruupii ^a^V2.0044^ea^... sa~n~nii... asa~n~nii... `nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii bhavissa'ntipissa na hotii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``pa~nca, bhikkhave, khandhe desessaami ^a^T3.0059^ea^, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhe ca. ta.m su.naatha. katame ca, bhikkhave, pa~ncakkhandhaa? ya.m ki~nci, bhikkhave, ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, aya.m vuccati ruupakkhandho. yaa kaaci vedanaa...pe0... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa...pe0... aya.m vuccati sa"nkhaarakkhandho. ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, aya.m vuccati vi~n~naa.nakkhandho. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, pa~ncakkhandhaa''.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa? ya.m ki~nci, bhikkhave, ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m...pe0... ya.m duure santike vaa saasava.m upaadaaniya.m, aya.m vuccati ruupupaadaanakkhandho. yaa kaaci vedanaa...pe0... yaa duure santike vaa saasavaa upaadaaniyaa, aya.m vuccati vedanupaadaanakkhandho. yaa kaaci sa~n~naa...pe0... yaa duure santike vaa saasavaa upaadaaniyaa, aya.m vuccati sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho. ye keci sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... saasavaa upaadaaniyaa, aya.m vuccati sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho. ya.m ^a^P3.0048^ea^ ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m...pe0... ^a^T3.0060^ea^ ya.m duure santike vaa saasava.m upaadaaniya.m, aya.m vuccati vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha ^a^V2.0045^ea^ kho so.no gahapatiputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^M2.0040^ea^ ...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho so.na.m gahapatiputta.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``ye hi keci, so.na, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa aniccena ruupena dukkhena vipari.naamadhammena `seyyohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti; `sadisohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti; `hiinohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti; kima~n~natra yathaabhuutassa adassanaa? aniccaaya vedanaaya dukkhaaya vipari.naamadhammaaya `seyyohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti; `sadisohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti; `hiinohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti; kima~n~natra yathaabhuutassa adassanaa? aniccaaya sa~n~naaya... aniccehi sa"nkhaarehi dukkhehi vipari.naamadhammehi `seyyohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti; `sadisohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti; `hiinohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti; kima~n~natra yathaabhuutassa adassanaa? aniccena vi~n~naa.nena dukkhena vipari.naamadhammena `seyyohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti; `sadisohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti; `hiinohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti; kima~n~natra yathaabhuutassa adassanaa?

[03] ``ye ca kho keci, so.na, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa aniccena ruupena dukkhena vipari.naamadhammena `seyyohamasmii'tipi na samanupassanti ^a^T3.0061^ea^; `sadisohamasmii'tipi na samanupassanti ^a^P3.0049^ea^; `hiinohamasmii'tipi na samanupassanti; kima~n~natra yathaabhuutassa dassanaa? aniccaaya vedanaaya... aniccaaya sa~n~naaya... aniccehi sa"nkhaarehi... aniccena vi~n~naa.nena dukkhena vipari.naamadhammena `seyyohamasmii'tipi na samanupassanti; `sadisohamasmii'tipi na samanupassanti; `hiinohamasmii'tipi na samanupassanti; kima~n~natra yathaabhuutassa dassanaa?

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, so.na, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedanaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti? ``aniccaa, bhante''... ``sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m ^a^V2.0046^ea^ vipari.naamadhamma.m kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^M2.0041^ea^, so.na, ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ``yaa kaaci vedanaa... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa... ya.m ^a^T3.0062^ea^ ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m ^a^P3.0050^ea^ vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ``eva.m passa.m, so.na, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanaayapi nibbindati, sa~n~naayapi nibbindati, sa"nkhaaresupi nibbindati, vi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho so.no gahapatiputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho so.na.m gahapatiputta.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``ye hi keci, so.na, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ruupa.m nappajaananti, ruupasamudaya.m nappajaananti, ruupanirodha.m nappajaananti, ruupanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti; vedana.m nappajaananti, vedanaasamudaya.m nappajaananti, vedanaanirodha.m nappajaananti, vedanaanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m ^a^V2.0047^ea^ nappajaananti; sa~n~na.m nappajaananti...pe0... sa"nkhaare nappajaananti, sa"nkhaarasamudaya.m nappajaananti, sa"nkhaaranirodha.m nappajaananti, sa"nkhaaranirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti; vi~n~naa.na.m nappajaananti, vi~n~naa.nasamudaya.m nappajaananti, vi~n~naa.nanirodha.m ^a^T3.0063^ea^ nappajaananti, vi~n~naa.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti. na me te, so.na, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu vaa braahma.nasammataa, na ca pana te aayasmanto saama~n~nattha.m vaa brahma~n~nattha.m vaa di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti.

[01] ``ye ^a^M2.0042^ea^ ca kho keci, so.na, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ruupa.m pajaananti ^a^P3.0051^ea^, ruupasamudaya.m pajaananti, ruupanirodha.m pajaananti, ruupanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaananti; vedana.m pajaananti...pe0... sa~n~na.m pajaananti... sa"nkhaare pajaananti... vi~n~naa.na.m pajaananti, vi~n~naa.nasamudaya.m pajaananti, vi~n~naa.nanirodha.m pajaananti, vi~n~naa.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaananti. te ca kho me, so.na, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu ceva sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu ca braahma.nasammataa, te ca panaayasmanto saama~n~nattha~nca brahma~n~nattha~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``anicca~n~neva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ruupa.m aniccanti passati. saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi. sammaa passa.m nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo, raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m vimutta.m suvimuttanti vuccati. anicca~n~neva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedana.m aniccanti passati. saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi. sammaa passa.m nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo, raagakkhayaa ^a^T3.0064^ea^ nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m vimutta.m suvimuttanti vuccati. anicceyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa~n~na.m aniccanti passati...pe0... anicceyeva bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa"nkhaare aniccaati passati. saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi. sammaa passa.m nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo, raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m vimutta.m suvimuttanti vuccati. anicca~n~neva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vi~n~naa.na.m aniccanti passati. saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi. sammaa passa.m nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo, raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m vimutta.m suvimuttanti vuccatii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0048^ea^. ``ruupa.m ^a^P3.0052^ea^, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, ruupaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassatha. ruupa.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasi karonto, ruupaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassanto ruupasmi.m nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo, raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m vimutta.m suvimuttanti vuccati. vedana.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, vedanaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassatha. vedana.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasi ^a^M2.0043^ea^ karonto, vedanaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassanto vedanaaya nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo, raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m vimutta.m suvimuttanti vuccati. sa~n~na.m bhikkhave... sa"nkhaare, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, sa"nkhaaraaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassatha. sa"nkhaare, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0065^ea^, bhikkhu yoniso manasi karonto, sa"nkhaaraaniccata.m yathaabhuuta.m samanupassanto sa"nkhaaresu nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo, raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m vimutta.m suvimuttanti vuccati. vi~n~naa.na.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, vi~n~naa.naaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassatha. vi~n~naa.na.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasi karonto, vi~n~naa.naaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassanto vi~n~naa.nasmi.m nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo, raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m vimutta.m suvimuttanti vuccatii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] attadiipavaggo pa~ncamo.
