[03] ``upamaa kho myaaya.m, tissa, kataa atthassa vi~n~naapanaaya. aya.m cevettha attho -- `puriso amaggakusalo'ti kho, tissa, puthujjanasseta.m adhivacana.m. `puriso maggakusalo'ti kho, tissa, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. `dvedhaapatho'ti kho, tissa, vicikicchaayeta.m adhivacana.m ^a^P3.0109^ea^. `vaamo maggo'ti kho, tissa, a.t.tha"ngikasseta.m micchaamaggassa adhivacana.m, seyyathida.m -- micchaadi.t.thiyaa...pe0... micchaasamaadhissa. `dakkhi.no maggo'ti kho, tissa, ariyasseta.m a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa adhivacana.m, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thiyaa...pe0... sammaasamaadhissa. `tibbo vanasa.n.do'ti kho, tissa, avijjaayeta.m adhivacana.m. `mahanta.m ninna.m pallala'nti kho, tissa, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m. `sobbho papaato'ti kho, tissa, kodhuupaayaasasseta.m adhivacana.m. `samo bhuumibhaago rama.niiyo'ti kho, tissa, nibbaanasseta.m adhivacana.m. abhirama, tissa, abhirama, tissa! ahamovaadena ahamanuggahena ahamanusaasaniyaa''ti {ahamaamisadhammaanuggahena mamovaadena mamaanusaasaniyaati (ka0)}.
[03] idamavoca ^a^V2.0100^ea^ bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa tisso bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti. dutiya.m.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa saariputto saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane ^a^T3.0133^ea^ anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena yamakassa naama bhikkhuno evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu kaayassa bhedaa ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti para.m mara.naa''ti.

[03] assosu.m kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yamakassa kira naama bhikkhuno evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu kaayassa bhedaa ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti para.m mara.naa''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu yenaayasmaa yamako ^a^M2.0090^ea^ tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa yamakena saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m yamaka.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``sacca.m kira te, aavuso yamaka, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m ^a^P3.0110^ea^ bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu kaayassa bhedaa ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti para.m mara.naa'''ti? ``eva.m khvaaha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami -- `khii.naasavo bhikkhu kaayassa bhedaa ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti para.m mara.naa'''ti.

[03] ``maa, aavuso yamaka, eva.m avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi. na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhaacikkhana.m. na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya -- `khii.naasavo bhikkhu kaayassa bhedaa ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti para.m mara.naa'''ti. evampi kho aayasmaa ^a^T3.0134^ea^ yamako tehi bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano tatheva ta.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m thaamasaa paraamaasaa abhinivissa voharati -- ``tathaaha.m ^a^V2.0101^ea^ bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu kaayassa bhedaa ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti para.m mara.naa''ti.

[03] yato kho te bhikkhuu naasakkhi.msu aayasmanta.m yamaka.m etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetu.m, atha kho te bhikkhuu u.t.thaayaasanaa yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``yamakassa naama, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhuno evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu kaayassa bhedaa ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti para.m mara.naa'ti. saadhaayasmaa saariputto yena yamako bhikkhu tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa saariputto tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa yamako tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa yamakena saddhi.m sammodi...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m yamaka.m etadavoca --

[03] ``sacca.m kira te, aavuso yamaka, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa khii.naasavo ^a^P3.0111^ea^ bhikkhu kaayassa bhedaa ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti para.m mara.naa'''ti? ``eva.m ^a^M2.0091^ea^ khvaaha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m ^a^T3.0135^ea^ desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu kaayassa bhedaa ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti para.m mara.naa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aavuso yamaka, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, aavuso''. ``vedanaa niccaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, aavuso''. tasmaatiha...pe0... eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aavuso yamaka, ruupa.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso'' ^a^V2.0102^ea^... ``vedana.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''... ``sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aavuso yamaka, ruupasmi.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''. ``a~n~natra ruupaa tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''. ``vedanaaya... a~n~natra vedanaaya...pe0... sa~n~naaya... a~n~natra sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... a~n~natra sa"nkhaarehi... vi~n~naa.nasmi.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''. ``a~n~natra vi~n~naa.naa tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aavuso yamaka, ruupa.m... vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^T3.0136^ea^ ^a^P3.0112^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, aavuso yamaka, aya.m so aruupii... avedano... asa~n~nii... asa"nkhaaro... avi~n~naa.no tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''. ``ettha ca te, aavuso yamaka, di.t.theva dhamme saccato thetato {tathato (syaa0 ka.m0)} tathaagate anupalabbhiyamaane {tathaagate anupalabbhamaane (?)}, kalla.m nu te ta.m veyyaakara.na.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu kaayassa bhedaa ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti para.m mara.naa'''ti?

[03] ``ahu kho me ta.m, aavuso saariputta, pubbe aviddasuno paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m; ida~nca panaayasmato saariputtassa dhammadesana.m sutvaa ta~nceva paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m pahiina.m, dhammo ca me abhisamito''ti.

[03] ``sace ^a^M2.0092^ea^ ta.m, aavuso yamaka, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `yo so, aavuso yamaka, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa ki.m hotii'ti? eva.m pu.t.tho tva.m, aavuso yamaka, kinti byaakareyyaasii''ti? ``sace ma.m, aavuso, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `yo so, aavuso yamaka, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa ki.m hotii'ti? eva.m pu.t.thoha.m, aavuso, eva.m byaakareyya.m -- `ruupa.m kho, aavuso, anicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m; ya.m dukkha.m ta.m ^a^V2.0103^ea^ niruddha.m tadattha"ngata.m. vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m; ya.m dukkha.m ta.m niruddha.m tadattha"ngata'nti. eva.m pu.t.thoha.m ^a^T3.0137^ea^, aavuso, eva.m byaakareyya''nti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, aavuso yamaka! tena haavuso, yamaka, upama.m te karissaami etasseva atthassa bhiyyosomattaaya ~naa.naaya. seyyathaapi, aavuso yamaka, gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa a.d.dho mahaddhano mahaabhogo; so ca aarakkhasampanno. tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya anatthakaamo ahitakaamo ayogakkhemakaamo jiivitaa voropetukaamo. tassa evamassa ^a^P3.0113^ea^ -- `aya.m kho gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa a.d.dho mahaddhano mahaabhogo; so ca aarakkhasampanno; naaya.m {na haaya.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} sukaro pasayha jiivitaa voropetu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m anupakhajja jiivitaa voropeyya'nti. so ta.m gahapati.m vaa gahapatiputta.m vaa upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `upa.t.thaheyya.m ta.m, bhante'ti. tamena.m so gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa upa.t.thaapeyya. so upa.t.thaheyya pubbu.t.thaayii pacchaanipaatii ki.mkaarapa.tissaavii manaapacaarii piyavaadii. tassa so gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa mittatopi na.m saddaheyya {daheyya (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)}; suhajjatopi na.m saddaheyya; tasmi~nca vissaasa.m aapajjeyya. yadaa kho, aavuso, tassa purisassa evamassa -- `sa.mvissattho kho myaaya.m gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa'ti, atha na.m rahogata.m viditvaa ti.nhena satthena jiivitaa voropeyya.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aavuso yamaka, yadaa hi so puriso amu.m gahapati.m vaa gahapatiputta.m vaa upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m aaha -- `upa.t.thaheyya.m ta.m, bhante'ti, tadaapi so vadhakova. vadhaka~nca pana ^a^T3.0138^ea^ santa.m na a~n~naasi -- `vadhako me'ti. yadaapi so upa.t.thahati pubbu.t.thaayii pacchaanipaatii ki.mkaarapa.tissaavii manaapacaarii piyavaadii, tadaapi so vadhakova. vadhaka~nca pana santa.m ^a^M2.0093^ea^ na a~n~naasi -- `vadhako me'ti. yadaapi na.m rahogata.m viditvaa ti.nhena satthena jiivitaa voropeti, tadaapi so vadhakova. vadhaka~nca pana santa.m na a~n~naasi -- `vadhako me'''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti. ``evameva kho, aavuso, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito ruupa.m attato samanupassati, ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m attato ^a^P3.0114^ea^ samanupassati, vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m''.

[03] ``so ^a^V2.0104^ea^ anicca.m ruupa.m `anicca.m ruupa'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. anicca.m vedana.m `aniccaa vedanaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. anicca.m sa~n~na.m `aniccaa sa~n~naa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. anicce sa"nkhaare `aniccaa sa"nkhaaraa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. anicca.m vi~n~naa.na.m `anicca.m vi~n~naa.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati.

[03] ``dukkha.m ruupa.m `dukkha.m ruupa'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. dukkha.m vedana.m... dukkha.m sa~n~na.m... dukkhe sa"nkhaare... dukkha.m vi~n~naa.na.m `dukkha.m vi~n~naa.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati.

[03] ``anatta.m ruupa.m `anattaa ruupa'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. anatta.m ^a^T3.0139^ea^ vedana.m... anatta.m sa~n~na.m... anatte sa"nkhaare... anatta.m vi~n~naa.na.m `anatta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati.

[03] ``sa"nkhata.m ruupa.m `sa"nkhata.m ruupa'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. sa"nkhata.m vedana.m... sa"nkhata.m sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhate sa"nkhaare... sa"nkhata.m vi~n~naa.na.m `sa"nkhata.m vi~n~naa.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati.

[03] ``vadhaka.m ruupa.m `vadhaka.m ruupa'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. vadhaka.m vedana.m `vadhakaa vedanaa'ti... vadhaka.m sa~n~na.m `vadhakaa sa~n~naa'ti... vadhake sa"nkhaare `vadhakaa sa"nkhaaraa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. vadhaka.m vi~n~naa.na.m `vadhaka.m vi~n~naa.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati.

[03] ``so ruupa.m upeti upaadiyati adhi.t.thaati `attaa me'ti. vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m upeti upaadiyati adhi.t.thaati `attaa me'ti. tassime pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa upetaa upaadinnaa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``sutavaa ^a^M2.0094^ea^ ca kho, aavuso, ariyasaavako ariyaana.m dassaavii...pe0... sappurisadhamme suviniito na ruupa.m attato samanupassati, na ruupavanta.m attaana.m; na attani ruupa.m, na ruupasmi.m attaana.m. na vedana.m... na sa~n~na.m... na sa"nkhaare... na vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, na vi~n~naa.navanta.m attaana.m; na attani vi~n~naa.na.m, na vi~n~naa.nasmi.m attaana.m.

[03] ``so ^a^P3.0115^ea^ anicca.m ruupa.m `anicca.m ruupa'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. anicca.m vedana.m ^a^V2.0105^ea^... anicca.m sa~n~na.m... anicce sa"nkhaare ^a^T3.0140^ea^... anicca.m vi~n~naa.na.m `anicca.m vi~n~naa.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati.

[03] ``dukkha.m ruupa.m `dukkha.m ruupa'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. dukkha.m vedana.m... dukkha.m sa~n~na.m... dukkhe sa"nkhaare... dukkha.m vi~n~naa.na.m `dukkha.m vi~n~naa.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati.

[03] ``anatta.m ruupa.m `anattaa ruupa'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. anatta.m vedana.m... anatta.m sa~n~na.m... anatte sa"nkhaare... anatta.m vi~n~naa.na.m `anattaa vi~n~naa.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati.

[03] ``sa"nkhata.m ruupa.m `sa"nkhata.m ruupa'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. sa"nkhata.m vedana.m... sa"nkhata.m sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhate sa"nkhaare... sa"nkhata.m vi~n~naa.na.m `sa"nkhata.m vi~n~naa.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati.

[03] ``vadhaka.m ruupa.m `vadhaka.m ruupa'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. vadhaka.m vedana.m... vadhaka.m sa~n~na.m... vadhake sa"nkhaare ``vadhakaa sa"nkhaaraa''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. vadhaka.m vi~n~naa.na.m `vadhaka.m vi~n~naa.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati.

[03] ``so ruupa.m na upeti, na upaadiyati, naadhi.t.thaati -- `attaa me'ti. vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m na upeti, na upaadiyati, naadhi.t.thaati -- `attaa me'ti. tassime pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa anupetaa anupaadinnaa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. ``evameta.m, aavuso saariputta, hoti yesa.m aayasmantaana.m taadisaa sabrahmacaarino anukampakaa atthakaamaa ovaadakaa anusaasakaa. ida~nca pana me aayasmato ^a^T3.0141^ea^ saariputtassa dhammadesana.m sutvaa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V2.0106^ea^ ^a^P3.0116^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa anuraadho bhagavato aviduure ^a^M2.0095^ea^ ara~n~naku.tikaaya.m viharati. atha kho sambahulaa a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa yena aayasmaa anuraadho tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa anuraadhena saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa aayasmanta.m anuraadha.m etadavocu.m -- ``yo so, aavuso anuraadha, tathaagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, ta.m tathaagato imesu catuusu .thaanesu pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeti -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa''ti?

[03] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa anuraadho te a~n~natitthiye paribbaajake etadavoca -- ``yo so aavuso tathaagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto ta.m tathaagato a~n~natra imehi catuuhi .thaanehi pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeti -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa''ti. eva.m vutte, a~n~natitthiyaa ^a^T3.0142^ea^ paribbaajakaa aayasmanta.m anuraadha.m etadavocu.m -- ``so caaya.m bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito, thero vaa pana baalo abyatto''ti. atha kho a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa aayasmanta.m anuraadha.m navavaadena ca baalavaadena ca apasaadetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu.

[03] atha ^a^P3.0117^ea^ kho aayasmato anuraadhassa acirapakkantesu tesu a~n~natitthiyesu paribbaajakesu etadahosi -- ``sace kho ma.m te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa uttari.m pa~nha.m puccheyyu.m. katha.m byaakaramaano nu khvaaha.m tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m vuttavaadii ceva bhagavato assa.m, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkheyya.m, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyya.m, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyyaa''ti?

[03] atha ^a^V2.0107^ea^ kho aayasmaa anuraadho yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa anuraadho bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idhaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato aviduure ara~n~naku.tikaaya.m viharaami. atha kho, bhante, sambahulaa a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami.msu ^a^M2.0096^ea^ ...pe0... ma.m etadavocu.m -- `yo so, aavuso anuraadha, tathaagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto ta.m tathaagato imesu catuusu .thaanesu pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeti -- hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, na hoti... hoti ca na ca hoti, neva ^a^T3.0143^ea^ hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa'''ti?

[03] eva.m vuttaaha.m, bhante, te a~n~natitthiye paribbaajake etadavoca.m -- ``yo so, aavuso, tathaagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, ta.m tathaagato a~n~natra imehi catuuhi .thaanehi pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeti -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaati. eva.m vutte, bhante, te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa ma.m etadavocu.m -- `so caaya.m bhikkhu na vo bhavissati acirapabbajito thero vaa pana baalo abyatto'ti. atha kho ma.m, bhante, te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa navavaadena baalavaadena ca apasaadetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu''.

[03] ``tassa ^a^P3.0118^ea^ mayha.m, bhante, acirapakkantesu tesu a~n~natitthiyesu paribbaajakesu etadahosi -- `sace kho ma.m te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa uttari.m pa~nha.m puccheyyu.m. katha.m byaakaramaano nu khvaaha.m tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m vuttavaadii ceva bhagavato assa.m, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkheyya.m, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyya.m, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyyaa'''ti?

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, anuraadha, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m ^a^T3.0144^ea^, bhante''. ``vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m bhante''...pe0... tasmaatiha...pe0... eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaati''.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^V2.0108^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, anuraadha, ruupa.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^M2.0097^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, anuraadha, ruupasmi.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``a~n~natra ruupaa tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedanaaya...pe0... a~n~natra vedanaaya...pe0... sa~n~naaya... a~n~natra sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... a~n~natra sa"nkhaarehi... vi~n~naa.nasmi.m... a~n~natra vi~n~naa.naa tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, anuraadha, ruupa.m... vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, anuraadha, aya.m so aruupii avedano asa~n~nii asa"nkhaaro avi~n~naa.no tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ettha ca te, anuraadha, di.t.theva dhamme saccato thetato tathaagate anupalabbhiyamaane kalla.m nu te ta.m veyyaakara.na.m -- `yo so, aavuso, tathaagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto ta.m ^a^T3.0145^ea^ tathaagato a~n~natra imehi catuuhi ^a^P3.0119^ea^ .thaanehi pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeti -- hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa... neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``saadhu saadhu, anuraadha! pubbe caaha.m, anuraadha, etarahi ca dukkha~nceva pa~n~napemi, dukkhassa ca nirodha''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena ^a^V2.0109^ea^ aayasmaa vakkali kumbhakaaranivesane viharati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho aayasmaa vakkali upa.t.thaake aamantesi -- ``etha tumhe, aavuso, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamatha; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatha -- `vakkali, bhante, bhikkhu aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano, so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. eva~nca vadetha -- `saadhu kira, bhante, bhagavaa yena vakkali bhikkhu tenupasa"nkamatu; anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato vakkalissa pa.tissutvaa yena ^a^M2.0098^ea^ bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``vakkali, bhante, bhikkhu aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano, so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati; eva~nca pana vadeti -- `saadhu kira, bhante, bhagavaa yena vakkali bhikkhu tenupasa"nkamatu; anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha ^a^T3.0146^ea^ kho bhagavaa nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yenaayasmaa vakkali tenupasa"nkami. addasaa ^a^P3.0120^ea^ kho aayasmaa vakkali bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana ma~ncake samadhosi {sama~ncosi (sii0), sama~ncopi (syaa0 ka.m0) sa.m + dhuu + ii = samadhosi}. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m vakkali.m etadavoca -- ``ala.m, vakkali, maa tva.m ma~ncake samadhosi. santimaani aasanaani pa~n~nattaani; tatthaaha.m nisiidissaamii''ti. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m vakkali.m etadavoca -- ``kacci te, vakkali, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m, kacci dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no abhikkamo''ti? ``na me, bhante, khamaniiya.m, na yaapaniiya.m; baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo''ti. ``kacci te, vakkali, na ki~nci kukkucca.m, na koci vippa.tisaaro''ti? ``taggha me, bhante, anappaka.m kukkucca.m, anappako vippa.tisaaro''ti. ``kacci pana ta.m, vakkali, attaa siilato na upavadatii''ti? ``na kho ma.m, bhante, attaa siilato upavadatii''ti. ``no ce kira ta.m, vakkali, attaa siilato upavadati; atha ki~nca te kukkucca.m ko ca vippa.tisaaro''ti? ``cirapa.tikaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitukaamo, natthi ca me kaayasmi.m taavatikaa balamattaa, yaavataaha.m {yaaha.m (sii0), yaayaaha.m (pii0)} bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkameyya''nti.

[03] ``ala.m ^a^V2.0110^ea^, vakkali, ki.m te iminaa puutikaayena di.t.thena? yo ^a^T3.0147^ea^ kho, vakkali, dhamma.m passati so ma.m passati; yo ma.m passati so dhamma.m passati. dhamma~nhi, vakkali, passanto ma.m passati; ma.m passanto dhamma.m passati.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vakkali, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m ^a^P3.0121^ea^, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m ^a^M2.0099^ea^ nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''...pe0... eso me attaati? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``tasmaatiha...pe0... eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m vakkali.m iminaa ovaadena ovaditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa yena gijjhakuu.to pabbato tena pakkaami. atha kho aayasmaa vakkali acirapakkantassa bhagavato upa.t.thaake aamantesi -- ``etha ma.m, aavuso, ma~ncaka.m aaropetvaa yena isigilipassa.m kaa.lasilaa tenupasa"nkamatha. katha~nhi naama maadiso antaraghare kaala.m kattabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato vakkalissa pa.tissutvaa aayasmanta.m vakkali.m ma~ncaka.m aaropetvaa yena isigilipassa.m kaa.lasilaa tenupasa"nkami.msu. atha kho bhagavaa ta~nca ratti.m ta~nca divaavasesa.m gijjhakuu.te pabbate vihaasi. atha ^a^T3.0148^ea^ kho dve devataayo abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m gijjhakuu.ta.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu...pe0... ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho ekaa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``vakkali, bhante, bhikkhu vimokkhaaya cetetii''ti. aparaa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^V2.0111^ea^ -- ``so hi nuuna, bhante, suvimutto vimuccissatii''ti. idamavocu.m taa devataayo. ida.m vatvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.msu.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``etha tumhe, bhikkhave, yena vakkali bhikkhu tenupasa"nkamatha; upasa"nkamitvaa vakkali.m bhikkhu.m eva.m vadetha --

[03] ```su.naavuso tva.m, vakkali, bhagavato vacana.m dvinna~nca ^a^P3.0122^ea^ devataana.m. ima.m, aavuso, ratti.m dve devataayo abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m gijjhakuu.ta.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho, aavuso, ekaa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- vakkali, bhante, bhikkhu vimokkhaaya cetetiiti. aparaa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- so hi nuuna, bhante, suvimutto vimuccissatiiti. bhagavaa ca ta.m, aavuso vakkali, evamaaha -- maa bhaayi, vakkali; maa bhaayi, vakkali! apaapaka.m te mara.na.m bhavissati, apaapikaa kaalakiriyaa'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te ^a^M2.0100^ea^ bhikkhuu ^a^T3.0149^ea^ bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa vakkali tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m vakkali.m etadavocu.m -- ``su.naavuso vakkali, bhagavato vacana.m dvinna~nca devataana''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa vakkali upa.t.thaake aamantesi -- ``etha ma.m, aavuso, ma~ncakaa oropetha. katha~nhi naama maadiso ucce aasane nisiiditvaa tassa bhagavato saasana.m sotabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti! ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato vakkalissa pa.tissutvaa aayasmanta.m vakkali.m ma~ncakaa oropesu.m. ``ima.m, aavuso, ratti.m dve devataayo abhikkantaaya rattiyaa...pe0... ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho, aavuso, ekaa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- `vakkali, bhante, bhikkhu vimokkhaaya cetetii'ti. aparaa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- `so hi nuuna, bhante, suvimutto vimuccissatii'ti. bhagavaa ca ta.m, aavuso vakkali, evamaaha -- `maa bhaayi, vakkali; maa bhaayi, vakkali! apaapaka.m te mara.na.m bhavissati, apaapikaa kaalakiriyaa'''ti. ``tena haavuso, mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatha -- `vakkali, bhante, bhikkhu aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. eva~nca vadetha -- `ruupa.m anicca.m. taaha.m, bhante, na ka"nkhaami. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkhanti na vicikicchaami. yadanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, natthi me tattha chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaati na vicikicchaami. vedanaa ^a^P3.0123^ea^ aniccaa. taaha.m, bhante, na ka"nkhaami ^a^V2.0112^ea^. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkhanti na ^a^T3.0150^ea^ vicikicchaami. yadanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, natthi me tattha chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaati na vicikicchaami. sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa. taaha.m, bhante, na ka"nkhaami. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkhanti na vicikicchaami. yadanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, natthi me tattha chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaati na vicikicchaami. vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m. taaha.m, bhante, na ka"nkhaami. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkhanti na vicikicchaami. yadanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, natthi me tattha chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaati na vicikicchaamii'''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato vakkalissa pa.tissutvaa pakkami.msu. atha kho aayasmaa vakkali acirapakkantesu tesu bhikkhuusu sattha.m aaharesi.

[03] atha kho te bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``vakkali, bhante, bhikkhu aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano; so bhagavato ^a^M2.0101^ea^ paade sirasaa vandati; eva~nca vadeti -- `ruupa.m anicca.m. taaha.m, bhante, na ka"nkhaami. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkhanti na vicikicchaami. yadanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, natthi me tattha chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaati na vicikicchaami. vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa ^a^T3.0151^ea^... vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m. taaha.m, bhante, na ka"nkhaami. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkhanti na vicikicchaami. yadanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, natthi me tattha chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaati na vicikicchaamii'''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aayaama, bhikkhave, yena isigilipassa.m kaa.lasilaa tenupasa"nkamissaama; yattha vakkalinaa kulaputtena satthamaaharita''nti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. atha kho bhagavaa sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m yena isigilipassa.m kaa.lasilaa tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m vakkali.m duuratova ma~ncake vivattakkhandha.m semaana.m.

[03] tena ^a^P3.0124^ea^ kho pana samayena dhuumaayitatta.m timiraayitatta.m gacchateva purima.m disa.m, gacchati pacchima.m disa.m, gacchati uttara.m disa.m, gacchati dakkhi.na.m disa.m, gacchati uddha.m disa.m, gacchati adho ^a^V2.0113^ea^ disa.m, gacchati anudisa.m. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, eta.m dhuumaayitatta.m timiraayitatta.m gacchateva purima.m disa.m...pe0... gacchati anudisa''nti. ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eso kho, bhikkhave, maaro paapimaa vakkalissa kulaputtassa vi~n~naa.na.m samanvesati {samannesati (ka0 sii0 pii0)} -- `kattha vakkalissa kulaputtassa vi~n~naa.na.m pati.t.thita'nti? appati.t.thitena ca, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.nena vakkali kulaputto parinibbuto''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa assaji kassapakaaraame viharati ^a^T3.0152^ea^ aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho aayasmaa assaji upa.t.thaake aamantesi -- ``etha tumhe, aavuso, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamatha; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatha -- `assaji, bhante, bhikkhu aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. eva~nca vadetha -- `saadhu kira, bhante, bhagavaa ^a^M2.0102^ea^ yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato assajissa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``assaji, bhante, bhikkhu aabaadhiko...pe0... saadhu kira, bhante, bhagavaa yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha ^a^P3.0125^ea^ kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa assaji tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho aayasmaa assaji bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana ma~ncake samadhosi. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m assaji.m {aayasmato assajissa (pii0 ka0)} etadavoca -- ``ala.m, assaji, maa tva.m ma~ncake samadhosi. santimaani aasanaani pa~n~nattaani, tatthaaha.m nisiidissaamii''ti. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m assaji.m etadavoca -- ``kacci te, assaji, khamaniiya.m, kacci ^a^T3.0153^ea^ yaapaniiya.m...pe0... pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati no abhikkamo''ti?

[03] ``na ^a^V2.0114^ea^ me, bhante, khamaniiya.m...pe0... abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati no pa.tikkamo''ti. ``kacci te, assaji, na ki~nci kukkucca.m na koci vippa.tisaaro''ti? ``taggha me, bhante, anappaka.m kukkucca.m anappako vippa.tisaaro''ti. ``kacci pana ta.m, assaji, attaa siilato na upavadatii''ti? ``na kho ma.m, bhante, attaa siilato upavadatii''ti. ``no ce kira ta.m, assaji, attaa siilato upavadati, atha ki~nca te kukkucca.m ko ca vippa.tisaaro''ti? ``pubbe khvaaha.m, bhante, gela~n~ne passambhetvaa passambhetvaa kaayasa"nkhaare viharaami, soha.m samaadhi.m nappa.tilabhaami. tassa mayha.m, bhante, ta.m samaadhi.m appa.tilabhato eva.m hoti -- `no cassaaha.m parihaayaamii'''ti. ``ye te, assaji, sama.nabraahma.naa samaadhisaarakaa samaadhisaama~n~naa tesa.m ta.m samaadhi.m appa.tilabhata.m eva.m hoti -- `no cassu maya.m parihaayaamaa'''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, assaji, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''...pe0... vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^P3.0126^ea^ ...pe0... tasmaatiha...pe0... eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatiiti. so sukha.m ce vedana.m vedayati {vediyati (sii0 pii0)}, saa `aniccaa'ti pajaanaati. `anajjhositaa'ti ^a^M2.0103^ea^ pajaanaati. `anabhinanditaa'ti pajaanaati. dukkha.m ce vedana.m vedayati, saa `aniccaa'ti pajaanaati. `anajjhositaa'ti pajaanaati. `anabhinanditaa'ti pajaanaati. adukkhamasukha.m ce vedana.m vedayati, saa `aniccaa'ti pajaanaati...pe0... `anabhinanditaa'ti pajaanaati. so sukha.m ce vedana.m vedayati ^a^T3.0154^ea^, visa.myutto na.m vedayati; dukkha.m ce vedana.m vedayati, visa.myutto na.m vedayati; adukkhamasukha.m ce vedana.m vedayati, visa.myutto na.m vedayati. so kaayapariyantika.m ce vedana.m vedayamaano `kaayapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati. jiivitapariyantika.m ce vedana.m vedayamaanaae `jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati. `kaayassa bhedaa uddha.m jiivitapariyaadaanaa idheva sabbavedayitaani anabhinanditaani siitiibhavissantii'ti pajaanaati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V2.0115^ea^, assaji, tela~nca pa.ticca, va.t.ti~nca pa.ticca, telappadiipo jhaayeyya; tasseva telassa ca va.t.tiyaa ca pariyaadaanaa anaahaaro nibbaayeyya. evameva kho, assaji, bhikkhu kaayapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayamaano `kaayapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati. jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayamaano `jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati. `kaayassa bhedaa uddha.m jiivitapariyaadaanaa idheva sabbavedayitaani anabhinanditaani siitiibhavissantii'ti pajaanaatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m sambahulaa theraa bhikkhuu kosambiya.m viharanti ghositaaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa khemako badarikaaraame viharati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha ^a^P3.0127^ea^ kho theraa bhikkhuu saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thitaa aayasmanta.m daasaka.m aamantesu.m -- ``ehi tva.m, aavuso daasaka, yena khemako bhikkhu tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T3.0155^ea^ khemaka.m bhikkhu.m eva.m vadehi -- `theraa ta.m, aavuso khemaka, evamaaha.msu -- kacci te, aavuso, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m, kacci dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tikkamanti no abhikkamanti, pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati no abhikkamo'''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa daasako theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa khemako tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m khemaka.m etadavoca -- ``theraa ta.m, aavuso ^a^M2.0104^ea^ khemaka, evamaaha.msu -- `kacci te, aavuso, khamaniiya.m...pe0... no abhikkamo'''ti? ``na me, aavuso, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m...pe0... abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati no pa.tikkamo''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa daasako yena theraa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``khemako, aavuso, bhikkhu evamaaha -- `na me, aavuso, khamaniiya.m...pe0... abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati no pa.tikkamo'''ti. ``ehi tva.m, aavuso daasaka, yena khemako bhikkhu tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa khemaka.m bhikkhu.m eva.m vadehi -- `theraa ta.m, aavuso khemaka, evamaaha.msu -- pa~ncime, aavuso, upaadaanakkhandhaa vuttaa bhagavataa, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho ^a^V2.0116^ea^. imesu aayasmaa ^a^T3.0156^ea^ khemako pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu ki~nci atta.m vaa attaniya.m vaa samanupassatii'''ti?

[03] ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa daasako theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa khemako tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa...pe0... theraa ta.m, aavuso khemaka, evamaaha.msu -- ``pa~ncime, aavuso, upaadaanakkhandhaa vuttaa bhagavataa, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. imesu aayasmaa khemako pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu ki~nci atta.m vaa attaniya.m vaa samanupassatii''ti? ``pa~ncime ^a^P3.0128^ea^, aavuso, upaadaanakkhandhaa vuttaa bhagavataa, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. imesu khvaaha.m, aavuso, pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu na ki~nci atta.m vaa attaniya.m vaa samanupassaamii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa daasako yena theraa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``khemako, aavuso, bhikkhu evamaaha -- `pa~ncime, aavuso, upaadaanakkhandhaa vuttaa bhagavataa, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. imesu khvaaha.m, aavuso, pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu na ki~nci atta.m vaa attaniya.m vaa samanupassaamii'''ti. ``ehi tva.m, aavuso daasaka, yena khemako bhikkhu tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa khemaka.m bhikkhu.m eva.m vadehi -- `theraa ta.m, aavuso khemaka, evamaaha.msu -- pa~ncime, aavuso, upaadaanakkhandhaa vuttaa bhagavataa, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. no ce kiraayasmaa khemako imesu ^a^M2.0105^ea^ pa~ncasu ^a^T3.0157^ea^ upaadaanakkhandhesu ki~nci atta.m vaa attaniya.m vaa samanupassati. tenahaayasmaa khemako araha.m khii.naasavo'''ti.

[03] ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa daasako theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa khemako...pe0... theraa ta.m, aavuso khemaka, evamaaha.msu -- ``pa~ncime, aavuso, upaadaanakkhandhaa vuttaa bhagavataa, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho; no ce kiraayasmaa khemako imesu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu ki~nci atta.m vaa attaniya.m vaa samanupassati, tenahaayasmaa khemako araha.m khii.naasavo''ti. ``pa~ncime, aavuso, upaadaanakkhandhaa vuttaa bhagavataa, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. imesu khvaaha.m, aavuso, pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu na ki~nci atta.m vaa attaniya.m vaa samanupassaami ^a^V2.0117^ea^, na camhi araha.m khii.naasavo; api ca me, aavuso, pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu `asmii'ti adhigata.m, `ayamahamasmii'ti na ca samanupassaamii''ti.

[03] atha ^a^P3.0129^ea^ kho aayasmaa daasako yena theraa bhikkhuu...pe0... there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``khemako, aavuso, bhikkhu evamaaha -- pa~ncime, aavuso, upaadaanakkhandhaa vuttaa bhagavataa, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. imesu khvaaha.m, aavuso, pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu na ki~nci atta.m vaa attaniya.m vaa samanupassaami, na camhi araha.m khii.naasavo; api ca me ^a^T3.0158^ea^, aavuso, pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu `asmii'ti adhigata.m, `ayamahamasmii'ti na ca samanupassaamii''ti.

[03] ``ehi tva.m, aavuso daasaka, yena khemako bhikkhu tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa khemaka.m bhikkhu.m eva.m vadehi -- `theraa ta.m, aavuso khemaka, evamaaha.msu -- yameta.m, aavuso khemaka, asmiiti vadesi, kimeta.m asmiiti vadesi? ruupa.m asmiiti vadesi, a~n~natra ruupaa asmiiti vadesi, vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m asmiiti vadesi, a~n~natra vi~n~naa.naa asmiiti vadesi. yameta.m, aavuso khemaka, asmiiti vadesi. kimeta.m asmiiti vadesii'''ti?

[03] ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa daasako theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa khemako tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m khemaka.m etadavoca -- theraa ta.m, aavuso khemaka, evamaaha.msu -- ``yameta.m, aavuso ^a^M2.0106^ea^ khemaka, `asmii'ti vadesi, kimeta.m `asmii'ti vadesi? ruupa.m `asmii'ti vadesi a~n~natra ruupaa `asmii'ti vadesi? vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m `asmii'ti vadesi a~n~natra vi~n~naa.naa `asmii'ti vadesi? yameta.m, aavuso khemaka, `asmii'ti vadesi, kimeta.m `asmii'ti vadesi''ti? ``ala.m, aavuso daasaka, ki.m imaaya sandhaavanikaaya! aaharaavuso, da.n.da.m; ahameva yena theraa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkamissaamii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa khemako da.n.damolubbha yena theraa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa therehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m ^a^T3.0159^ea^ katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^V2.0118^ea^ ^a^P3.0130^ea^ nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m khemaka.m theraa bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``yameta.m, aavuso khemaka, `asmii'ti vadesi, kimeta.m `asmii'ti vadesi? ruupa.m `asmii'ti vadesi, a~n~natra ruupaa `asmii'ti vadesi? vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m `asmii'ti vadesi, a~n~natra vi~n~naa.naa `asmii'ti vadesi? yameta.m, aavuso khemaka, `asmii'ti vadesi, kimeta.m `asmii'ti vadesii''ti? ``na khvaaha.m, aavuso, ruupa.m `asmii'ti vadaami; napi a~n~natra ruupaa `asmii'ti vadaami. na vedana.m... na sa~n~na.m... na sa"nkhaare... na vi~n~naa.na.m `asmii'ti vadaami; napi a~n~natra vi~n~naa.naa `asmii'ti vadaami. api ca me, aavuso, pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu `asmii'ti adhigata.m `ayamahamasmii'ti na ca samanupassaami''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, uppalassa vaa padumassa vaa pu.n.dariikassa vaa gandho. yo nu kho eva.m vadeyya -- `pattassa gandho'ti vaa `va.n.nassa {va.n.dassa (katthaci)} gandho'ti vaa `ki~njakkhassa gandho'ti vaa sammaa nu kho so vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''. ``yathaa katha.m, panaavuso, sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyyaa''ti? ```pupphassa gandho'ti kho, aavuso, sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyyaa''ti. ``evameva khvaaha.m, aavuso, na ruupa.m `asmii'ti vadaami, napi a~n~natra ruupaa `asmii'ti vadaami. na vedana.m... na sa~n~na.m... na sa"nkhaare... na ^a^T3.0160^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.m `asmii'ti vadaami, napi a~n~natra vi~n~naa.naa `asmii'ti vadaami. api ca me, aavuso, pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu `asmii'ti adhigata.m `ayamahamasmii'ti na ca samanupassaami''.

[03] ``ki~ncaapi, aavuso, ariyasaavakassa pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani bhavanti, atha khvassa hoti -- `yo ca pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu anusahagato ^a^M2.0107^ea^ asmiiti maano, asmiiti chando, asmiiti anusayo asamuuhato. so aparena samayena pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassii viharati -- iti ruupa.m, iti ruupassa samudayo, iti ruupassa ^a^P3.0131^ea^ attha"ngamo; iti vedanaa... iti sa~n~naa... iti sa"nkhaaraa... iti vi~n~naa.na.m, iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo'ti. tassimesu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassino viharato yopissa hoti pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu anusahagato `asmii'ti, maano `asmii'ti, chando `asmii'ti anusayo asamuuhato, sopi samugghaata.m gacchati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V2.0119^ea^, aavuso, vattha.m sa.mkili.t.tha.m malaggahita.m. tamena.m saamikaa rajakassa anupadajju.m. tamena.m rajako uuse vaa khaare vaa gomaye vaa sammadditvaa acche udake vikkhaaleti. ki~ncaapi ta.m hoti vattha.m parisuddha.m pariyodaata.m, atha khvassa hoti yeva anusahagato uusagandho vaa khaaragandho vaa gomayagandho vaa asamuuhato. tamena.m rajako saamikaana.m deti. tamena.m saamikaa gandhaparibhaavite kara.n.dake nikkhipanti. yopissa hoti anusahagato uusagandho ^a^T3.0161^ea^ vaa khaaragandho vaa gomayagandho vaa asamuuhato, sopi samugghaata.m gacchati. evameva kho, aavuso, ki~ncaapi ariyasaavakassa pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani bhavanti, atha khvassa hoti yeva pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu anusahagato `asmii'ti, maano `asmii'ti, chando `asmii'ti anusayo asamuuhato. so aparena samayena pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassii viharati. `iti ruupa.m, iti ruupassa samudayo, iti ruupassa attha"ngamo; iti vedanaa... iti sa~n~naa... iti sa"nkhaaraa... iti vi~n~naa.na.m, iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo'ti. tassa imesu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassino viharato yopissa hoti pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu anusahagato `asmii'ti, maano `asmii'ti, chando `asmii'ti anusayo asamuuhato, sopi samugghaata.m gacchatii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, theraa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m khemaka.m etadavocu.m -- ``na kho {na kho pana (ka0)} maya.m aayasmanta.m khemaka.m ^a^P3.0132^ea^ vihesaapekhaa pucchimha, api caayasmaa khemako pahosi tassa bhagavato saasana.m vitthaarena aacikkhitu.m desetu.m pa~n~naapetu.m ^a^M2.0108^ea^ pa.t.thapetu.m vivaritu.m vibhajitu.m uttaaniikaatu.m. tayida.m aayasmataa khemakena tassa bhagavato saasana.m vitthaarena aacikkhita.m desita.m pa~n~naapita.m pa.t.thapita.m vivarita.m vibhajita.m uttaaniikata''nti.

[03] idamavoca aayasmaa khemako. attamanaa theraa bhikkhuu aayasmato khemakassa bhaasita.m abhinandu.m. imasmi~nca pana veyyaakara.nasmi.m ^a^T3.0162^ea^ bha~n~namaane sa.t.thimattaana.m theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m anupaadaaya aasavehi cittaani vimucci.msu, aayasmato khemakassa caati. sattama.m.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0120^ea^ samaya.m sambahulaa theraa bhikkhuu baaraa.nasiya.m viharanti isipatane migadaaye. atha kho aayasmaa channo saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito avaapura.na.m {apaapura.na.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} aadaaya vihaarena vihaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``ovadantu ma.m aayasmanto theraa, anusaasantu ma.m aayasmanto theraa, karontu me aayasmanto theraa dhammi.m katha.m, yathaaha.m dhamma.m passeyya''nti.

[03] eva.m vutte, theraa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m channa.m etadavocu.m -- ``ruupa.m kho, aavuso channa, anicca.m; vedanaa aniccaa; sa~n~naa aniccaa; sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa; vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m. ruupa.m anattaa; vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa. sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa; sabbe dhammaa anattaa''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmato channassa etadahosi -- ``mayhampi kho eta.m eva.m {mayhampi kho eva.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} hoti -- `ruupa.m anicca.m, vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m; ruupa.m anattaa, vedanaa ^a^P3.0133^ea^... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa. sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, sabbe dhammaa anattaa'ti. atha ca pana me sabbasa"nkhaarasamathe sabbuupadhipa.tinissagge ta.nhaakkhaye viraage nirodhe nibbaane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati naadhimuccati. paritassanaa upaadaana.m uppajjati; paccudaavattati maanasa.m -- `atha ko carahi me attaa'ti ^a^T3.0163^ea^? na kho paneva.m dhamma.m passato hoti. ko nu kho me tathaa dhamma.m deseyya yathaaha.m dhamma.m passeyya''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmato channassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa aanando kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ^a^M2.0109^ea^ ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m, pahoti ca me aayasmaa aanando tathaa dhamma.m desetu.m yathaaha.m dhamma.m passeyya.m; atthi ca me aayasmante aanande taavatikaa vissa.t.thi {vissatthi (?)}. ya.mnuunaaha.m yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkameyya''nti. atha kho aayasmaa channo senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena kosambii ghositaaraamo yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa channo aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca --

[03] ``ekamidaaha.m ^a^V2.0121^ea^, aavuso aananda, samaya.m baaraa.nasiya.m viharaami isipatane migadaaye. atha khvaaha.m, aavuso, saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito avaapura.na.m aadaaya vihaarena vihaara.m upasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa there bhikkhuu etadavoca.m -- `ovadantu ma.m aayasmanto theraa, anusaasantu ma.m aayasmanto theraa, karontu me aayasmanto theraa dhammi.m katha.m yathaaha.m dhamma.m passeyya'nti. eva.m vutte ma.m, aavuso, theraa bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- `ruupa.m kho, aavuso channa, anicca.m; vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m; ruupa.m anattaa...pe0... vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^T3.0164^ea^ anattaa. sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, sabbe dhammaa anattaa'''ti.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- `mayhampi kho eta.m ^a^P3.0134^ea^ eva.m hoti -- ruupa.m anicca.m...pe0... vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m, ruupa.m anattaa, vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa. sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, sabbe dhammaa anattaa'ti. atha ca pana me sabbasa"nkhaarasamathe sabbuupadhipa.tinissagge ta.nhaakkhaye viraage nirodhe nibbaane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati naadhimuccati. paritassanaa upaadaana.m uppajjati; paccudaavattati maanasa.m -- `atha ko carahi me attaa'ti? na kho paneva.m dhamma.m passato hoti. ko nu kho me tathaa dhamma.m deseyya yathaaha.m dhamma.m passeyyanti!

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa aanando kosambiya.m viharati ghositaraame satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m, pahoti ca me aayasmaa aanando tathaa dhamma.m desetu.m yathaaha.m dhamma.m passeyya.m. atthi ca me aayasmante aanande ^a^M2.0110^ea^ taavatikaa vissa.t.thi. ya.mnuunaaha.m yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkameyya'nti. ovadatu ma.m, aayasmaa aanando; anusaasatu ma.m, aayasmaa aanando; karotu me, aayasmaa aanando dhammi.m katha.m yathaaha.m dhamma.m passeyya''nti.

[03] ``ettakenapi maya.m aayasmato channassa attamanaa api naama ta.m {attamanaa abhiraddhaa, ta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} aayasmaa channo aavi akaasi khiila.m chindi {pabhindi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. odahaavuso, channa ^a^T3.0165^ea^, sota.m; bhabbosi {bhabbo tva.m (ka0)} dhamma.m vi~n~naatu''nti. atha kho aayasmato channassa taavatakeneva {taavadeva (sii0)} u.laara.m piitipaamojja.m uppajji -- ``bhabbo kirasmi dhamma.m vi~n~naatu''nti.

[03] ``sammukhaa ^a^V2.0122^ea^ meta.m, aavuso channa, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa ca pa.tiggahita.m kaccaanagotta.m bhikkhu.m ovadantassa -- dvayanissito khvaaya.m, kaccaana, loko yebhuyyena ^a^P3.0135^ea^ atthita~nceva natthita~nca. lokasamudaya.m kho, kaccaana, yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato yaa loke natthitaa, saa na hoti. lokanirodha.m kho, kaccaana, yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passato yaa loke atthitaa, saa na hoti. upayupaadaanaabhinivesavinibandho khvaaya.m, kaccaana, loko yebhuyyena ta.m caaya.m upayupaadaana.m cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusaya.m na upeti na upaadiyati naadhi.t.thaati `attaa me'ti. dukkhameva uppajjamaana.m uppajjati, dukkha.m nirujjhamaana.m nirujjhatiiti na ka"nkhati na vicikicchati. aparappaccayaa ~naa.namevassa ettha hoti. ettaavataa kho, kaccaana, sammaadi.t.thi hoti. sabbamatthiiti kho, kaccaana, ayameko anto. sabba.m natthiiti aya.m dutiyo anto. ete te, kaccaana, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathaagato dhamma.m deseti -- avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. avijjaaya tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii''ti.

[03] ``evameta.m, aavuso aananda, hoti yesa.m aayasmantaana.m taadisaa sabrahmacaarayo ^a^T3.0166^ea^ anukampakaa atthakaamaa ovaadakaa anusaasakaa. ida~nca pana me aayasmato aanandassa dhammadesana.m sutvaa dhammo abhisamito''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0111^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa raahulo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa raahulo bhagavanta.m ^a^P3.0136^ea^ etadavoca -- ``katha.m nu kho, bhante, jaanato katha.m passato imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayaa na hontii''ti?

[03] ``ya.m ki~nci, raahula, ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. yaa kaaci vedanaa ^a^V2.0123^ea^... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa... ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa...pe0... sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. eva.m kho, raahula, jaanato eva.m passato imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayaa na hontii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa raahulo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katha.m nu kho, bhante, jaanato katha.m passato imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaapagata.m ^a^T3.0167^ea^ maanasa.m hoti vidhaasamatikkanta.m santa.m suvimutta''nti? ``ya.m ki~nci, raahula, ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa...pe0... ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa anupaadaa vimutto hoti. yaa kaaci vedanaa... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa... ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m ^a^P3.0137^ea^ sammappa~n~naaya disvaa anupaadaa vimutto hoti. eva.m kho, raahula ^a^M2.0112^ea^, jaanato eva.m passato imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaapagata.m maanasa.m hoti vidhaa samatikkanta.m santa.m suvimutta''nti. dasama.m.
[06] theravaggo navamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] aanando ^a^V2.0124^ea^ tisso yamako, anuraadho ca vakkali.
[22] assaji khemako channo, raahulaa apare duve..

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0168^ea^. ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, nadii pabbateyyaa ohaarinii duura"ngamaa siighasotaa. tassaa ubhosu tiiresu {ubhato tiire (sii0), ubhato tiiresu (syaa0 ka.m0)} kaasaa cepi jaataa assu, te na.m ajjholambeyyu.m; kusaa cepi jaataa assu, te na.m ajjholambeyyu.m; pabbajaa {babbajaa (sii0 pii0)} cepi jaataa assu, te na.m ajjholambeyyu.m; biira.naa cepi jaataa assu, te na.m ajjholambeyyu.m; rukkhaa cepi jaataa assu, te na.m ajjholambeyyu.m. tassaa puriso sotena vuyhamaano kaase cepi ga.nheyya, te palujjeyyu.m. so tatonidaana.m anayabyasana.m aapajjeyya. kuse cepi ga.nheyya, pabbaje cepi ga.nheyya, biira.ne cepi ga.nheyya, rukkhe cepi ga.nheyya, te palujjeyyu.m ^a^P3.0138^ea^. so tatonidaana.m anayabyasana.m aapajjeyya. evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito ruupa.m attato samanupassati, ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. tassa ta.m ruupa.m palujjati. so tatonidaana.m anayabyasana.m aapajjati. vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m ^a^M2.0113^ea^; attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^T3.0169^ea^, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. tassa ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m palujjati. so tatonidaana.m anayabyasana.m aapajjati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m bhante''. ``vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m bhante''. ``tasmaatiha...pe0... eva.m passa.m...pe0... ^a^V2.0125^ea^ naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, lokena vivadaami, lokova mayaa vivadati. na, bhikkhave, dhammavaadii kenaci lokasmi.m vivadati. ya.m, bhikkhave, natthisammata.m loke pa.n.ditaana.m, ahampi ta.m `natthii'ti vadaami. ya.m, bhikkhave, atthisammata.m loke pa.n.ditaana.m, ahampi ta.m `atthii'ti vadaami''.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, natthisammata.m loke pa.n.ditaana.m, yamaha.m `natthii'ti vadaami? ruupa.m ^a^P3.0139^ea^, bhikkhave, nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m natthisammata.m loke pa.n.ditaana.m; ahampi ta.m `natthii'ti vadaami. vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m natthisammata.m loke pa.n.ditaana.m; ahampi ta.m `natthii'ti vadaami. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, natthisammata.m loke pa.n.ditaana.m; ahampi ta.m `natthii'ti vadaami''.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, atthisammata.m loke pa.n.ditaana.m, yamaha.m `atthii'ti vadaami? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m atthisammata.m loke pa.n.ditaana.m; ahampi ta.m `atthii'ti vadaami. vedanaa aniccaa...pe0... vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m ^a^T3.0170^ea^ dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m atthisammata.m loke pa.n.ditaana.m; ahampi ta.m `atthii'ti vadaami. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, atthisammata.m loke pa.n.ditaana.m; ahampi ta.m `atthii'ti vadaami''.
[03] ``atthi, bhikkhave, loke lokadhammo, ta.m tathaagato abhisambujjhati abhisameti; abhisambujjhitvaa abhisametvaa ta.m aacikkhati deseti pa~n~napeti pa.t.thapeti vivarati vibhajati uttaaniikaroti.

[03] ``ki~nca ^a^V2.0126^ea^, bhikkhave, loke lokadhammo, ta.m tathaagato abhisambujjhati abhisameti, abhisambujjhitvaa abhisametvaa aacikkhati deseti pa~n~napeti pa.t.thapeti vivarati vibhajati uttaaniikaroti? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, loke lokadhammo ta.m tathaagato abhisambujjhati abhisameti. abhisambujjhitvaa ^a^M2.0114^ea^ abhisametvaa aacikkhati deseti pa~n~napeti pa.t.thapeti vivarati vibhajati uttaaniikaroti.

[03] ``yo, bhikkhave, tathaagatena eva.m aacikkhiyamaane desiyamaane pa~n~napiyamaane pa.t.thapiyamaane vivariyamaane ^a^P3.0140^ea^ vibhajiyamaane uttaaniikariyamaane na jaanaati na passati tamaha.m, bhikkhave, baala.m puthujjana.m andha.m acakkhuka.m ajaananta.m apassanta.m kinti karomi! vedanaa, bhikkhave, loke lokadhammo...pe0... sa~n~naa, bhikkhave... sa"nkhaaraa, bhikkhave... vi~n~naa.na.m, bhikkhave, loke lokadhammo ta.m tathaagato abhisambujjhati abhisameti. abhisambujjhitvaa abhisametvaa aacikkhati deseti pa~n~napeti pa.t.thapeti vivarati vibhajati uttaaniikaroti.

[03] ``yo, bhikkhave, tathaagatena eva.m aacikkhiyamaane desiyamaane pa~n~napiyamaane pa.t.thapiyamaane vivariyamaane vibhajiyamaane uttaaniikariyamaane na ^a^T3.0171^ea^ jaanaati na passati tamaha.m, bhikkhave, baala.m puthujjana.m andha.m acakkhuka.m ajaananta.m apassanta.m kinti karomi!

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, uppala.m vaa paduma.m vaa pu.n.dariika.m vaa udake jaata.m udake sa.mva.d.dha.m udakaa accuggamma .thaati {ti.t.thanta.m (ka0)} anupalitta.m udakena; evameva kho, bhikkhave, tathaagato loke jaato loke sa.mva.d.dho loka.m abhibhuyya viharati anupalitto lokenaa''ti. dutiya.m.
[03] 95^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa ayujjhaaya.m {ayojjhaaya.m (sii0 pii0)} viharati ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiire. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aya.m ga"ngaa nadii mahanta.m phe.napi.n.da.m aavaheyya. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso passeyya nijjhaayeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya. tassa ta.m passato nijjhaayato yoniso upaparikkhato ^a^V2.0127^ea^ rittaka~n~neva khaayeyya, tucchaka~n~neva khaayeyya, asaaraka~n~neva khaayeyya. ki~nhi siyaa, bhikkhave, phe.napi.n.de saaro? evameva kho, bhikkhave, ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m...pe0... ya.m duure santike vaa ta.m bhikkhu ^a^P3.0141^ea^ passati nijjhaayati yoniso upaparikkhati. tassa ta.m passato nijjhaayato yoniso upaparikkhato rittaka~n~neva khaayati ^a^M2.0115^ea^, tucchaka~n~neva khaayati, asaaraka~n~neva khaayati. ki~nhi siyaa, bhikkhave, ruupe saaro?

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saradasamaye thullaphusitake deve vassante udake udakapubbu.la.m {udakabubbu.la.m (sii0 pii0)} uppajjati ceva nirujjhati ca. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso ^a^T3.0172^ea^ passeyya nijjhaayeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya. tassa ta.m passato nijjhaayato yoniso upaparikkhato rittaka~n~neva khaayeyya, tucchaka~n~neva khaayeyya, asaaraka~n~neva khaayeyya. ki~nhi siyaa, bhikkhave, udakapubbu.le saaro? evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaa kaaci vedanaa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa...pe0... yaa duure santike vaa ta.m bhikkhu passati nijjhaayati yoniso upaparikkhati. tassa ta.m passato nijjhaayato yoniso upaparikkhato rittaka~n~neva khaayati, tucchaka~n~neva khaayati, asaaraka~n~neva khaayati. ki~nhi siyaa, bhikkhave, vedanaaya saaro?

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, gimhaana.m pacchime maase .thite majjhanhike kaale mariicikaa phandati. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso passeyya nijjhaayeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya. tassa ta.m passato nijjhaayato yoniso upaparikkhato rittaka~n~neva khaayeyya, tucchaka~n~neva khaayeyya...pe0... ki~nhi siyaa, bhikkhave, mariicikaaya saaro? evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaa kaaci sa~n~naa...pe0....

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano ti.nha.m ku.thaari.m {kudhaari.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} aadaaya vana.m paviseyya. so tattha passeyya mahanta.m kadalikkhandha.m uju.m nava.m akukkukajaata.m {akukkajaata.m (ka0 sii0 pii0), akusajaata.m (ka0 sii0), akukkujakajaata.m (ka0)}. tamena.m muule chindeyya; muule chetvaa agge chindeyya, agge chetvaa pattava.t.ti.m vinibbhujeyya. so tassa pattava.t.ti.m vinibbhujanto pheggumpi ^a^T3.0173^ea^ naadhigaccheyya, kuto saara.m! tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso passeyya nijjhaayeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya. tassa ta.m passato nijjhaayato yoniso upaparikkhato ^a^P3.0142^ea^ rittaka~n~neva khaayeyya, tucchaka~n~neva khaayeyya, asaaraka~n~neva ^a^V2.0128^ea^ khaayeyya. ki~nhi siyaa, bhikkhave, kadalikkhandhe saaro? evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci sa"nkhaaraa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa...pe0... ye ^a^M2.0116^ea^ duure santike vaa ta.m bhikkhu passati nijjhaayati yoniso upaparikkhati. tassa ta.m passato nijjhaayato yoniso upaparikkhato rittaka~n~neva khaayati, tucchaka~n~neva khaayati, asaaraka~n~neva khaayati. ki~nhi siyaa, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaresu saaro?

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, maayaakaaro vaa maayaakaarantevaasii vaa catumahaapathe {caatummahaapathe (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} maaya.m vida.mseyya. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso passeyya nijjhaayeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya. tassa ta.m passato nijjhaayato yoniso upaparikkhato rittaka~n~neva khaayeyya, tucchaka~n~neva khaayeyya, asaaraka~n~neva khaayeyya. ki~nhi siyaa, bhikkhave, maayaaya saaro? evameva kho, bhikkhave, ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m...pe0... ya.m duure santike vaa, ta.m bhikkhu passati nijjhaayati yoniso upaparikkhati. tassa ta.m passato nijjhaayato yoniso upaparikkhato rittaka~n~neva khaayati, tucchaka~n~neva khaayati, asaaraka~n~neva khaayati. ki~nhi siyaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.ne saaro?

[03] ``eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanaayapi... sa~n~naayapi... sa"nkhaaresupi ^a^T3.0174^ea^... vi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaati''.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``phe.napi.n.duupama.m ruupa.m, vedanaa bubbu.luupamaa {bubbuluupamaa (sii0), pubbu.lopamaa (ka0)}.
[27] mariicikuupamaa sa~n~naa, sa"nkhaaraa kadaluupamaa.
[22] maayuupama~nca vi~n~naa.na.m, desitaadiccabandhunaa..
[21] ``yathaa yathaa nijjhaayati, yoniso upaparikkhati.
[22] rittaka.m tucchaka.m hoti, yo na.m passati yoniso..
[21] ``ima~nca ^a^V2.0129^ea^ ^a^P3.0143^ea^ kaaya.m aarabbha, bhuuripa~n~nena desita.m.
[22] pahaana.m ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m, ruupa.m passatha {passetha (sii0)} cha.d.dita.m..
[21] ``aayu ^a^M2.0117^ea^ usmaa ca vi~n~naa.na.m, yadaa kaaya.m jahantima.m.
[22] apaviddho {apavi.t.tho (syaa0 ka.m0)} tadaa seti, parabhatta.m acetana.m..
[21] ``etaadisaaya.m santaano, maayaaya.m baalalaapinii.
[22] vadhako esa akkhaato, saaro ettha na vijjati..
[21] ``eva.m khandhe avekkheyya, bhikkhu aaraddhaviiriyo.
[22] divaa vaa yadi vaa ratti.m, sampajaano pa.tissato..
[21] ``jaheyya sabbasa.myoga.m, kareyya sara.nattano.
[22] careyyaadittasiisova, patthaya.m accuta.m pada''nti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0175^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``atthi nu kho, bhante, ki~nci ruupa.m ya.m ruupa.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassati? atthi nu kho, bhante, kaaci vedanaa yaa vedanaa niccaa dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa sassatisama.m tatheva .thassati? atthi nu kho, bhante, kaaci sa~n~naa yaa sa~n~naa...pe0... atthi nu kho, bhante, keci sa"nkhaaraa ye sa"nkhaaraa niccaa dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa sassatisama.m tatheva .thassanti? atthi nu kho, bhante, ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m, ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m ^a^P3.0144^ea^ dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassatii''ti? ``natthi kho, bhikkhu, ki~nci ruupa.m, ya.m ruupa.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassati. natthi kho, bhikkhu, kaaci vedanaa... kaaci sa~n~naa... keci sa"nkhaaraa... ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^V2.0130^ea^, ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassatii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa paritta.m gomayapi.n.da.m paa.ninaa gahetvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``ettakopi kho, bhikkhu, attabhaavapa.tilaabho natthi nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo sassatisama.m tatheva .thassati. ettako cepi, bhikkhu, attabhaavapa.tilaabho abhavissa nicco dhuvo sassato ^a^M2.0118^ea^ avipari.naamadhammo, nayida.m brahmacariyavaaso pa~n~naayetha sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhu, ettakopi attabhaavapa.tilaabho ^a^T3.0176^ea^ natthi nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo, tasmaa brahmacariyavaaso pa~n~naayati sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya.

[03] ``bhuutapubbaaha.m, bhikkhu, raajaa ahosi.m khattiyo muddhaavasitto. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhu, ra~n~no sato khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa caturaasiitinagarasahassaani ahesu.m kusaavatii raajadhaanippamukhaani. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhu, ra~n~no sato khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa caturaasiitipaasaadasahassaani ahesu.m dhammapaasaadappamukhaani. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhu, ra~n~no sato khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa caturaasiitikuu.taagaarasahassaani ahesu.m mahaabyuuhakuu.taagaarappamukhaani {mahaaviyuuhakuu.taagaarappamukhaani (dii0 ni0 2.263)}. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhu, ra~n~no sato khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa caturaasiitipalla"nkasahassaani ahesu.m dantamayaani saaramayaani sova.n.namayaani go.nakatthataani pa.tikatthataani pa.talikatthataani kadalimigapavarapaccatthara.naani ^a^P3.0145^ea^ {kaadalimigapavarapaccatthara.naani (sii0)} sauttaracchadaani ubhatolohitakuupadhaanaani. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhu, ra~n~no sato khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa caturaasiitinaagasahassaani ahesu.m sova.n.naala"nkaaraani sova.n.naddhajaani hemajaalapa.ticchannaani uposathanaagaraajappamukhaani. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhu, ra~n~no sato khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa caturaasiitiassasahassaani ahesu.m sova.n.naala"nkaaraani sova.n.naddhajaani hemajaalapa.ticchannaani ^a^T3.0177^ea^ valaahakaassaraajappamukhaani. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhu, ra~n~no sato khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa caturaasiitirathasahassaani ahesu.m sova.n.naala"nkaaraani sova.n.naddhajaani hemajaalapa.ticchannaani vejayantarathappamukhaani. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhu, ra~n~no sato khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa caturaasiitima.nisahassaani ahesu.m ma.niratanappamukhaani. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhu...pe0... caturaasiitiitthisahassaani ahesu.m subhaddaadevippamukhaani. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhu...pe0... caturaasiitikhattiyasahassaani ahesu.m anuyantaani pari.naayakaratanappamukhaani. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhu...pe0... caturaasiitidhenusahassaani ahesu.m dukuulasandanaani ka.msuupadhaara.naani. tassa ^a^V2.0131^ea^ mayha.m, bhikkhu...pe0... caturaasiitivatthako.tisahassaani ahesu.m khomasukhumaani koseyyasukhumaani kambalasukhumaani ^a^M2.0119^ea^ kappaasikasukhumaani. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhu...pe0... caturaasiitithaalipaakasahassaani ahesu.m; saaya.m paata.m bhattaabhihaaro abhihariyittha.

[03] ``tesa.m kho pana, bhikkhu, caturaasiitiyaa nagarasahassaana.m eka~n~neva ta.m nagara.m hoti yamaha.m tena samayena ajjhaavasaami -- kusaavatii raajadhaanii. tesa.m kho pana, bhikkhu, caturaasiitiyaa paasaadasahassaana.m ^a^P3.0146^ea^ ekoyeva so paasaado hoti yamaha.m tena samayena ajjhaavasaami -- dhammo paasaado. tesa.m kho pana, bhikkhu, caturaasiitiyaa kuu.taagaarasahassaana.m eka~n~neva ta.m kuu.taagaara.m hoti yamaha.m tena samayena ajjhaavasaami -- mahaabyuuha.m kuu.taagaara.m. tesa.m kho pana, bhikkhu, caturaasiitiyaa palla"nkasahassaana.m ekoyeva so palla"nko hoti yamaha.m tena samayena paribhu~njaami -- dantamayo vaa saaramayo vaa sova.n.namayo ^a^T3.0178^ea^ vaa ruupiyamayo vaa. tesa.m kho pana, bhikkhu, caturaasiitiyaa naagasahassaana.m ekoyeva so naago hoti yamaha.m tena samayena abhiruhaami -- uposatho naagaraajaa. tesa.m kho pana, bhikkhu, caturaasiitiyaa assasahassaana.m ekoyeva so asso hoti yamaha.m tena samayena abhiruhaami -- valaahako assaraajaa. tesa.m kho pana, bhikkhu, caturaasiitiyaa rathasahassaana.m ekoyeva so ratho hoti yamaha.m tena samayena abhiruhaami -- vejayanto ratho. tesa.m kho pana, bhikkhu, caturaasiitiyaa itthisahassaana.m ekaayeva saa itthii hoti yaa ma.m tena samayena paccupa.t.thaati -- khattiyaanii vaa velaamikaa vaa. tesa.m kho pana, bhikkhu, caturaasiitiyaa vatthako.tisahassaana.m eka~n~neva ta.m vatthayuga.m hoti yamaha.m tena samayena paridahaami -- khomasukhuma.m vaa koseyyasukhuma.m vaa kambalasukhuma.m vaa kappaasikasukhuma.m vaa. tesa.m kho pana, bhikkhu, caturaasiitiyaa thaalipaakasahassaana.m ekoyeva so thaalipaako hoti yato naa.likodanaparama.m bhu~njaami tadupiya~nca suupeyya.m {suupabya~njana.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}. iti kho, bhikkhu, sabbe te sa"nkhaaraa atiitaa niruddhaa vipari.nataa. eva.m aniccaa kho, bhikkhu, sa"nkhaaraa. eva.m addhuvaa kho, bhikkhu, sa"nkhaaraa. eva.m anassaasikaa kho, bhikkhu, sa"nkhaaraa. yaava~ncida.m ^a^P3.0147^ea^, bhikkhu, alameva sabbasa"nkhaaresu nibbinditu.m, ala.m virajjitu.m, ala.m vimuccitu''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0132^ea^ ^a^M2.0120^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu ^a^T3.0179^ea^ bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``atthi nu kho, bhante, ki~nci ruupa.m ya.m ruupa.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassati? atthi nu kho, bhante, kaaci vedanaa yaa vedanaa niccaa dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa sassatisama.m tatheva .thassati? atthi nu kho, bhante, kaaci sa~n~naa...pe0... keci sa"nkhaaraa, ye sa"nkhaaraa niccaa dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa sassatisama.m tatheva .thassanti? atthi nu kho, bhante, ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m, ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassatii''ti? ``natthi kho, bhikkhu, ki~nci ruupa.m, ya.m ruupa.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassati. natthi kho, bhikkhu, kaaci vedanaa... kaaci sa~n~naa... keci sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m, ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassatii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa paritta.m nakhasikhaaya.m pa.msu.m aaropetvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``ettakampi kho, bhikkhu, ruupa.m natthi nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassati. ettaka.m cepi, bhikkhu, ruupa.m abhavissa nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m, nayida.m brahmacariyavaaso pa~n~naayetha sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhu, ettakampi ruupa.m natthi nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m, tasmaa brahmacariyavaaso pa~n~naayati sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya''.

[03] ``ettakaapi ^a^P3.0148^ea^ kho, bhikkhu, vedanaa natthi niccaa dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa sassatisama.m ^a^T3.0180^ea^ tatheva .thassati. ettakaa cepi, bhikkhu, vedanaa abhavissa niccaa dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa, na yida.m brahmacariyavaaso pa~n~naayetha sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhu, ettakaapi vedanaa natthi niccaa dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa, tasmaa brahmacariyavaaso pa~n~naayati sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya.

[03] ``ettakaapi kho, bhikkhu, sa~n~naa natthi...pe0... ettakaapi kho, bhikkhu, sa"nkhaaraa natthi niccaa ^a^V2.0133^ea^ dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa sassatisama.m tatheva .thassanti. ettakaa cepi, bhikkhu, sa"nkhaaraa abhavissa.msu niccaa dhuvaa sassataa ^a^M2.0121^ea^ avipari.naamadhammaa, na yida.m brahmacariyavaaso pa~n~naayetha sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhu, ettakaapi sa"nkhaaraa natthi niccaa dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa, tasmaa brahmacariyavaaso pa~n~naayati sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya.

[03] ``ettakampi kho, bhikkhu, vi~n~naa.na.m natthi nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassati. ettakampi kho, bhikkhu, vi~n~naa.na.m abhavissa nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m, na yida.m brahmacariyavaaso pa~n~naayetha sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhu, ettakampi vi~n~naa.na.m natthi nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m, tasmaa brahmacariyavaaso pa~n~naayati sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, bhikkhu, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m ^a^P3.0149^ea^ bhante''...pe0... ``tasmaatiha...pe0... eva.m ^a^T3.0181^ea^ passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``atthi nu kho, bhante, ki~nci ruupa.m, ya.m ruupa.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassati? atthi nu kho, bhante, kaaci vedanaa...pe0... kaaci sa~n~naa... keci sa"nkhaaraa... ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m, ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassatii''ti? ``natthi kho, bhikkhu, ki~nci ruupa.m ya.m ruupa.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m ^a^V2.0134^ea^ avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassati. natthi kho, bhikkhu, kaaci vedanaa... kaaci sa~n~naa... keci sa"nkhaaraa... ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m, ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m avipari.naamadhamma.m sassatisama.m tatheva .thassatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m mahaasamuddo ussussati visussati na ^a^M2.0122^ea^ bhavati; na tvevaaha.m, bhikkhave, avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m dukkhassa antakiriya.m vadaami. hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m sineru pabbataraajaa .dayhati vinassati na bhavati; na tvevaaha.m, bhikkhave, avijjaaniivara.naana.m ^a^P3.0150^ea^ sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m ^a^T3.0182^ea^ dukkhassa antakiriya.m vadaami. hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m mahaapathavii .dayhati vinassati na bhavati; na tvevaaha.m, bhikkhave, avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m dukkhassa antakiriya.m vadaami''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saa gaddulabaddho {gadduulabandho (syaa0 ka.m0)} da.lhe khiile vaa thambhe vaa upanibaddho tameva khiila.m vaa thambha.m vaa anuparidhaavati anuparivattati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii...pe0... sappurisadhamme aviniito ruupa.m attato samanupassati...pe0... vedana.m attato samanupassati... sa~n~na.m attato samanupassati... sa"nkhaare attato samanupassati... vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. so ruupa~n~neva anuparidhaavati anuparivattati, vedana~n~neva...pe0... sa~n~na~n~neva... sa"nkhaareyeva... vi~n~naa.na~n~neva anuparidhaavati anuparivattati. so ruupa.m anuparidhaava.m anuparivatta.m, vedana.m...pe0... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m anuparidhaava.m anuparivatta.m, na parimuccati ruupamhaa, na parimuccati vedanaaya, na parimuccati sa~n~naaya, na parimuccati sa"nkhaarehi, na parimuccati vi~n~naa.namhaa, na parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraamara.nena sokehi ^a^V2.0135^ea^ paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi. `na parimuccati dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami''.

[03] ``sutavaa ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako ariyaana.m dassaavii...pe0... sappurisadhamme suviniito, na ruupa.m attato ^a^T3.0183^ea^ samanupassati...pe0... na vedana.m... na sa~n~na.m... na sa"nkhaare... na vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, na vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m; na attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, na vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. so ruupa.m naanuparidhaavati naanuparivattati, vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m naanuparidhaavati naanuparivattati. so ruupa.m ananuparidhaava.m ananuparivatta.m, vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m ananuparidhaava.m ananuparivatta.m; parimuccati ruupamhaa, parimuccati vedanaaya, parimuccati sa~n~naaya, parimuccati sa"nkhaarehi, parimuccati vi~n~naa.namhaa, parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraamara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi. `parimuccati dukkhasmaa'ti vadaamii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0123^ea^ ^a^P3.0151^ea^. ``anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saa gaddulabaddho da.lhe khiile vaa thambhe vaa upanibaddho. so gacchati cepi tameva khiila.m vaa thambha.m vaa upagacchati; ti.t.thati cepi tameva khiila.m vaa thambha.m vaa upati.t.thati; nisiidati cepi tameva khiila.m vaa thambha.m vaa upanisiidati; nipajjati cepi tameva khiila.m vaa thambha.m vaa upanipajjati. evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ruupa.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati. vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me ^a^T3.0184^ea^ attaa'ti samanupassati. so gacchati cepi ime pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhe upagacchati; ti.t.thati cepi ime pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhe upati.t.thati; nisiidati cepi ime pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhe upanisiidati; nipajjati cepi ime pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhe upanipajjati. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, abhikkha.na.m saka.m citta.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `diigharattamida.m ^a^V2.0136^ea^ citta.m sa.mkili.t.tha.m raagena dosena mohenaa'ti. cittasa.mkilesaa, bhikkhave, sattaa sa.mkilissanti; cittavodaanaa sattaa visujjhanti.

[03] ``di.t.tha.m vo, bhikkhave, cara.na.m naama citta''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``tampi kho, bhikkhave, cara.na.m naama citta.m citteneva cittita.m. tenapi kho, bhikkhave, cara.nena cittena citta~n~neva cittatara.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, abhikkha.na.m saka.m citta.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `diigharattamida.m citta.m sa.mkili.t.tha.m raagena dosena mohenaa'ti. cittasa.mkilesaa, bhikkhave, sattaa sa.mkilissanti; cittavodaanaa sattaa visujjhanti.

[01] ``naaha.m ^a^P3.0152^ea^, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekanikaayampi samanupassaami eva.m citta.m. yathayida.m, bhikkhave, tiracchaanagataa paa.naa, tepi kho, bhikkhave, tiracchaanagataa paa.naa citteneva cittitaa, tehipi kho, bhikkhave, tiracchaanagatehi paa.nehi citta~n~neva cittatara.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, abhikkha.na.m saka.m citta.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `diigharattamida.m citta.m sa.mkili.t.tha.m raagena dosena mohenaa'ti. cittasa.mkilesaa, bhikkhave, sattaa sa.mkilissanti; cittavodaanaa sattaa visujjhanti.

[01] ``seyyathaapi ^a^T3.0185^ea^ ^a^M2.0124^ea^, bhikkhave, rajako vaa cittakaarako vaa rajanaaya vaa laakhaaya vaa haliddiyaa vaa niiliyaa vaa ma~nji.t.thaaya {ma~nje.t.thaaya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), ma~nje.t.thiyaa (pii0)} vaa suparima.t.the phalake vaa bhittiyaa vaa dussapa.t.te vaa itthiruupa.m vaa purisaruupa.m vaa abhinimmineyya sabba"ngapacca"ngi.m; evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ruupa~n~neva abhinibbattento abhinibbatteti, vedana~n~neva...pe0... sa~n~na~n~neva... sa"nkhaare yeva... vi~n~naa.na~n~neva abhinibbattento abhinibbatteti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0137^ea^. ``jaanato aha.m, bhikkhave, passato aasavaana.m khaya.m vadaami, no ajaanato no apassato. ki~nca, bhikkhave, jaanato ki.m passato aasavaana.m khayo hoti? `iti ruupa.m, iti ruupassa samudayo, iti ruupassa attha"ngamo; iti vedanaa... iti sa~n~naa... iti sa"nkhaaraa... iti vi~n~naa.na.m, iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa ^a^P3.0153^ea^ attha"ngamo'ti -- eva.m kho, bhikkhave, jaanato eva.m passato aasavaana.m khayo hoti''.

[03] ``bhaavanaanuyoga.m ananuyuttassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viharato ki~ncaapi eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata me anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucceyyaa'ti, atha khvassa neva anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m ^a^T3.0186^ea^ vimuccati. ta.m kissa hetu? `abhaavitattaa' tissa vacaniiya.m. kissa abhaavitattaa? abhaavitattaa catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m, abhaavitattaa catunna.m sammappadhaanaana.m, abhaavitattaa catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m, abhaavitattaa pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m, abhaavitattaa pa~ncanna.m balaana.m, abhaavitattaa sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m, abhaavitattaa ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa.
