[01] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kukku.tiyaa a.n.daani a.t.tha vaa dasa vaa dvaadasa vaa. taanassu kukku.tiyaa na sammaa adhisayitaani, na sammaa pariseditaani, na sammaa paribhaavitaani. ki~ncaapi tassaa kukku.tiyaa eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho, vata me ^a^M2.0125^ea^ kukku.tapotakaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjeyyu'nti, atha kho abhabbaava te kukku.tapotakaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjitu.m. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi pana, bhikkhave, kukku.tiyaa a.n.daani a.t.tha vaa dasa vaa dvaadasa vaa; taani kukku.tiyaa na sammaa adhisayitaani, na sammaa pariseditaani, na sammaa paribhaavitaani. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhaavanaanuyoga.m ananuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato ki~ncaapi eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho, vata me anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucceyyaa'ti, atha khvassa neva anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccati. ta.m kissa hetu? `abhaavitattaa'tissa ^a^V2.0138^ea^ vacaniiya.m. kissa abhaavitattaa? abhaavitattaa catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m...pe0... ^a^T3.0187^ea^ a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa.

[03] ``bhaavanaanuyoga.m anuyuttassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viharato ^a^P3.0154^ea^ ki~ncaapi na eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata me anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucceyyaa'ti, atha khvassa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccati. ta.m kissa hetu? `bhaavitattaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. kissa bhaavitattaa? bhaavitattaa catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m, bhaavitattaa catunna.m sammappadhaanaana.m, bhaavitattaa catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m, bhaavitattaa pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m, bhaavitattaa pa~ncanna.m balaana.m, bhaavitattaa sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m, bhaavitattaa ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa.

[01] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kukku.tiyaa a.n.daani a.t.tha vaa dasa vaa dvaadasa vaa. taanassu kukku.tiyaa sammaa adhisayitaani, sammaa pariseditaani, sammaa paribhaavitaani ^a^T3.0188^ea^. ki~ncaapi tassaa kukku.tiyaa na eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata me kukku.tapotakaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjeyyu'nti, atha kho bhabbaava te kukku.tapotakaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjitu.m. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi pana, bhikkhave, kukku.tiyaa a.n.daani a.t.tha vaa dasa vaa dvaadasa vaa; taanassu kukku.tiyaa sammaa adhisayitaani, sammaa pariseditaani, sammaa paribhaavitaani. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhaavanaanuyoga.m anuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato ki~ncaapi na eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata me anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucceyyaa'ti, atha khvassa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccati. ta.m kissa hetu? `bhaavitattaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. kissa ^a^M2.0126^ea^ bhaavitattaa? bhaavitattaa catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m...pe0... bhaavitattaa ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa.

[01] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, palaga.n.dassa vaa palaga.n.dantevaasissa vaa vaasija.te dissanteva a"ngulipadaani dissati a"ngu.t.thapada.m. no ca khvassa eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `ettaka.m vata me ajja vaasija.tassa khii.na.m, ettaka.m hiyyo, ettaka.m pare'ti. atha khvassa khii.ne khii.nantveva ~naa.na.m hoti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhaavanaanuyoga.m anuyuttassa ^a^P3.0155^ea^ bhikkhuno viharato ki~ncaapi ^a^V2.0139^ea^ na eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `ettaka.m vata me ajja aasavaana.m khii.na.m, ettaka.m hiyyo, ettaka.m pare'ti, atha khvassa khii.ne khii.nantveva ~naa.na.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saamuddikaaya naavaaya vettabandhanabaddhaaya vassamaasaani udake pariyaadaaya hemantikena thala.m ukkhittaaya vaataatapaparetaani vettabandhanaani. taani paavusakena meghena abhippavu.t.thaani appakasireneva pa.tippassambhanti ^a^T3.0189^ea^ puutikaani bhavanti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhaavanaanuyoga.m anuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato appakasireneva sa.myojanaani pa.tippassambhanti puutikaani bhavantii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``aniccasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa sabba.m kaamaraaga.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m ruuparaaga.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m bhavaraaga.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m avijja.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m asmimaana.m samuuhanati''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saradasamaye kassako mahaana"ngalena kasanto sabbaani muulasantaanakaani sampadaalento kasati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa sabba.m kaamaraaga.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m ruuparaaga.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m bhavaraaga.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m avijja.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m asmimaana.m samuuhanati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, pabbajalaayako pabbaja.m laayitvaa agge gahetvaa odhunaati niddhunaati niccho.teti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa sabba.m kaamaraaga.m pariyaadiyati...pe0... sabba.m asmimaana.m samuuhanati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M2.0127^ea^, bhikkhave, ambapi.n.diyaa va.n.tacchinnaaya yaani ^a^P3.0156^ea^ tattha ambaani va.n.tapa.tibandhaani sabbaani taani tadanvayaani bhavanti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasa~n~naa bhaavitaa...pe0... sabba.m asmimaana.m samuuhanati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kuu.taagaarassa yaa kaaci gopaanasiyo sabbaa taa kuu.ta"ngamaa kuu.taninnaa ^a^V2.0140^ea^ kuu.tasamosara.naa, kuu.ta.m taasa.m aggamakkhaayati ^a^T3.0190^ea^; evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasa~n~naa bhaavitaa...pe0... sabba.m asmimaana.m samuuhanati.
[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci muulagandhaa kaa.laanusaarigandho tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasa~n~naa...pe0... sabba.m asmimaana.m samuuhanati.
[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci saaragandhaa, lohitacandana.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasa~n~naa...pe0... sabba.m asmimaana.m samuuhanati.
[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci pupphagandhaa, vassika.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasa~n~naa...pe0... sabba.m asmimaana.m samuuhanati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci ku.t.taraajaano {ku.d.daraajaano (sii0)}, sabbete ra~n~no cakkavattissa anuyantaa bhavanti, raajaa tesa.m cakkavatti aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasa~n~naa...pe0... sabba.m asmimaana.m samuuhanati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yaa kaaci taarakaruupaana.m pabhaa, sabbaa taa candimappabhaaya kala.m naagghanti so.lasi.m, candappabhaa taasa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasa~n~naa...pe0... sabba.m asmimaana.m samuuhanati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalaahake deve aadicco nata.m abbhussakkamaano, sabba.m aakaasagata.m tamagata.m abhivihacca bhaasate ca tapate ca virocate ca; evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa sabba.m kaamaraaga.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m ruuparaaga.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m bhavaraaga.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m avijja.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m asmimaana.m samuuhanati.

[01] ``katha.m ^a^T3.0191^ea^ bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, aniccasa~n~naa katha.m bahuliikataa ^a^P3.0157^ea^ sabba.m kaamaraaga.m pariyaadiyati...pe0... sabba.m asmimaana.m samuuhanati? `iti ruupa.m, iti ruupassa ^a^M2.0128^ea^ samudayo, iti ^a^V2.0141^ea^ ruupassa attha"ngamo; iti vedanaa... iti sa~n~naa... iti sa"nkhaaraa... iti vi~n~naa.na.m, iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo'ti -- eva.m bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, aniccasa~n~naa eva.m bahuliikataa sabba.m kaamaraaga.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m ruuparaaga.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m bhavaraaga.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m avijja.m pariyaadiyati, sabba.m asmimaana.m samuuhanatii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] pupphavaggo dasamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] nadii puppha~nca phe.na~nca, gomaya~nca nakhaasikha.m.
[22] suddhika.m dve ca gaddulaa, vaasiija.ta.m aniccataati..

[21] upayo arahanto ca, khajjanii therasavhaya.m.
[22] pupphavaggena pa.n.naasa, dutiyo tena vuccatiiti..

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0192^ea^. ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, antaa. katame cattaaro? sakkaayanto ^a^P3.0158^ea^, sakkaayasamudayanto, sakkaayanirodhanto, sakkaayanirodhagaaminippa.tipadanto. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sakkaayanto? pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaatissa vacaniiya.m. katame pa~nca? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sakkaayanto''.

[03] ``katamo ^a^V2.0142^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sakkaayasamudayanto? yaaya.m ta.nhaa ponobhavikaa nandiraagasahagataa tatratatraabhinandinii, seyyathida.m -- kaamata.nhaa, bhavata.nhaa, vibhavata.nhaa. aya.m ^a^M2.0129^ea^ vuccati, bhikkhave, sakkaayasamudayanto.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sakkaayanirodhanto? yo tassaayeva ta.nhaaya asesaviraaganirodho caago pa.tinissaggo mutti anaalayo -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sakkaayanirodhanto.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sakkaayanirodhagaaminippa.tipadanto? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sakkaayanirodhagaaminippa.tipadanto ^a^T3.0193^ea^. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro antaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``dukkha~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami dukkhasamudaya~nca dukkhanirodha~nca dukkhanirodhagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m. ta.m su.naatha. katama~nca, bhikkhave, dukkha.m? pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaatissa vacaniiya.m. katame pa~nca? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkha.m. katamo ca, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudayo? yaaya.m ta.nhaa ponobhavikaa...pe0... kaamata.nhaa, bhavata.nhaa, vibhavata.nhaa -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudayo. katamo ca, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodho? yo tassaayeva ta.nhaaya asesaviraaganirodho caago pa.tinissaggo mutti anaalayo -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodho. katamaa ^a^P3.0159^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``sakkaaya~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami sakkaayasamudaya~nca sakkaayanirodha~nca ^a^V2.0143^ea^ sakkaayanirodhagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m. ta.m su.naatha. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sakkaayo? pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaatissa vacaniiya.m ^a^T3.0194^ea^. katame pa~nca? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sakkaayo. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sakkaayasamudayo? yaaya.m ta.nhaa ponobhavikaa...pe0... kaamata.nhaa, bhavata.nhaa, vibhavata.nhaa -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sakkaayasamudayo. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sakkaayanirodho? yo tassaayeva ta.nhaaya...pe0... aya.m vuccati ^a^M2.0130^ea^, bhikkhave, sakkaayanirodho. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``pari~n~neyye ca, bhikkhave, dhamme desessaami pari~n~na~nca pari~n~naataavi~nca puggala.m. ta.m su.naatha. katame ca, bhikkhave, pari~n~neyyaa dhammaa? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, pari~n~neyyo dhammo. vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m pari~n~neyyo dhammo. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, pari~n~neyyaa dhammaa. katamaa ^a^P3.0160^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, pari~n~naa? raagakkhayo, dosakkhayo, mohakkhayo -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pari~n~naa. katamo ^a^T3.0195^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, pari~n~naataavii puggalo? arahaatissa vacaniiya.m. yvaaya.m aayasmaa eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pari~n~naataavii puggalo''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, upaadaanakkhandhaa. katame pa~nca? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti...pe0... pajaananti, saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0144^ea^. ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, upaadaanakkhandhaa. katame pa~nca? seyyathida.m ^a^T3.0196^ea^ -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti...pe0... pajaananti, saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0131^ea^. ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, upaadaanakkhandhaa. katame pa~nca? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca ^a^P3.0161^ea^ aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaayano''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, upaadaanakkhandhaa. katame pa~nca? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa anupaadaavimutto hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naavimutto''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0145^ea^. ``ruupe, bhikkhave, yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa, ta.m pajahatha. eva.m ta.m ruupa.m pahiina.m bhavissati ucchinnamuula.m ^a^T3.0197^ea^ taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.mkata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma.m. vedanaaya...pe0... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa, ta.m pajahatha. eva.m ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m pahiina.m bhavissati ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.mkata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma''nti. navama.m.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ruupe, bhikkhave, yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa ye upayupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa, te pajahatha ^a^P3.0162^ea^. eva.m ta.m ruupa.m pahiina.m bhavissati ucchinnamuula.m...pe0... vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu yo chando...pe0... eva.m te sa"nkhaaraa pahiinaa bhavissanti ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m ^a^M2.0132^ea^ anuppaadadhammaa. vi~n~naa.ne yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa ye upayupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa, te pajahatha. eva.m ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m pahiina.m bhavissati ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.mkata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma''nti. dasama.m.
[06] antavaggo ekaadasamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] anto dukkha~nca sakkaayo, pari~n~neyyaa sama.naa duve.
[22] sotaapanno arahaa ca, duve ca chandappahaanaati..

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0198^ea^ ^a^V2.0146^ea^. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```avijjaa avijjaa'ti, bhante, vuccati. katamaa nu kho, bhante, avijjaa, kittaavataa ca avijjaagato hotii''ti? ``idha, bhikkhu, assutavaa puthujjano ruupa.m nappajaanaati, ruupasamudaya.m nappajaanaati, ruupanirodha.m nappajaanaati, ruupanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaanaati; vedana.m nappajaanaati... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare nappajaanaati...pe0... vi~n~naa.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaanaati. aya.m ^a^P3.0163^ea^ vuccati, bhikkhu, avijjaa. ettaavataa ca avijjaagato hotii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```vijjaa vijjaa'ti, bhante, vuccati. katamaa nu kho, bhante, vijjaa, kittaavataa ca vijjaagato hotii''ti? ``idha, bhikkhu, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupa.m pajaanaati, ruupasamudaya.m pajaanaati, ruupanirodha.m pajaanaati, ruupanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaanaati. vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare pajaanaati...pe0... vi~n~naa.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaanaati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu, vijjaa. ettaavataa ca vijjaagato hotii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0133^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```dhammakathiko dhammakathiko'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu ^a^T3.0199^ea^ kho, bhante, dhammakathiko hotii''ti ^a^V2.0147^ea^? ``ruupassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya dhamma.m deseti `dhammakathiko bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. ruupassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti, `dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. ruupassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaa viraagaa nirodhaa anupaadaavimutto hoti, `di.t.thadhammanibbaanappatto bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. vedanaaya ce, bhikkhu...pe0... sa~n~naaya ce, bhikkhu... sa"nkhaaraana.m ce, bhikkhu... vi~n~naa.nassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya dhamma.m deseti, `dhammakathiko bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. vi~n~naa.nassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti, `dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. vi~n~naa.nassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaa viraagaa ^a^P3.0164^ea^ nirodhaa anupaadaavimutto hoti, `di.t.thadhammanibbaanappatto bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```dhammakathiko dhammakathiko'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, dhammakathiko hoti, kittaavataa dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hoti, kittaavataa di.t.thadhammanibbaanappatto hotii''ti? ``ruupassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya dhamma.m deseti, `dhammakathiko bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. ruupassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno ^a^T3.0200^ea^ hoti, `dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. ruupassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaa viraagaa nirodhaa anupaadaavimutto hoti, `di.t.thadhammanibbaanappatto bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. vedanaaya ce, bhikkhu...pe0... sa~n~naaya ce, bhikkhu... sa"nkhaaraana.m ce, bhikkhu... vi~n~naa.nassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya dhamma.m deseti, `dhammakathiko bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. vi~n~naa.nassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti, `dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaaya. vi~n~naa.nassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaa viraagaa ^a^M2.0134^ea^ nirodhaa anupaadaavimutto hoti, `di.t.thadhammanibbaanappatto bhikkhuu'ti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0148^ea^. ``idha bhikkhave assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii...pe0... sappurisadhamme aviniito ruupa.m attato samanupassati, ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m; attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ruupabandhanabaddho santarabaahirabandhanabaddho atiiradassii apaaradassii, baddho jiiyati {baddho jaayati (sii0 pii0) baddho jaayati baddho jiiyati (sii0 a.t.tha0 syaa0 a.t.tha0)} baddho miiyati baddho asmaa lokaa ^a^T3.0201^ea^ para.m loka.m gacchati. vedana.m ^a^P3.0165^ea^ attato samanupassati...pe0... vedanaaya vaa attaana.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano vedanaabandhanabaddho santarabaahirabandhanabaddho atiiradassii apaaradassii, baddho jiiyati baddho miiyati baddho asmaa lokaa para.m loka.m gacchati. sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati...pe0... aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano vi~n~naa.nabandhanabaddho santarabaahirabandhanabaddho atiiradassii apaaradassii, baddho jiiyati baddho miiyati baddho asmaa lokaa para.m loka.m gacchati''.

[03] ``sutavaa ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako ariyaana.m dassaavii...pe0... sappurisadhamme suviniito na ruupa.m attato samanupassati, na ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m; na attani vaa ruupa.m, na ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako na ruupabandhanabaddho, na santarabaahirabandhanabaddho, tiiradassii, paaradassii; `parimutto so dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami. na vedana.m attato...pe0... na sa~n~na.m attato...pe0... na sa"nkhaare attato...pe0... na vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati...pe0... aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako na vi~n~naa.nabandhanabaddho, na santarabaahirabandhanabaddho, tiiradassii, paaradassii, `parimutto so dukkhasmaa'ti vadaamii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso ^a^V2.0149^ea^ me attaa'ti samanupassathaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! ruupa.m, bhikkhave, `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m ^a^M2.0135^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. ``vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^P3.0166^ea^ `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassathaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! vi~n~naa.na.m, bhikkhave, `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi ^a^T3.0202^ea^, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m...pe0... eva.m passa.m...pe0... kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatiiti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassathaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``saadhu bhikkhave! ruupa.m, bhikkhave, `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassathaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``saadhu bhikkhave! vi~n~naa.na.m, bhikkhave, `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m...pe0... eva.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0150^ea^. ``sa.myojaniye ca, bhikkhave, dhamme desessaamii sa.myojana~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katame ca, bhikkhave, sa.myojaniyaa dhammaa, katama.m sa.myojana.m? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, sa.myojaniyo dhammo; yo tattha chandaraago, ta.m tattha sa.myojana.m. vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^P3.0167^ea^ sa.myojaniyo dhammo; yo tattha chandaraago, ta.m tattha sa.myojana.m. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, sa.myojaniyaa dhammaa, ida.m sa.myojana''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``upaadaaniye ca, bhikkhave, dhamme desessaami upaadaana~nca ^a^T3.0203^ea^. ta.m su.naatha. katame ca, bhikkhave, upaadaaniyaa dhammaa, katama.m upaadaana.m? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, upaadaaniyo dhammo, yo tattha chandaraago, ta.m tattha upaadaana.m. vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaaniyo dhammo; yo tattha chandaraago, ta.m tattha upaadaana.m. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, upaadaaniyaa dhammaa, ida.m upaadaana''nti. navama.m.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M2.0136^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaako.t.thiko {mahaako.t.thito (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} baaraa.nasiya.m viharanti isipatane migadaaye. atha kho aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami...pe0... etadavoca -- ``siilavataavuso, saariputta, bhikkhunaa katame dhammaa yoniso manasikaatabbaa''ti? ``siilavataavuso, ko.t.thika, bhikkhunaa pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa aniccato dukkhato rogato ga.n.dato sallato aghato aabaadhato parato palokato su~n~nato anattato yoniso manasi kaatabbaa. katame pa~nca? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. siilavataavuso, ko.t.thika, bhikkhunaa ime pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa aniccato ^a^V2.0151^ea^ dukkhato rogato ga.n.dato sallato aghato aabaadhato parato palokato su~n~nato anattato yoniso manasi kaatabbaa. .thaana.m kho ^a^T3.0204^ea^ paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m siilavaa bhikkhu ^a^P3.0168^ea^ ime pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhe aniccato...pe0... anattato yoniso manasi karonto sotaapattiphala.m sacchikareyyaa''ti.

[03] ``sotaapannena panaavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa katame dhammaa yoniso manasi kaatabbaa''ti? ``sotaapannenapi kho, aavuso ko.t.thika, bhikkhunaa ime pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa aniccato...pe0... anattato yoniso manasi kaatabbaa. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m sotaapanno bhikkhu ime pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhe aniccato...pe0... anattato yoniso manasi karonto sakadaagaamiphala.m sacchikareyyaa''ti.

[03] eva.m ^a^V2.0160^ea^ vutte, aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m mahaako.t.thika.m etadavoca -- ```vijjaa, vijjaa'ti, aavuso ko.t.thika, vuccati. katamaa nu kho, aavuso, vijjaa, kittaavataa ca vijjaagato hotii''ti?

[03] ``idhaavuso, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupassa samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. vedanaaya...pe0... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaraana.m... vi~n~naa.nassa samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. aya.m vuccataavuso, vijjaa; ettaavataa ca vijjaagato hotii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ ta~n~neva nidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m mahaako.t.thika.m etadavoca -- ```avijjaa, avijjaa'ti, aavuso ko.t.thika, vuccati. katamaa nu kho, aavuso, avijjaa, kittaavataa ca avijjaagato hotii''ti?

[03] ``idhaavuso, assutavaa puthujjano ruupa.m nappajaanaati, ruupasamudaya.m nappajaanaati, ruupanirodha.m nappajaanaati, ruupanirodhagaamini.m ^a^T3.0216^ea^ pa.tipada.m nappajaanaati. vedana.m nappajaanaati...pe0... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m nappajaanaati, vi~n~naa.nasamudaya.m nappajaanaati, vi~n~naa.nanirodha.m nappajaanaati, vi~n~naa.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaanaati. aya.m vuccataavuso, avijjaa; ettaavataa ca avijjaagato hotii''ti.

[03] eva.m ^a^M2.0145^ea^ vutte, aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m mahaako.t.thika.m etadavoca -- ```vijjaa, vijjaa'ti, aavuso ko.t.thika, vuccati. katamaa nu kho, aavuso, vijjaa, kittaavataa ca vijjaagato hotii''ti? ``idhaavuso, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupa.m pajaanaati, ruupasamudaya.m ^a^P3.0177^ea^ pajaanaati, ruupanirodha.m pajaanaati, ruupanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaanaati. vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m pajaanaati, vi~n~naa.nasamudaya.m pajaanaati, vi~n~naa.nanirodha.m pajaanaati ^a^V2.0161^ea^, vi~n~naa.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaanaati. aya.m vuccataavuso, vijjaa; ettaavataa ca vijjaagato hotii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] avijjaavaggo terasamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] samudayadhamme tii.ni, assaado apare duve.
[22] samudaye ca dve vuttaa, ko.t.thike apare tayoti..

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0217^ea^. ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, kukku.la.m, vedanaa kukku.laa, sa~n~naa kukku.laa, sa"nkhaaraa kukku.laa, vi~n~naa.na.m kukku.la.m. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanaayapi nibbindati, sa~n~naayapi nibbindati, sa"nkhaaresupi nibbindati, vi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ya.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m; tatra vo chando pahaatabbo. ki~nca, bhikkhave, anicca.m? ruupa.m ^a^P3.0178^ea^, bhikkhave, anicca.m; tatra vo chando pahaatabbo. vedanaa aniccaa...pe0... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m; tatra vo chando pahaatabbo. ya.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m; tatra vo chando pahaatabbo''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0162^ea^ ^a^M2.0146^ea^. ``ya.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m; tatra vo raago pahaatabbo. ki~nca, bhikkhave, anicca.m? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m; tatra vo raago pahaatabbo. vedanaa aniccaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m; tatra vo raago pahaatabbo. ya.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m; tatra vo raago pahaatabbo''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ya.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m; tatra vo chandaraago pahaatabbo ^a^T3.0218^ea^. ki~nca, bhikkhave, anicca.m? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m, tatra vo chandaraago pahaatabbo. vedanaa aniccaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m; tatra vo chandaraago pahaatabbo. ya.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m; tatra vo chandaraago pahaatabbo''ti. catuttha.m.
[03] 140^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ya.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m; tatra vo chando pahaatabbo...pe0... ya.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m; tatra vo chando pahaatabbo''ti. pa~ncama.m.
[03] 141^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ya.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m; tatra vo raago pahaatabbo...pe0... ya.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m; tatra vo raago pahaatabbo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
[03] 142^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ya.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m; tatra vo chandaraago pahaatabbo...pe0... ya.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m; tatra vo chandaraago pahaatabbo''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0163^ea^. ``yo, bhikkhave, anattaa; tatra vo chando pahaatabbo. ko ca, bhikkhave, anattaa? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anattaa; tatra vo chando pahaatabbo. vedanaa anattaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa; tatra vo chando pahaatabbo. yo, bhikkhave, anattaa; tatra vo chando pahaatabbo''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0147^ea^. ``yo, bhikkhave, anattaa; tatra vo raago pahaatabbo ^a^P3.0179^ea^. ko ca, bhikkhave, anattaa? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anattaa; tatra vo raago pahaatabbo. vedanaa anattaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa; tatra vo raago pahaatabbo. yo, bhikkhave, anattaa; tatra vo raago pahaatabbo''ti. navama.m.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``yo, bhikkhave, anattaa; tatra vo chandaraago pahaatabbo. ko ca, bhikkhave, anattaa? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anattaa; tatra vo chandaraago pahaatabbo. vedanaa anattaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa; tatra vo chandaraago pahaatabbo. yo ^a^T3.0219^ea^, bhikkhave, anattaa; tatra vo chandaraago pahaatabbo''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``saddhaapabbajitassa, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa ayamanudhammo hoti -- ya.m ruupe nibbidaabahulo {nibbidaabahula.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} vihareyya. vedanaaya...pe0... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne nibbidaabahulo vihareyya. yo ruupe nibbidaabahulo viharanto, vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne nibbidaabahulo viharanto ruupa.m parijaanaati, vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m parijaanaati; so ruupa.m parijaana.m ^a^V2.0164^ea^ vedana.m parijaana.m sa~n~na.m parijaana.m sa"nkhaare parijaana.m vi~n~naa.na.m parijaana.m parimuccati ruupamhaa, parimuccati vedanaaya, parimuccati sa~n~naaya, parimuccati sa"nkhaarehi, parimuccati vi~n~naa.namhaa, parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi; `parimuccati dukkhasmaa'ti vadaamii''ti. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``saddhaapabbajitassa, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa ayamanudhammo hoti -- ya.m ruupe aniccaanupassii vihareyya. vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne aniccaanupassii vihareyya...pe0... `parimuccati dukkhasmaa'ti vadaamii''ti. dvaadasama.m.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0148^ea^. ``saddhaapabbajitassa, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa ayamanudhammo hoti -- ya.m ruupe dukkhaanupassii vihareyya. vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne dukkhaanupassii vihareyya...pe0... `parimuccati ^a^P3.0180^ea^ dukkhasmaa'ti vadaamii''ti. terasama.m.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0220^ea^. ``saddhaapabbajitassa, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa ayamanudhammo hoti -- ya.m ruupe anattaanupassii vihareyya. vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne anattaanupassii vihareyya. (so ruupe) anattaanupassii viharanto, vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne anattaanupassii viharanto ruupa.m parijaanaati, vedana.m...pe0... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m parijaanaati. so ruupa.m parijaana.m vedana.m parijaana.m sa~n~na.m parijaana.m sa"nkhaare parijaana.m vi~n~naa.na.m parijaana.m parimuccati ruupamhaa, parimuccati vedanaaya, parimuccati sa~n~naaya, parimuccati sa"nkhaarehi, parimuccati vi~n~naa.namhaa ^a^V2.0165^ea^, parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi; `parimuccati dukkhasmaa'ti vadaamii''ti. cuddasama.m.
[06] kukku.lavaggo cuddasamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] kukku.laa tayo aniccena, dukkhena apare tayo.
[22] anattena tayo vuttaa, kulaputtena dve dukaati..

[03] 150^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0221^ea^. ``kismi.m nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, ki.m upaadaaya uppajjati ajjhatta.m sukhadukkha''nti? bhagava.mmuulakaa ^a^P3.0181^ea^ no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... ``ruupe kho, bhikkhave, sati ruupa.m upaadaaya uppajjati ajjhatta.m sukhadukkha.m. vedanaaya sati...pe0... sa~n~naaya ^a^M2.0149^ea^ sati... sa"nkhaaresu sati... vi~n~naa.ne sati vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaaya uppajjati ajjhatta.m sukhadukkha.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, api nu ta.m anupaadaaya uppajjeyya ajjhatta.m sukhadukkha''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, api nu ta.m anupaadaaya uppajjeyya ^a^V2.0166^ea^ ajjhatta.m sukhadukkha''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``kismi.m nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, ki.m upaadaaya, ki.m abhinivissa -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassatii''ti ^a^T3.0222^ea^? bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... ``ruupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, ruupa.m upaadaaya, ruupa.m abhinivissa ^a^P3.0182^ea^ ...pe0... vi~n~naa.ne sati, vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaaya, vi~n~naa.na.m abhinivissa -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''...pe0... vipari.naamadhamma.m, api nu ta.m anupaadaaya eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaati samanupasseyyaati? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m bhante''...pe0... vipari.naamadhamma.m, api nu ta.m anupaadaaya eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaati samanupasseyyaati? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``eva.m passa.m..pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0167^ea^. ``kismi.m nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, ki.m upaadaaya, ki.m abhinivissa eva.m di.t.thi uppajjati -- `so attaa, so loko, so pecca bhavissaami nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo'''ti? bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0.... ``ruupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, ruupa.m upaadaaya, ruupa.m abhinivissa eva.m di.t.thi uppajjati -- `so attaa, so loko, so pecca bhavissaami nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo'ti. vedanaaya...pe0... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu ^a^M2.0150^ea^ ...pe0... ^a^T3.0223^ea^ vi~n~naa.ne sati, vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaaya, vi~n~naa.na.m abhinivissa eva.m di.t.thi uppajjati ^a^P3.0183^ea^ -- `so attaa, so loko, so pecca bhavissaami nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo'''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, api nu ta.m anupaadaaya eva.m di.t.thi uppajjeyya -- `so attaa, so loko, so pecca bhavissaami nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, api nu ta.m anupaadaaya eva.m di.t.thi uppajjeyya -- `so attaa so loko, so pecca bhavissaami nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatiiti. tatiya.m.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0168^ea^. ``kismi.m nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, ki.m upaadaaya, ki.m abhinivissa eva.m di.t.thi uppajjati -- `no cassa.m, no ca me siyaa, naabhavissa, na me bhavissatii'''ti? bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... ``ruupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, ruupa.m upaadaaya, ruupa.m abhinivissa eva.m di.t.thi ^a^T3.0224^ea^ uppajjati -- `no cassa.m, no ca me siyaa, naabhavissa, na me bhavissatii'ti. vedanaaya sati... sa~n~naaya sati... sa"nkhaaresu sati... vi~n~naa.ne ^a^P3.0184^ea^ sati, vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaaya, vi~n~naa.na.m abhinivissa, eva.m di.t.thi uppajjati -- `no cassa.m, no ca me siyaa, naabhavissa, na me bhavissatii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, api nu ta.m anupaadaaya eva.m di.t.thi uppajjeyya -- `no cassa.m, no ca me siyaa, naabhavissa, na me bhavissatii'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, api nu ta.m anupaadaaya eva.m di.t.thi uppajjeyya -- `no cassa.m, no ca me siyaa, naabhavissa, na me bhavissatii'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0169^ea^ ^a^M2.0151^ea^. ``kismi.m nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, ki.m upaadaaya, ki.m abhinivissa micchaadi.t.thi uppajjatii''ti? bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... ``ruupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, ruupa.m upaadaaya, ruupa.m abhinivissa micchaadi.t.thi uppajjati. vedanaaya sati... micchaadi.t.thi uppajjati. sa~n~naaya sati... sa"nkhaaresu ^a^T3.0225^ea^ sati... vi~n~naa.ne sati, vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaaya, vi~n~naa.na.m abhinivissa micchaadi.t.thi uppajjati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m ^a^P3.0185^ea^, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m...pe0... api nu ta.m anupaadaaya micchaadi.t.thi uppajjeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, api nu ta.m anupaadaaya micchaadi.t.thi uppajjeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti.`pa~ncama.m.

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``kismi.m nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, ki.m upaadaaya, ki.m abhinivissa sakkaayadi.t.thi uppajjatii''ti? bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... ``ruupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, ruupa.m upaadaaya, ruupa.m abhinivissa sakkaayadi.t.thi uppajjati. vedanaaya sati... sa~n~naaya sati... sa"nkhaaresu sati... vi~n~naa.ne sati, vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaaya, vi~n~naa.na.m abhinivissa sakkaayadi.t.thi uppajjati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante'' ^a^V2.0170^ea^. ``ya.m panaanicca.m...pe0... api nu ta.m anupaadaaya sakkaayadi.t.thi uppajjeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m ^a^T3.0226^ea^, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m...pe0... api nu ta.m anupaadaaya sakkaayadi.t.thi uppajjeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``kismi.m nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, ki.m upaadaaya, ki.m abhinivissa attaanudi.t.thi uppajjatii''ti? bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... ``ruupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, ruupa.m upaadaaya, ruupa.m abhinivissa attaanudi.t.thi uppajjati. vedanaaya ^a^P3.0186^ea^ sati... sa~n~naaya sati... sa"nkhaaresu sati... vi~n~naa.ne sati, vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaaya, vi~n~naa.na.m abhinivissa attaanudi.t.thi uppajjati ^a^M2.0152^ea^. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m...pe0... api nu ta.m anupaadaaya attaanudi.t.thi uppajjeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m...pe0... api nu ta.m anupaadaaya attaanudi.t.thi uppajjeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``eva.m passa.m...pe0... ^a^V2.0171^ea^ naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``kismi.m nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, ki.m upaadaaya, ki.m abhinivissa uppajjanti sa.myojanaabhinivesavinibandhaa''ti? bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... ``ruupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, ruupa.m upaadaaya, ruupa.m abhinivissa uppajjanti sa.myojanaabhinivesavinibandhaa. vedanaaya ^a^T3.0227^ea^ sati... sa~n~naaya sati... sa"nkhaaresu sati... vi~n~naa.ne sati, vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaaya, vi~n~naa.na.m abhinivissa uppajjanti sa.myojanaabhinivesavinibandhaa. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m...pe0... api nu ta.m anupaadaaya uppajjeyyu.m sa.myojanaabhinivesavinibandhaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''...pe0... ``eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^P3.0187^ea^. ``kismi.m nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, ki.m upaadaaya, ki.m abhinivissa uppajjanti sa.myojanaabhinivesavinibandhaajjhosaanaa''ti? {vinibandhaa ajjhosaanaati (sii0 ka0)} bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... ``ruupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, ruupa.m upaadaaya, ruupa.m abhinivissa uppajjanti sa.myojanaabhinivesavinibandhaajjhosaanaa. vedanaaya sati ^a^V2.0172^ea^... sa~n~naaya sati... sa"nkhaaresu sati... vi~n~naa.ne sati, vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaaya, vi~n~naa.na.m abhinivissa uppajjanti sa.myojanaabhinivesavinibandhaajjhosaanaa. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti ^a^T3.0228^ea^? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m...pe0... api nu ta.m anupaadaaya uppajjeyyu.m sa.myojanaabhinivesavinibandhaajjhosaanaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''...pe0... ``eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0153^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa...pe0... bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aananda, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedanaa... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m ^a^V2.0173^ea^ -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante'' {no heta.m bhante. tasmaatihaananda ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m...pe0... da.t.thabba.m. (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. ``eva.m passa.m...pe0... ^a^T3.0229^ea^ ^a^P3.0188^ea^ naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] di.t.thivaggo pa~ncadasamo.

[21] ajjhattika.m eta.mmama, soattaa nocamesiyaa.
[22] micchaasakkaayattaanu dve, abhinivesaa aanandenaati..
[06] uparipa.n.naasako samatto.
[01] tassa uparipa.n.naasakassa vagguddaana.m --
[21] anto ^a^T3.0230^ea^ dhammakathikaa vijjaa, kukku.la.m di.t.thipa~ncama.m.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0231^ea^ ^a^V2.0174^ea^ ^a^M2.0154^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa raadho yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^P3.0189^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa raadho bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ```maaro, maaro'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, maaro''ti? ``ruupe kho, raadha, sati maaro vaa assa maaretaa vaa yo vaa pana miiyati. tasmaatiha tva.m, raadha, ruupa.m maaroti passa, maaretaati passa, miiyatiiti passa, rogoti passa, ga.n.doti passa, sallanti passa, aghanti passa, aghabhuutanti passa. ye na.m eva.m passanti te sammaa passanti. vedanaaya sati... sa~n~naaya sati... sa"nkhaaresu sati... vi~n~naa.ne sati maaro vaa assa maaretaa vaa yo vaa pana miiyati. tasmaatiha tva.m, raadha, vi~n~naa.na.m maaroti passa, maaretaati passa, miiyatiiti passa, rogoti passa, ga.n.doti passa, sallanti passa, aghanti passa, aghabhuutanti passa. ye na.m eva.m passanti, te sammaa passantii''ti.

[03] ``sammaadassana.m pana, bhante, kimatthiya''nti? ``sammaadassana.m kho, raadha, nibbidattha.m''. ``nibbidaa pana, bhante, kimatthiyaa''ti? ``nibbidaa kho, raadha, viraagatthaa''. ``viraago ^a^T3.0232^ea^ pana, bhante ^a^V2.0175^ea^, kimatthiyo''ti? ``viraago kho, raadha, vimuttattho''. ``vimutti pana, bhante, kimatthiyaa''ti? ``vimutti kho, raadha, nibbaanatthaa''. ``nibbaana.m pana, bhante, kimatthiya''nti? ``accayaasi {accasaraa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), assa (pii0), accayaa (ka0)}, raadha, pa~nha.m, naasakkhi pa~nhassa pariyanta.m gahetu.m. nibbaanogadha~nhi, raadha, brahmacariya.m vussati, nibbaanaparaayana.m nibbaanapariyosaana''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa raadho bhagavanta.m ^a^P3.0190^ea^ etadavoca -- ```satto, satto'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante ^a^M2.0155^ea^, sattoti vuccatii''ti? ``ruupe kho, raadha, yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa, tatra satto, tatra visatto, tasmaa sattoti vuccati. vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu... vi~n~naa.ne yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa, tatra satto, tatra visatto, tasmaa sattoti vuccati''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, raadha, kumaarakaa vaa kumaarikaayo vaa pa.msvaagaarakehi kii.lanti. yaavakiiva~nca tesu pa.msvaagaarakesu avigataraagaa honti avigatacchandaa avigatapemaa avigatapipaasaa avigatapari.laahaa avigatata.nhaa, taava taani pa.msvaagaarakaani alliiyanti ke.laayanti dhanaayanti ^a^T3.0233^ea^ {manaayanti (sii0 pii0 ka0)} mamaayanti. yato ca kho, raadha, kumaarakaa vaa kumaarikaayo vaa tesu pa.msvaagaarakesu vigataraagaa honti vigatacchandaa vigatapemaa vigatapipaasaa vigatapari.laahaa vigatata.nhaa, atha kho taani pa.msvaagaarakaani hatthehi ca paadehi ca vikiranti vidhamanti viddha.msenti vikii.laniya.m {vikii.lanika.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} karonti. evameva kho, raadha, tumhepi ruupa.m vikiratha vidhamatha viddha.msetha vikii.laniya.m karotha ta.nhaakkhayaaya pa.tipajjatha. vedana.m vikiratha vidhamatha viddha.msetha vikii.laniya.m karotha ta.nhaakkhayaaya pa.tipajjatha. sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare vikiratha vidhamatha viddha.msetha vikii.laniya.m karotha ta.nhaakkhayaaya pa.tipajjatha. vi~n~naa.na.m vikiratha vidhamatha viddha.msetha vikii.laniya.m karotha ta.nhaakkhayaaya pa.tipajjatha. ta.nhaakkhayo hi, raadha, nibbaana''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa raadho bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```bhavanettinirodho ^a^V2.0176^ea^ {bhavanetti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, bhavanettinirodho'ti {bhavanettiiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhante, vuccati. katamaa nu kho, bhante, bhavanetti, katamo bhavanettinirodho''ti? ``ruupe ^a^P3.0191^ea^ kho, raadha, yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa ye upayupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa -- aya.m vuccati bhavanetti. tesa.m nirodho {nirodhaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhavanettinirodho. vedanaaya... sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu ^a^M2.0156^ea^... vi~n~naa.ne yo chando...pe0... adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa ^a^T3.0234^ea^ -- aya.m vuccati bhavanetti. tesa.m nirodho bhavanettinirodho''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. aayasmaa raadho yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m raadha.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``pari~n~neyye ca, raadha, dhamme desessaami pari~n~na~nca pari~n~naataavi.m puggala~nca. ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa raadho bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``katame ca, raadha, pari~n~neyyaa dhammaa? ruupa.m kho, raadha, pari~n~neyyo dhammo, vedanaa pari~n~neyyo dhammo, sa~n~naa pari~n~neyyo dhammo, sa"nkhaaraa pari~n~neyyo dhammo, vi~n~naa.na.m pari~n~neyyo dhammo. ime vuccanti, raadha, pari~n~neyyaa dhammaa. katamaa ca, raadha, pari~n~naa? yo kho, raadha, raagakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo -- aya.m vuccati, raadha, pari~n~naa. katamo ca, raadha, pari~n~naataavii puggalo? `arahaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. yvaaya.m aayasmaa eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto -- aya.m vuccati, raadha, pari~n~naataavii puggalo''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m raadha.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``pa~ncime, raadha, upaadaanakkhandhaa. katame pa~nca? ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho ^a^V2.0177^ea^, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. ye hi ^a^T3.0235^ea^ keci, raadha, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa imesa.m pa~ncanna.m ^a^P3.0192^ea^ upaadaanakkhandhaana.m assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti; na me te, raadha, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu vaa braahma.nasammataa, na ca pana te aayasmanto saama~n~nattha.m vaa brahma~n~nattha.m vaa di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti. ye ca kho keci, raadha, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti; te kho me, raadha, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu ceva sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu ca braahma.nasammataa ^a^M2.0157^ea^, te ca panaayasmanto saama~n~nattha~nca brahma~n~nattha~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m raadha.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``pa~ncime, raadha, upaadaanakkhandhaa. katame pa~nca? ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. ye hi keci, raadha, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti...pe0... saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0236^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m raadha.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``pa~ncime, raadha, upaadaanakkhandhaa. katame pa~nca? ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. yato ^a^P3.0193^ea^ kho, raadha, ariyasaavako imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati -- aya.m vuccati, raadha, ariyasaavako sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaayano''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0178^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m raadha.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``pa~ncime, raadha, upaadaanakkhandhaa. katame pa~nca? ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. yato kho, raadha, bhikkhu imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa anupaadaavimutto hoti -- aya.m vuccati, raadha, araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naavimutto''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m raadha.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ruupe kho, raadha, yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa, ta.m pajahatha. eva.m ta.m ruupa.m pahiina.m bhavissati ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.mkata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma.m. vedanaaya yo ^a^M2.0158^ea^ chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa, ta.m pajahatha ^a^T3.0237^ea^. eva.m saa vedanaa pahiinaa bhavissati ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa, ta.m pajahatha. eva.m te sa"nkhaaraa pahiinaa bhavissanti ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. vi~n~naa.ne ^a^P3.0194^ea^ yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa, ta.m pajahatha. eva.m ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m pahiina.m bhavissati...pe0... anuppaadadhamma''nti. navama.m.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m raadha.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ruupe kho, raadha, yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa ye upayupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa, te pajahatha. eva.m ta.m ruupa.m pahiina.m bhavissati ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.mkata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma.m. vedanaaya yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa ye upayupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa, te pajahatha. eva.m saa vedanaa pahiinaa ^a^V2.0179^ea^ bhavissati ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. sa~n~naaya... sa"nkhaaresu yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa ye upayupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa, te pajahatha. eva.m te sa"nkhaaraa pahiinaa bhavissanti ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. vi~n~naa.ne ^a^T3.0238^ea^ yo chando yo raago yaa nandii yaa ta.nhaa ye upayupaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa, te pajahatha. eva.m ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m pahiina.m bhavissati ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.mkata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma''nti. dasama.m.

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0278^ea^ ^a^V2.0218^ea^ ^a^P3.0225^ea^ ^a^M2.0186^ea^. ``cakkhu.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m vipari.naami a~n~nathaabhaavi; sota.m anicca.m vipari.naami a~n~nathaabhaavi; ghaana.m anicca.m vipari.naami a~n~nathaabhaavi; jivhaa aniccaa vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii {vipari.naaminii a~n~nathaabhaavinii (?)}; kaayo anicco vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii; mano anicco vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii. yo, bhikkhave, ime dhamme eva.m saddahati adhimuccati -- aya.m vuccati saddhaanusaarii, okkanto sammattaniyaama.m, sappurisabhuumi.m okkanto, viitivatto puthujjanabhuumi.m; abhabbo ta.m kamma.m kaatu.m, ya.m kamma.m katvaa niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa pettivisaya.m vaa upapajjeyya; abhabbo ca {abhabbova (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} taava kaala.m kaatu.m yaava na sotaapattiphala.m sacchikaroti''.

[03] 317^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``yo kho, bhikkhave, ruupasa~n~naaya uppaado .thiti...pe0... jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo...pe0... yo dhammasa~n~naaya uppaado .thiti abhinibbatti paatubhaavo, dukkhasseso uppaado, rogaana.m .thiti, jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, ruupasa~n~naaya nirodho...pe0... jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo...pe0... yo dhammasa~n~naaya nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogaana.m vuupasamo, jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 318^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0192^ea^. ``yo kho, bhikkhave, ruupasa~ncetanaaya uppaado .thiti...pe0... jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo...pe0... yo dhammasa~ncetanaaya uppaado .thiti abhinibbatti paatubhaavo, dukkhasseso uppaado, rogaana.m .thiti, jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, ruupasa~ncetanaaya nirodho...pe0... jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo...pe0... yo dhammasa~ncetanaaya nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogaana.m vuupasamo, jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 319^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0286^ea^. ``yo kho, bhikkhave, ruupata.nhaaya uppaado .thiti...pe0... jaraamara.nassa ^a^V2.0226^ea^ paatubhaavo...pe0... yo dhammata.nhaaya uppaado .thiti abhinibbatti paatubhaavo, dukkhasseso uppaado, rogaana.m .thiti, jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo. yo ^a^P3.0231^ea^ ca kho, bhikkhave, ruupata.nhaaya nirodho...pe0... jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo...pe0... yo dhammata.nhaaya nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogaana.m vuupasamo, jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``yo kho, bhikkhave, pathaviidhaatuyaa uppaado .thiti abhinibbatti paatubhaavo...pe0... jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo; yo aapodhaatuyaa... yo tejodhaatuyaa... yo vaayodhaatuyaa... yo aakaasadhaatuyaa... yo vi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa uppaado .thiti abhinibbatti paatubhaavo, dukkhasseso uppaado, rogaana.m .thiti, jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, pathaviidhaatuyaa nirodho...pe0... jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo; yo aapodhaatuyaa nirodho... yo tejodhaatuyaa nirodho... yo vaayodhaatuyaa nirodho... yo aakaasadhaatuyaa nirodho... yo vi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogaana.m vuupasamo, jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo''ti. navama.m.

[03] 321^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0287^ea^ ^a^M2.0193^ea^. ``yo kho, bhikkhave, ruupassa uppaado .thiti abhinibbatti paatubhaavo, dukkhasseso uppaado, rogaana.m .thiti, jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo. yo vedanaaya... yo sa~n~naaya... yo sa"nkhaaraana.m... yo vi~n~naa.nassa uppaado .thiti abhinibbatti paatubhaavo, dukkhasseso uppaado, rogaana.m .thiti, jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, ruupassa nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogaana.m vuupasamo, jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo. yo vedanaaya... yo sa~n~naaya... yo sa"nkhaaraana.m... yo vi~n~naa.nassa nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogaana.m vuupasamo, jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo''ti. dasama.m.

[21] cakkhu ^a^V2.0227^ea^ ruupa~nca vi~n~naa.na.m, phasso ca vedanaaya ca.
[22] sa~n~naa ca cetanaa ta.nhaa, dhaatu khandhena te dasaati..

[03] 322^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0288^ea^ ^a^V2.0228^ea^ ^a^P3.0232^ea^ ^a^M2.0194^ea^. ``yo, bhikkhave, cakkhusmi.m chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yo sotasmi.m chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yo ghaanasmi.m chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yo jivhaaya chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yo kaayasmi.m chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yo manasmi.m chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno imesu chasu .thaanesu cetaso upakkileso pahiino hoti, nekkhammaninna~ncassa citta.m hoti. nekkhammaparibhaavita.m citta.m kammaniya.m khaayati, abhi~n~naa sacchikara.niiyesu dhammesuu''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 323^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``yo, bhikkhave, ruupesu chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yo saddesu... yo gandhesu... yo rasesu... yo pho.t.thabbesu... yo dhammesu chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno imesu chasu .thaanesu cetaso upakkileso pahiino hoti, nekkhammaninna~ncassa citta.m hoti. nekkhammaparibhaavita.m citta.m kammaniya.m khaayati, abhi~n~naa sacchikara.niiyesu dhammesuu''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 324^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``yo, bhikkhave, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasmi.m chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yo sotavi~n~naa.nasmi.m... yo ghaanavi~n~naa.nasmi.m... yo jivhaavi~n~naa.nasmi.m... yo ^a^V2.0229^ea^ kaayavi~n~naa.nasmi.m... yo manovi~n~naa.nasmi.m chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yato kho ^a^T3.0289^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno imesu chasu .thaanesu cetaso upakkileso pahiino hoti, nekkhammaninna~ncassa citta.m ^a^P3.0233^ea^ hoti. nekkhammaparibhaavita.m citta.m kammaniya.m khaayati, abhi~n~naa sacchikara.niiyesu dhammesuu''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 325^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0195^ea^. ``yo, bhikkhave, cakkhusamphassasmi.m chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yo sotasamphassasmi.m... yo ghaanasamphassasmi.m... yo jivhaasamphassasmi.m... yo kaayasamphassasmi.m... yo manosamphassasmi.m chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno...pe0... abhi~n~naa sacchikara.niiyesu dhammesuu''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``yo, bhikkhave, cakkhusamphassajaaya vedanaaya chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yo sotasamphassajaaya vedanaaya... yo ghaanasamphassajaaya vedanaaya... yo jivhaasamphassajaaya vedanaaya... yo kaayasamphassajaaya vedanaaya... yo manosamphassajaaya vedanaaya chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno...pe0... abhi~n~naa sacchikara.niiyesu dhammesuu''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 327^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``yo, bhikkhave, ruupasa~n~naaya chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yo saddasa~n~naaya... yo gandhasa~n~naaya... yo rasasa~n~naaya... yo pho.t.thabbasa~n~naaya... yo dhammasa~n~naaya chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso ^a^V2.0230^ea^. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno...pe0... abhi~n~naa sacchikara.niiyesu dhammesuu''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``yo, bhikkhave, ruupasa~ncetanaaya chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yo saddasa~ncetanaaya... yo gandhasa~ncetanaaya... yo ^a^P3.0234^ea^ rasasa~ncetanaaya... yo pho.t.thabbasa~ncetanaaya... yo dhammasa~ncetanaaya chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno...pe0... abhi~n~naa sacchikara.niiyesu dhammesuu''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0196^ea^. ``yo, bhikkhave, ruupata.nhaaya chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yo saddata.nhaaya... yo gandhata.nhaaya... yo rasata.nhaaya... yo pho.t.thabbata.nhaaya... yo dhammata.nhaaya chandaraago ^a^T3.0290^ea^, cittasseso upakkileso. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno...pe0... abhi~n~naa sacchikara.niiyesu dhammesuu''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``yo, bhikkhave, pathaviidhaatuyaa chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yo aapodhaatuyaa... yo tejodhaatuyaa... yo vaayodhaatuyaa... yo aakaasadhaatuyaa... yo vi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno imesu chasu .thaanesu cetaso upakkileso pahiino hoti, nekkhammaninna~ncassa citta.m ^a^V2.0231^ea^ hoti. nekkhammaparibhaavita.m citta.m kammaniya.m khaayati, abhi~n~naa sacchikara.niiyesu dhammesuu''ti. navama.m.

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``yo, bhikkhave, ruupasmi.m chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso...pe0... yo vi~n~naa.nasmi.m chandaraago, cittasseso upakkileso. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno imesu pa~ncasu .thaanesu cetaso upakkileso pahiino hoti, nekkhammaninna~ncassa citta.m hoti. nekkhammaparibhaavita.m citta.m kammaniya.m khaayati, abhi~n~naa sacchikara.niiyesu dhammesuu''ti. dasama.m.
[06] kilesasa.myutta.m samatta.m.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] cakkhu ^a^P3.0235^ea^ ruupa~nca vi~n~naa.na.m, phasso ca vedanaaya ca.

[03] 332^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T3.0291^ea^ ^a^V2.0232^ea^ ^a^M2.0197^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa saariputto saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena andhavana.m tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. andhavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena jetavana.m anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraamo tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m saariputta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``vippasannaani kho te, aavuso saariputta, indriyaani; parisuddho mukhava.n.no pariyodaato. katamenaayasmaa saariputto ajja vihaarena vihaasii''ti?

[03] ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, na eva.m hoti -- `aha.m ^a^T3.0292^ea^ pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapajjaamii'ti vaa `aha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapanno'ti vaa `aha.m pa.thamaa jhaanaa vu.t.thito'ti vaa''ti. ``tathaa ^a^P3.0236^ea^ hi panaayasmato saariputtassa diigharatta.m aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayaa susamuuhataa. tasmaa aayasmato saariputtassa na eva.m hoti -- `aha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapajjaamii'ti vaa `aha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapanno'ti vaa `aha.m pa.thamaa jhaanaa vu.t.thito'ti vaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0233^ea^. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando...pe0... aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``vippasannaani kho te, aavuso saariputta, indriyaani; parisuddho mukhava.n.no pariyodaato. katamenaayasmaa saariputto ajja vihaarena vihaasii''ti?

[03] ``idhaaha.m ^a^M2.0198^ea^, aavuso, vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, na eva.m hoti -- `aha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m samaapajjaamii'ti vaa `aha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m samaapanno'ti vaa `aha.m dutiyaa jhaanaa vu.t.thito'ti vaa''ti. ``tathaa hi panaayasmato saariputtassa diigharatta.m aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayaa susamuuhataa. tasmaa aayasmato saariputtassa na eva.m hoti -- `aha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m samaapajjaamii'ti vaa `aha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m samaapanno'ti vaa `aha.m dutiyaa jhaanaa vu.t.thito'ti vaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando...pe0... ``vippasannaani kho te, aavuso saariputta, indriyaani; parisuddho mukhava.n.no pariyodaato. katamenaayasmaa saariputto ajja vihaarena vihaasii''ti?

[03] ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca vihaasi.m sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedemi; ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti ^a^P3.0237^ea^ tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja ^a^T3.0293^ea^ viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, na eva.m hoti -- `aha.m tatiya.m jhaana.m samaapajjaamii'ti vaa `aha.m tatiya.m jhaana.m samaapanno'ti vaa `aha.m tatiyaa jhaanaa vu.t.thito'ti vaa''ti. ``tathaa hi panaayasmato saariputtassa diigharatta.m aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayaa susamuuhataa. tasmaa aayasmato saariputtassa na eva.m hoti -- `aha.m tatiya.m jhaana.m samaapajjaamii'ti vaa `aha.m tatiya.m jhaana.m samaapanno'ti vaa `aha.m tatiyaa jhaanaa vu.t.thito'ti vaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 335^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0234^ea^. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando...pe0... ``vippasannaani kho te, aavuso saariputta, indriyaani; parisuddho mukhava.n.no pariyodaato. katamenaayasmaa saariputto ajja vihaarena vihaasii''ti?

[03] ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m ^a^M2.0199^ea^ jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, na eva.m hoti -- `aha.m catuttha.m jhaana.m samaapajjaamii'ti vaa `aha.m catuttha.m jhaana.m samaapanno'ti vaa `aha.m catutthaa jhaanaa vu.t.thito'ti vaa''ti. ``tathaa hi panaayasmato saariputtassa diigharatta.m aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayaa susamuuhataa. tasmaa aayasmato saariputtassa na eva.m hoti -- `aha.m catuttha.m jhaana.m samaapajjaamii'ti vaa `aha.m catuttha.m jhaana.m samaapanno'ti vaa `aha.m catutthaa jhaanaa vu.t.thito'ti vaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0294^ea^. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando...pe0... ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa ananto aakaasoti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharaami...pe0... vu.t.thitoti vaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 337^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando...pe0... ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma ananta.m vi~n~naa.nanti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharaami...pe0... vu.t.thitoti vaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 338^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto...pe0... ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, sabbaso ^a^V2.0235^ea^ vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma, natthi ki~nciiti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharaami...pe0... vu.t.thitoti vaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 339^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^P3.0238^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto...pe0... ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharaami...pe0... vu.t.thitoti vaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 340^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto...pe0... ^a^T3.0295^ea^. ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m ^a^M2.0200^ea^ upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, na eva.m hoti -- `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjaamii'ti vaa `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno'ti vaa `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodhaa vu.t.thito'ti vaa''ti. ``tathaa hi panaayasmato saariputtassa diigharatta.m aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayaa susamuuhataa. tasmaa aayasmato saariputtassa na eva.m hoti -- `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjaamii'ti vaa `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno'ti vaa `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodhaa vu.t.thito'ti vaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 341^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa saariputto raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagahe pi.n.daaya paavisi. raajagahe sapadaana.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m a~n~natara.m ku.t.tamuula.m {ku.d.damuula.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), ku.d.da.m (pii0)} nissaaya paribhu~njati. atha kho suucimukhii paribbaajikaa yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca ^a^T3.0296^ea^ --

[03] ``ki.m ^a^V2.0236^ea^ nu kho, sama.na, adhomukho bhu~njasii''ti? ``na khvaaha.m, bhagini, adhomukho bhu~njaamii''ti. ``tena hi, sama.na, ubbhamukho {uddha.mmukho (sii0 a.t.tha0)} bhu~njasii''ti? ``na khvaaha.m, bhagini, ubbhamukho bhu~njaamii''ti. ``tena ^a^P3.0239^ea^ hi, sama.na, disaamukho bhu~njasii''ti? ``na khvaaha.m, bhagini, disaamukho bhu~njaamii''ti. ``tena hi, sama.na, vidisaamukho bhu~njasii''ti? ``na khvaaha.m, bhagini, vidisaamukho bhu~njaamii''ti.

[03] ```ki.m nu, sama.na, adhomukho bhu~njasii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na khvaaha.m, bhagini, adhomukho bhu~njaamii'ti vadesi. `tena hi, sama.na, ubbhamukho bhu~njasii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na khvaaha.m, bhagini, ubbhamukho bhu~njaamii'ti vadesi. `tena hi, sama.na, disaamukho bhu~njasii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na khvaaha.m, bhagini, disaamukho bhu~njaamii'ti vadesi. `tena hi, sama.na, vidisaamukho bhu~njasii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na khvaaha.m, bhagini, vidisaamukho bhu~njaamii'ti vadesi''.

[03] 662^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T3.0327^ea^ ^a^V2.0262^ea^ ^a^M2.0224^ea^. ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, jhaayii. katame cattaaro? idha ^a^P3.0264^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco jhaayii samaadhismi.m samaadhikusalo hoti, na samaadhismi.m samaapattikusalo. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhaayii samaadhismi.m samaapattikusalo hoti, na samaadhismi.m samaadhikusalo. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhaayii neva samaadhismi.m samaadhikusalo hoti, na ca samaadhismi.m samaapattikusalo. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhaayii samaadhismi.m samaadhikusalo ca hoti, samaadhismi.m samaapattikusalo ca. tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m jhaayii samaadhismi.m samaadhikusalo ca hoti samaadhismi.m samaapattikusalo ca aya.m imesa.m catunna.m jhaayiina.m aggo ca se.t.tho ca mokkho {paamokkho (syaa0 ka.m0) evamuparipi} ca uttamo ca pavaro ca. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, gavaa khiira.m, khiiramhaa dadhi, dadhimhaa navaniita.m, navaniitamhaa sappi, sappimhaa sappima.n.do tatra aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m jhaayii samaadhismi.m samaadhikusalo ca hoti samaadhismi.m samaapattikusalo ca aya.m imesa.m catunna.m jhaayiina.m aggo ca se.t.tho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro caa''ti. pa.thama.m.
